86a7(1): rab tu tshal ba dang / ba ga pa me mas kyining than mdapa lung ba tha brdzas padas pasan pa dang / dag 'dzin 'thas na/ sas rgyas pa bsrung das padzim baban du
86b1(1): dgro ba thams cad pa yang dag par brjod pa dang / bdag nyid kyis ye shes kyis don gzigs par bstan pa dang / sems can rnams rnam par dag pa'i song brjod pa dang / sems can rnams khan
86b2(1): dro ba med pa'i sgor bsgrub pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad du 'byung ba'i sgo rab tu bstan pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rgyal mtshan yang dag par bsgreng ba mdzad cing / mngon par 'byung ba ste/ 
86b3(1): 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas 'phrin las bzhi pa'o// don cig pa ma yin pa mkhyen pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi mthar thug pa rnams ni chos thams cad mngon par 'tshang
86b4(1): brgyab par bya'o// zhes byang chub kyi shing drung du byon te/ byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bas kyang bdud kyi dpung thams cad rab tu bzhom pa dang / skya'i byin gyi brlabs kyi mdzod kyis chos kyi dbyis
86b5(1): ma lus pa thams cad du sangs rgyas par dgang ba'i phyir byin gyis rlabs zad mi shes pa'i mthar thug pas mtha' rnam par spangs pa spyod pa tshad med pa rab tu brnyes pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i yul gyis
86b6(1): rnam par rol pa'i ye shes kyi don dang ldan pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan yang dag par bsgrub pa yongs su rdzogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du gdan rnam bkram pas yongs su
86b7(1): rgyas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma gus pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpas rnam par dmigs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang pa thob pa rnams kyis bzhal du blta ba/ byang chub sems dpa'
87a1(1): thams cad kyi rnam pa dang smon lam khyad par can dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis yang dag par bsam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo zab mo rab tu bskor ba
87a2(1): sadus rgyas kyi yul chad med pa brtsams pas byang chub sems dpa' brjod du meng ba'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sna tshogs spyod pa la yang dag par gnol ba'i byang chu
87a3(1): sems dpa'i 'khar gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa mnga' ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis byin du rlob pa'i yul mnga' ba/ dge'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i sems can gyis rnam par dmi
87a4(1): / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad tha mi dad pa dang ldan pa 'byung ba'i sa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mtha' yas pa'i mthu'i gnas la yon tan gyi khyad par thams cad rab tu brnyes pa bzhugs pa/ 'jig rten
87a5(1): gyi rnam pa thams cad tha ma lus pa'i mthar thug pa/ sems can gyi rnam pa thams cad dang / zhing gi rnam pa thams cad dang / chos kyi rnam pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam pa rnam thams cad dang / yongs
87a6(1): sa smin par bya ba'i rnam pa thams cad dang / dus kyi rnam pa thams cad dang / 'dul ba'i rnam pa thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i rnam pa thams cad ma lus pa'i mthar drug pa rnams/ 'thob
87a7(1): 'tham pams cad dzis pa pa tu pa ba rgyabs sangs rgyas kyi zhims pa dzad/ na pangs rnam pa ma ldan pa rnams kyi yang rgyas kyi rnams su ga/ mas
87b1(1): ldan 'das rnams chos kyi 'khor la skor ba mdzad pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i tshul gyis phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi khong du chud par gyur pa'i tshul gyis chang pa'i 'khor lo dang mi 'jigs pa'i seng
87b2(1): ga'i nga ro chen po'i tshul gyis thabs kyang ma lus par mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i 'khor lo dang / chos kyi mdzod mun pa med pa'i sgos snang bar byed pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad mkhyen pa'i mdzod kyi 'khor sa dang / 
87b3(1): shes namakha'i dbyings ltar tshad med pa'i tshul gyis chags pa med pa'i 'khol dang / chos thams cad kyi dngos po med pa'i rang banin rab tu rtogs par bya ba'i tshul gyis bsgribs pa med pa'i 'khor lo dang / sems can thangs
87b4(1): cad kyi chos kyi mig snam par sbyong ba'i tshul gyis 'jig rten byams cad kyi smon ma'i 'khor lo dang / 'jig rten thams cad du rgyas par 'gengs pa'i tshul gyis thams cad ma khyen pa'i phyir brjod pa'i 'khar po dang / sarba
87b5(1): rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang / mi 'gal ba'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas thams cad 'dab 'dres par gyur pa'i 'khor lo dang / de dag la sogs pa rnam par phye ba bye ba khrag khrig rgya stong du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bas sem
87b6(1): can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa'i rnam pa la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ste/ de ltar chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bas kyang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las bsam gyis mi
87b7(1): khyab pa mdzad/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las drug pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni grong dang / gro khyer dang grong rdal dang / rgyal po'i gnas su
88a1(1): rnams rnams pas rgya sa tshan lasam / mau rgyal sa nga/  rgyal pa'i banas phrul pa'is mdapa
88a2(1): dang/  ga nga/  tsa'i dimam ga cag thangs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldam da sangs rgyasa'adzin la mdzang sa/ 'di las/ 
88a3(1): gyi sgor byon na/ sa g.yo ba dang / 'od gser snang ba dang / long ba rnams mig mthong ba dang / 'on pa rnams sgra thos par 'gyur ba dang / smyon pa rnams dran pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / gos med pa'i gos thob
88a4(1): bar 'gyur ba dang / sdug bsngal rnams bde ba rdzob par dang / rol mo'i ma sbyang ma dkrol ma brlangs par sgra yid du 'or byin pa dang / rgyan snod na 'dug pa dang / gnas nas mchog pa dang / ma spyod ma krol ba'i sgra/ 
88a5(1): 'byung ba dang / bya sna tshogs mang pa'i A swad yid du 'od 'byung ba dang / b.lan papang mi thal zhing mi mjus med pa'i sku mthong bas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can rnams la sangs rgyas
88a6(1): kying dran 'amadzangad ro// mthun dang pe byang ba dang po bsnyen papa kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzadzar/ yangs sa gzigs pa dang / rnam par ni
88b1(1): brkyang ba dang / skums pas kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// gshegs pa dang / sbar bzhud pa dang / bzangs pa dang / 'chags pa dang / bzhugs pa dang / garims pas
88b2(1): kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// chos bstan pa dang / mi gsung bar bzhugs pas kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// rdzu 'phrul gi ro bral dang / 
88b3(1): yongs su bstan pa'i cho phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'jig rten gyi khams kyi yul/ sems can bsam pa sna tshogs rgya mtsho dang ldan pa/ 'jig
88b4(1): rten gyi spyo pa thams cad rgyu zhing 'byung ba dang ldan/ dge pa'i ca brjen pas shin tu bstan pa/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa/ sngon 'grogs grogs pa byang chub sems dpa' dang gnas pa'i sems can rnams pa
88b5(1): sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin la mdzad do// yang dag par rdzog pa'i sang+yas rnam ni sku gzug ldan mi ngoms pa'o// zhes bya bar gzhol ba dang / sang+yas rnam skye bar dugron mo/ zhes bya bar yid ches pa byed pa dang / de bzhin gsheg pa
88b6(1): mthong zhing / de bzhin ga sheg pa'i bsung rdzob de ni bsed nas kyi da/  ba'i 'byung ba gyur pa'o/ zhes sa cu gyi spyod pa yI 'byed ba dang / 'jig rten tham cang na 'dag pa ni bzhin sa theg pa'i skye ba yin no// zhes bya ba rjo
88b7(1): du chung par byed pa dang / sangs na kye yon tan bsdug pa ni mtha' yas pa'o zhes bya bar yang dag par lde ba 'ang / ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba'ang bzhin gshegs pa'i
89a1(1): rigs pa dag pa brtsub bdang / dge bcu pa mas pa tshul sa ca kyisangs rgyas patshamaldan dasarnams mas par byed padang / deb gagags gsas dam
89a2(1): ma' las pa zhes pang du rung bar byed pa dang / de 'a gzugs pa'i sems can thams cad la mang du byung ba drug pa dang / de bdi gzhags rnamams na ma ma sa ma
89a3(1): rnan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'dzin las mdzad do// dang pa byas pa dang/ phyag bcom 'i dang / rnam mo srung ba byas pa dang / rjes su bsteng ba dang / spyad drangs pa dang / mtshad pa dang / 
89a4(1): mdzang ba dang / 'dzum pa dang pa dang / sangs rgyas la dga' ba'i sems kyis mos par byas pa'i dge ba'i na tshal sa nas kyang sangs rgyas pacom ldan 'das rnams kyi sems can rnams pas sa nam
89a5(1): badzin sa mdzad pa// sangs rgyas rjes su dran par gyur pas kyang sangs rgyas pam ldan 'das rnams ni sems canarnamasamasangs rnam tha dzi sa ma da// sangs rgyas mdza bar da
89a6(1): sa kyang sangs rgyal patsamanan pad mas ni sem na yas sa sangs rgyas kyi 'dzinams pang da // de bzhin gnags pa su bdag dang / dbyings kyinapa pa da med pa na nga/ 
89b1(1): mamamanan das rnams na sems can nabs la sangs rgyas kyi 'dzin las mdzad // da bzhid gshegs pa'i gsung zas par byas pas kyang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams nasams
89b2(1): rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// de dag la sogs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi 'phrid las rnam pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa dag 'jig rten gyi kha
89b3(1): thams cad du sems cad thams cad kyi bsab pa dang mthu dang 'dul ba ji lta ba pa tshul dang mi 'da' bar 'byung ngo // de ltar sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las 'jig rten thams cad kyi sems can kun gyis sems
89b4(1): na spyod pa dang bsam pa lagasas pa/ dge ba rgya che 'chad med bdag phyir mi ldog pa'i yul dang snying rje chen pos rab tu bskul ba dang / sngon gyi smon lam gyis yongs su skyo ba med med pa dang / sas
89b5(1): rgyas kyi 'grin las mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / shugs kyi 'jig rten thams cad 'byung ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi 'phen las bdun po'o// sangs rgyas
89b6(1): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dgon pa na bzhugs sam/ zhi bar bzhugs sa pa/ dben par bzhugs sam/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa la bzhugs sam/ ting nge 'dzin chen po'i gnas pa
89b7(1): bcugs sam/ gcig pu 'gyes par bzhugs sam/ sku pa snang bar bzhugs sam/ ye shes zab pa'i gnas la bcugs sapa/ sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi stabs chad med dpal bzhugs sam/ 
90a1(1): su'i yongs su spyod pa mthong bar bzhugs kyang rung ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las gnan mi tshugs pa'i ye shes dang / smon lam gyi tshul gyis
90a2(1): pa bzhin du 'dul ba'i sems can rnams rgyun mi 'chad par 'byung ste// sangs rgyas lnga yongs su tshol bas kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las rgyun mi 'chad do// sangs rgyas klu yongs su tshol bas kyang sangs rgyas kyi
90a3(1): 'dzin las chun mi bachad do// sangs rgyas gnod sbyin yongs su tshol ba dang / sangs rgyas mi 'am ci yongs su tshol ba dang / sangs rgyas su 'phyeng chen po mangs su chos pa dang / sangs rgyas min po yangs su
90a4(1): chos pa dang / sangs rgyas mi dang mi ma yin pa yongs su tshol ba dang / sangs rgyas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas yongs su tshol ba dang / sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yongs su tshol bas kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'drin
90a5(1): las rgyun pi 'chang ngo // chos stod pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi badzin las rgyun mi 'chang do// sangs rgyas gcig brjod pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'dzin las rgyud mi 'angang do// sangs rgyas thams cad brjod pas kyang sangs
90a6(1): rgyas kyi 'phrin las rgyun mi 'chang ngo do// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i khyad par dang / sngon lam thams cad gcig tu brjod pas kyang / sangs kyi 'phrid las rgyun mi 'chad do// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gcis
90a7(1): pa / zung bag ma 'a pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'arnams chu pa gad // 'jig tan bya mam sa sa rgyas kyisu du 'dzi pas kyang rjes rgyal kyi dzin pasatsun mi la ga/ mas
90b1(1): kyi yul 'jig rten gyi yul du brjod pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'dzin las rgyun mi 'chad do// yul mi yin pa sangs rgyas kyi yul du brjod pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'dzin las rgyun mi 'cha dang // na ma can dang
90b2(1): ba yang kha dang mar kham dang / zla ba dang lo bgrangs par bzhugs pa dang / yongs su bzhugs pa nas de bzhin du bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar du btsugs pa dang / yongs su bzhugs
90b3(1): pas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las brgyad pa'o// sangs rgyas pa
90b4(1): ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams la 'byung gnas lta bu sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa kun la rnam par sbyor ba lta bu sangs rgyas rgyas rnams la tha dad pa sta bu sems khong du chung ba la shin du mes palta bu/ dbang po nangs
90b5(1): la bsgrub pas bya/ sems can skye dag thams cad la 'dul ba lta bu/ 'gro ba thams cad lams pa lta bu/ byang chub sems cad pa' thams cad la 'byung ba lta bu/ byang chub tu zhugs pa rnams la skus blta bu/ 
90b6(1): gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa rnams la ye shes snang ba lta bu dag ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jig mi rtag pa ston pa dang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las rgyun mi 'chad par brjod pa dang / 'phrin las mdzad
90b7(1): pa'i mthar thug par bstan pa dang / chos rgyud nyams pa med pa'i dngos por brjod pa dang / srid pa'i tshul rtsa ba nas chad par brjod pa dang / sems can thams cad skyo bar bya bar bstan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rjes su
91a1(1): @'gro ba'i sems mthud par bya ba dang / su cher mtha' lta bung sems can rnams kyis shesar bya ba dang / sems cad rnams kyis 'jig rten thams cad du dga' bar bya ba med pa bstan
91a2(1): pa dang / sems can rnams la ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa mnyes par gyis shig par bstan pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba bstan du mi rung ba
91a3(1): khang du chud par bya ba dang / 'jig rten rnams kyi rtsos pa bstang pa dang / sangs thams dmigs par btsun pa 'i sems la dgod pa dang / su d+ha rgan pa rnam par dag pas pa gzhags pa mthang bab
91a4(1): par bskyed pa dang / bskye ba'i dbang po'i phyir bzlog cing yongs su dag par mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas la mos pa bskyed pa dang / skyo bar gyur pa'i sems can rnams la byin gyis brlab par bya ba dang / sa
91a5(1): rgyas dmigs pa'i rkyen 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du phyin par dgongs pa mdzad pa dang / sku thams cad bshig ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdungs gis sems can rnams yongs su gzung
91a6(1): bar mdzad pa dang / 'jig rten rnam par 'khrugs pa dang / dregs shing mos pa'i sems can rnams sngam pa la dgod par mdzad cing yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa bston pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las
91a7(1): kun mi 'bang de/ 'di ni sangs rgyas 'acom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las dgu pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mya ngan las 'da' ba'i che/ 'jig rten thams cad na sems can
91b1(1): rnabs sde sngags 'dod cing du ba dang / bya ngan byang pa dang / bachim 'byin pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhe 'am/ thugs rje chen po zhe na/ ded dpon chen po zhe'am/ phan par 'ad
91b2(1): lathugs rtse bcan na 'am/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi sems can thams cad kyi sbyangs su gyur pa/ mgon du gyur pa dang / rten du gyur pa bla ra med pa'i bsod nams kyi zhing nub par gyur
91b3(1): zhe'am/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'byung bar dka'o zhes rnam pa lta bu'i smre sngags 'don cing mya ngan byed pa dang / sangs rgyas mthong ba rjes su drad pa'i sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang / 
91b4(1): yid la bya ba de dang / de dag gi sgor sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las tshad med pa rgyud mi 'chang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i tshe/ 'di lta ste sems can rnams
91b5(1): kyi sems dang par bya ba'i dbang dang / sems can rnams dad pas mchod par bya ba'i dbang dang / sems can rnams lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dang bar bya ba'i dbang dang / sems can rnams yongs
91b6(1): bu srid par bya ba'i dbang dang / sems can rnams yongs su spyad par bya ba'i dbang dang / sems can rnams gdul ba'i dbang dang / sems can rnams kyi bsod napas kyi tshogs yangs su rdzogs
91b7(1): par bya ba'i dbang dang / sems cad rnams de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pas dmigs par bya ba'i dbang dang / da bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshang rten rnam pa sna tshogs su brgyad pas phyogs dang yul sa tsho
92a1(1): gnod rgyan dang / drib dang / snga ma yin dang / mnamakha' lding dang / mi 'ab ci dang / sdeb chen po / mau'i gnas thams cad du la ba tho thos nga'i tshul dzes pa bzhin du su gdung dang sa
92a2(1): gyis rlob bo// rang gi sku rnam par phye bste/ bsku gdung dang bsreg/ chang med pa grangs med pa dngag tu med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ brjod du med pa byin gyis rlob bo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod na/ 
92a3(1): gyis sangs rgyas kyi sku gdung 'jig rten thams cad du rnam par phye ba/ de'i yul dang phyogs kyi klu'i gnas dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye
92a4(1): chen po'i gnas dang / mi'i gnas dang srin po'i gnas dag tu sku gdung dang / ring bsrel mchod pa byed par 'gyur bas/ sku gdung gi ring bsrel dang / dbu dang / phyag sen gyi mchod rten dang / sangs rgyas
92a5(1): bcugs pa'i mchod rten la 'gro ba thams cad nges par sangs rgyas dran par 'gyur te/ chos la rab tu rten par 'gyur ro// dge 'dun la dad pa rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro// yul dang phyogs kyi gnas de dngad
92a6(1): dag tu nga chun mi 'chad par sangs rgyas mchod pa la brtson par bsam pas skyed pa yongs su gtang bar 'gyur ro// bsad rnams byed par 'gyur ro// mtho ris de dang de yongs su dag par rab tu 'tho gru thar
92b1(1): ro// rigs dang rgyud kyi bdag nyid che ba rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro// longs spyod chen po dang / 'khor rnam par dag par rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro// lha dang mi yi phun sum pa nyams su myong bar 'gyur
92b2(1): log par ltung ba med pa'i lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas 'byung ba don yod pa rab tu bsgrub par 'gyur ro// chos dkar ba la gnas pa yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro// khams gsum
92b3(1): ba las 'byung ba'i lam yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ro// theg pa gang la dad pa'i spor lam gyis nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la drin du gzo ba rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas
92b4(1): bcom ldan 'das rnams la rten pa dang / stabs btsal ba dang / mgon btsal ba dang / dpung gnyen btsal ba'i sems bskyed par 'gyur te/ de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yongs su mya
92b5(1): ngan las 'das kyang / yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab par spyod pa/ bsod nams zad mi shes pa'i yon tan gyi gnas dag ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jig rten du 'byung na/ de ltar
92b6(1): sems cad rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa mang po rab tu bsags pas bsod nams kyi tshogs rab tu rdzogs par 'gyur te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi 'phrir las bcu
92b7(1): ba'o// the rtsal ba'i sas bcu pa de dag ni sangs rgyas bam tha 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi 'brid las mchen pag chad 'dug bsam gyi mi khyab pa rnams sa// de dag de sangs rgyas kyi byid gyinapa
93a1(1): @ma gtsigs par sna dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis chang bzung bar mi nus pag// 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang dasar byung ba'i na pas dang / rangasangs nyas thams cad kyis 'jug
93a2(1): nus pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gnyis su med par spyod cing dngos po rnam pa gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi dbang phyug gi chos rnams ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 
93a3(1): 'des ste sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni lung bstan pa thams cad ston pa la gnyis su med par sbya dang // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can rnam sangs rgyas kyi rjes su dran pa la
93a4(1): brnams ni sems lung bsam pa brjod du med pa 'byam klas pa rnams la gnyis su sad med par srung ngo // sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi don ma lus par mngon par sangs rgyas pas gnyis su mang
93a5(1): pa'i su rnam par dmigs par mdzad do// 'das pa dang mkhyen pa dang da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la rang bzhin gnyis su med par thugs su chud par mngab ba'o// 'byung ba dang / byang
93a6(1): ba'i mtha' gnyis su med pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang / daltar byung ba gnyis su med par thugs su chud pa mnga' ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi ning thams cad gnyis su med pas dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas
93a7(1): nga mas ca pa ga sa ba zugs sa chung ya pal// sangs rgyas gag pa sas sa thamasas kyi gzung ga ya pa grugs su chung ya 'i ngag
93b1(1): bathams cad kyis thugs su chung ba dang / 'dul ba mngang ba'i rnam par dmigs pa gnyis su med par thugs su chung ba mngab pa'o// 'dzag rten gyi chos thams cad dang sangs rgyas kyi chos sum
93b2(1): thugs su chud pa mnga' ba'o// sangs rgyas ma dang ma byon pa dang / da ltar 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig ste/ gnyis su med par thugs su rud pa mang
93b3(1): ba'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gnyis su med par spong cing / dngos po gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi dbang phyug gi chos so// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di
93b4(1): dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa'i chos thams cad la rab tu bzhugs pa rnams so// bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos kyi dbying
93b5(1): la gnas pa'i ye shes thugs su rkyang pa la bzhugs pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs rje chen po mi nyams pa la bzhugs pa'o// sangs bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sngon la mdzes bu
93b6(1): bzhin du 'byung la bzhugs pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'dul sems can yongs su mi gdong ba la bzhugs pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dngos po med pa la gnas pa'i chos
93b7(1): nyid la bcugs pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku skal ba mnyam pa tha mi dad cing don yod pa la bzhugs pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu mnyam par
94a1(1): sabacugs pa'i zugs pa gtsugs pas sangs rgyas pam 'das rnapas na chos thams cad mams bzang bar gnam pal bcugs pa'o// sangs rnas pa mtha mas chags pa zang dzun
94a2(1): kyis rnam par snang pa la bcugs pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos thams cad kyi mjam pa nyid la 'jug pas grub pa med pa'i yang dag pa'i mtha'i mtshan nyid la bzhugs pasngo/ kye rgyal ba'i sras
94a3(1): bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshes pa bzhug sa chos thams cad la bzhugs pa rnams so// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
94a4(1): tshas thams cad ma lus par mngan par mkhyen pa rnams te/ bcu gang ner/ 'di lta sems kyi dbyings bsus pa thams cad kyi 'das pa bgrangs pa mthab dag thams mngan pa gzhan pa dang / ma'angs
94a5(1): bgrangs pa mtha' dag thams cad mngon par mkhyer pa dang / da ltar byung ba bgrangs mtha' dag thams nad mngon par mkhyen pa dang / tshig gi la ma mtha' dag thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang / 'jig rten
94a6(1): kyi rgyud mthab dag thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang / sems can gyi bsam pa dang / shes pa mtha' dag thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba chung du dang 'bring
94a7(1): dang / chan pa dang rnam pas tshogs su rnam par gnas pa'i mtshan nyid kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams la bsum pa chad med pa yongs su mi gtang bas sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'bar bar bya ba dang / yongs su
94b1(1): rdzogs par byamathab dag thabs cang mangs par mkhyen pa dang / chos thams cang 'chang rgya ba'i 'khyad pa mthab dag thams cad mngod par mkhyen pa dang / 'jig rten gyi rlung thams cad ram par dbye bam
94b2(1): shes gzigs pa mtha' dag thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang / chas kyi dbyings kyi ba'i mig 'phrul gyi rnam pa lta bur dbye ba thams cad mngan par mkhyad pas/ kye rgyal pa'i sras bcu pa de dag rnas
94b3(1): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos thams ma lus par mkhyen pa'o// / bam po drug bcu rtsa drug pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgya
94b4(1): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi stobs chen po'o// stobs dam pa/ stobs tshad med pa/ stobs dag nyid che ba/ stobs thub pa med pa/ stobs mi mnyam pa/ stobs snying po dang ldan
94b5(1): pa/ stobs mi shigs pa/ stobs 'jig rten thams cad kyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ stobs sems can thams cad kyis mi 'phags pa/ sangs kyi rgyal mtshan stobs po chen/ dpa
94b6(1): chen po'i stobs dang ste/ 'di bcu ni 'di lta ste sangs rgyas kyi sku ni pha rol gyi gnod pa thams cad kyis ri shigs mi chod pa'o// 'jig rten gyi yul thams cad kyis su tshe'i dbang po nyams par
94b7(1): mi nus pa'o// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi bsal ba'i me'i gdung bas tshig par mi nus pa'o// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'jig par gtogs pa'i chu'i phung por 'grongs par
95a1(1): / mi 'gyur ba'o// bdud thams cad dang / bdud kyisde thams cad dang / A dang thams cad kyi byang dang / klu dang gnang sbyin rab sa ma med dang / nam gapa' lding dang / mi 'ag
95a2(1): tsi dang / sa 'bruchen pa dang / yi dang mi pa yi pa thams cad kyi dpung dang / shaza dang/ srin po thams cad kyi dpung dang / sems can ma lus pa rnams cad kyi dpung gis banas par dka'i 'ag
95a3(1): rdo rjen ri rab kyi 'i tsam gyi chang pa dang / khang yug gi ri chen po ma'am/ stong gsum gyi steng chen po tsam gyi rdo rje'i chang bab kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhid gshegs pa dgra btsam pa yang dag pa
95a4(1): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ba bsdu/ gcig kyang 'gul bar mi 'gyur te/ bag g.yo bar mi 'gyur te/ bag tsha ba'i shas mi mnga' babo/ bzhugs sam/ bdengs sam/ bzhud dam/ 
95a5(1): gzigs kyang rung ste/ spyad lam 'gyur ba med do// de bzhin gshegs pa gang na bzhugs pa'i yul de dang de'i 'khor dag tu yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes na kun du 'bab par mi 'gyur pa/ 
95a6(1): sangs rgyas kyi nam ring ba rnams la yang gnod par mi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlab pa'i sems can rnams la yang gan dpar mi 'gyur ning mig g.yo nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i/ 
95a7(1): su sbrul spos kyang ci dgos te// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu bo che chen po'i stabs sangs rgyas kyi spyad yul rgyal mtshan gyi tshe dang pal// gzhan yang sangs rgyas ba
95b1(1): ldan 'das rnams kyis na/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyis klas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ri rab kyi ri dang bcas pa/ khor yug dang khang yug chen po'i ri dang bcas pa/ mdzad/ 
95b2(1): ri dang nags tshal thibs po dang / sems can gnas glenas tha dad pa kun dang bcas pa/ des bu'i 'jig rter gyi khams thams cad de bzhid gshegs pa'i bsu'i bu ga gcig tu btsud de/ 
95b3(1): ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug par bzhag kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabasam gtog par sems can rnams kyis shes par mi nus so// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni snyed kyi 'jig
95b4(1): rten gyi khams sku'i baspu'i khong bu gcig gis bA ste/ phyi ma'i mtha'i skal pa'i mur thug par bsnams shing gshigs sam/ bzhugs sam/ bzhengs sam/ gzigs kyang
95b5(1): rung te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs skad cig tsam yang skyo ba mi mnga' ba'o// chad cing tub par mi 'gyur ro// mthu dang stobs la yongasu nyams par mi 'gyur ba'o// 
95b6(1): spyod lam rnams par 'gyur ba ma minga'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' ni chos kyi de rings ma lus pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'dzin kyang skyo ma/ 
95b7(1): dub pa med do// gnod pa med do// med par mi 'gyur ro// mi g.yo ba ma'i byung mi 'jig go// de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnabs kyang baspu'i khung gcig tu 'dzi
96a1(1): rted gyi khams ma lus pa thabs cad bsnams kyang de rgyas thugs skang cig tsam du yang ma 'a ba'i sgra nyams ma'i byungs/ 'di nas
96a2(1): rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis mthu ba che chen po'i stobs sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi chos gnyis pa'o// gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gshegs sa
96a3(1): gcig tu bzhud pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod med pa'i yang brjod du bod ma'i rdul shin du pra bsed gyi 'jig rten gyis khams yongasu 'da' zhing / thugs bskyed pa gcig gis bskul
96a4(1): bla tha dad pa'i rim pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdus shin du phra ba brnyed 'byung ba mdzad do// de lta ngur gshegs par bskal pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin/ 
96a5(1): za ba bskyed du gshegs shing / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can gyi rgyud ci sring pa'i bskal par bzhud de/ 'jig rten gyi khabs thams cad kyi rdul shin du 'tha
96a6(1): 'jig rjer gyi khams tsam du 'khor kun du rgya che zhing yangs pa'i khi yug chen po'i ji rje'i ri dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rnam pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa la bsgres pa de
96a7(1): sred kyi dus shi tus bsong ba spu'i phreng zugacig tu jis pa bzhin du/ sku'i baspu'i wang bu thams cad du btsud de/ baspu'i 'o tha yang sems can thams cad de med du byung/ 
96b1(1): de dag thams cad bstabs te/ de snyed kyi spu'i khung bur tshul de bzhin du bshams te/ thugs bskyed pa de lta bus de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du
96b2(1): zhing gshegs sam/ phyogs kyi dra ba thams cad du rgyu zhing gshegs sam/ nam mkha'i dbyings/ thams cad du rgyu bzhing gshegs sam/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi
96b3(1): rgyud grangs pa/ sngon gyi mtha' gtogs pa na bzung ba/ phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal po'i mur thug par de bzhin du gshegs pa bskal pa thams cad zad par gyur kyang de bzhin gshegs
96b4(1): pa bzhud pa la brtson pa ni nyams par mi 'gyur ro// sku nyam chung bar mi 'gyur ro// thugs rnams par 'khrug par mi 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin nyams par mi 'gyur ro/ 
96b5(1): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yongasu nyams par mi 'gyur ro// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu bo che chen po'i stobs sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi tshe
96b6(1): gsum pa'o// gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bsad sems gcig pazhes nas bskal pa brjod du med par kyil makrungs gcig bcas pas nini mtshan
96b7(1): mtshan gyi rgyud du sngon gyi mtha'i mur gtogs bskal pa 'das par bzhugs kyang / sku mi g.yo zhing bde ba'i dam pa la spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam pa spyod par bsam gyi mkhyud
97a1(1): pas ba rnam par spyod kyang sems can dga' tsam la'ang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs
97a2(1): pa'i sku re re la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongasu bkod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi sems can gcig gi lus kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod
97a3(1): du med pa'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed tsam du che ba de lta bur gyur la/ sems can gcig gi lus kyi tshad ji tsam pa de tsam gyi lus sems can thams cad kyang gyur la/ sems can de
97a4(1): dag re re'i gzugs kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi ljing kyi tsam yod pa de tsam du gyur te/ sems can gcig ji ra lci ba bzhin du sems can thams cad re
97a5(1): khyed kyang de tsam du gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag sor gyi bu mo gcig la/ phyi ma'i mtha'i bskul pa'i mur thug par bsdams te/ phyag
97a6(1): gyi phyi mo gcig gis ji ltar bsdams pa de bzhin du/ phyag sor thams cad kyi rtse mo la'ang de tsam re re'i bsdams kyang / de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la sku mnyel ba
97a7(1): thugs drab par pa'i gyur te/ thugs skyed pa'i cha shas shin tu phra ba gcig cam du sdug bsngal gyi mo bde bskye ba ma 'i gyur ro// de bzhin du 'jig chen gyi 'ams la 'jug
97b1(1): da mkha'i dbyings kyi 'jug pa dang / phyogs kyi dra ba'i rnam pa la 'jug pa re re dang / de lta bu la 'jug pa na mkha'i khams ma lus pa'i dbyings kyigs pa
97b2(1): chos kyi dbyings kyi mtha' gtugs pa/ skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas kyis gzhal ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams la 'jug pa thams cad re re zhing / yang skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas kyi gzhas
97b3(1): na mkha'i dbyings kyis kun tu khyab pa/ thams cad ma lus pa'i skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas kyi tshad kyis na mkha'i dbyings la 'jug pa thams cad du zhugs te/ de bzhin
97b4(1): gshegs pa'i spyod lam 'di'i tshul dang / kyil mo krung gcig du bzhugs pa'i spyod pas sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal pa zang bar mdzad de/ 
97b5(1): skal pa 'da' ba mdzad cing / bskal pa la rab tu 'jug ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu bo che chen po'i stobs sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rgyal
97b6(1): mtshan gyi chos bzhi pa'o// gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sku gcig la dbu sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed byi bo rla ba ste/ 
97b7(1): dbu re re la'ang lpags sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba steng byiran gyis brlabs nas/ de dag rere kyang dbyangs kyi yan la gdang sa
99a1(1): / pa/ skra'i rtse ma'i cha shas kyis gzhal ba ma lus pa thams cad du chags pa med par rnam par dbye bas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang
99a2(1): brjod du med pa'i snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa de snyed du thugs kyi skad gcig re re la phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal par sprul pa mdzad cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i/ 
99a3(1): sku thams cad las/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku re re la 'ang de snyed de snyed kyi dbu mnga' 'a gyur la/ gzhung de bzhin du skya re re la'ang de snyed de snyed kyi ljags mnga' bar gyur te/ 
99a4(1): ljags re re las kyang de snyed de snyed kyi dbyangs kyi yan lag dang sgra skad kyi gsung chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa'i sems can gyi khams thams cad go bar mdzad pa byung la/ 
99a5(1): dbyings kyi yan lag dang / sgra skad gsungs de dag re res kyang de snyed dri snyed kyi mdo sde bshad par gyur la mdo sde de dag re re la yang de snyed de snyed kyi chos bstan pa rab tu
99a6(1): gzhol ba mdzad do// chos bsten pa de dag re re las kyang snyed de snyed kyi chos kyi tshig dang // yi shes brjod par med par 'gyur la/ chos kyi tshig dang / yi ge de/ 
99a7(1): dag re res kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dbyangs kyis rgyas bkang ste/ sems can gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad go bar mdzad kyang / de bzhin gshes
99b1(1): pa'i dbyangs la dub par mnga' ste/ nyams de mi 'gyural tho bA mi mnga' zhing mnga' bA ma 'gyur te/ de lta bu'i chos kyi 'khor lo sbyor yang / bskal pa
99b2(1): ma'i mur thug pa'i bar du rgyun chad par mi 'gyur te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu bo che chen po'i stobs sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi chos lta ba'o// 
99b3(1): gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs dpal khri'us brgyan pa/ rdo rje chen pa lta bur shin du bstan pas grub par mnga' bang gi ste/ de dag byang chub kyi shing drung
99b4(1): du byon na bdud sdig tocan gyis sems can thams cad srid kyi bdud kyi sde gzugs sna tshogs can shin tu sdug pa/ 'jigs 'jigs ltar 'dug pa/ rab tu snang ba'i brdzu
99b5(1): can/ 'jig rten thams cad shin du 'jigs pa'i gzugs can/ rab tu skye g.ya' rab tu skyed pa'i gzugs can/ bdud shin tu mi sngags pa'i gzugs 'chang ba/ rab
99b6(1): mchog por 'jigs pa chen po skyed pa/ 'gro ba thams cad gsod pa/ 'jig rten thams cad phung bar byed pa de lta bu sha stag gis byang chub kyi shing drung dang / chos kyi dbying
99b7(1): thams cad dang / na mkha'i dbyings kyi mthar thug par gang bar gzigs kyang / byang chub kyi shing drung na bzhugs de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyengs pa mi mnga'o// 
100a1(1): bag tsha ba mi mnga'o// ba spu gcig kyang g.yo ba med do// thugs kyir shas shin du phra ba 'ga' tsam gyis kyang de ltar rnam pa the dad pi
100a2(1): gzugs la mtshan ma rnam pa tha dad pa'i 'dzin pa mi mnga' ste/ shin du bstan no// g.yo ba med do// mi sgul to// 'gyur ba med do// rnam pa rtogs pa med do// 
100a3(1): ni du na'o// bsnyengs pa dang / bag tsha ba thams cad shin tu bral lo// sdug pa dang khong khro ba shin du spangs so// sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa rgyud ma'i chad do// byams pa
100a4(1): chen pa'i stobs dang ldan pa'o// thugs rje chen po'i gnas kyis dbang po shin du dben pa'o// bag tshab ma mnga' ba'i thugs dang ldan pa'o// thugs shin tu bstan zhing ma
100a5(1): ma ming 'o// tshul zil gyis mi gnon la// phal zil gyis gnon pa'i thugs dang ldan pa ste/ bdud thams cad dang bdud kyi rjes su gtogs pa'i lha thams cad dang / 
100a6(1): bdud kyi sde thams cad shin tu zil gyis gnon to// shin tu bkong ngo // de ltar zil gyis mnan ste spa kong ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la skyabs tshol lo// de dag la
100a7(1): 'jobacom ldan 'das de dge tshe 'phrul chen pa gsum gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'dul mdzad pa nye bar smrab ste// blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las byir mi
100b1(1): ldog par 'gyur ro// 'di ni sangs rgyas rnams bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu ba che chen po'i stobs sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi chos drug pa'o// gzhan yang
100b2(1): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gsung thogs pa med pa ni// 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa de dang de dag thams cad du seMs can rnams 'dul ba'i don gyis rnam par
100b3(1): dmigs par kun tu khyab par 'byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung de ni ri rnams la thogs pa med do// ri rib la thogs pa med do// rin po che'i ri la thogs pa mad
100b4(1): khor yug dang khor g.yug chen po la thogs pa med do// lha'i khyim la thogs pa med do// klu'i khyim la thogs pa med do// gnod sbyir khyim la thogs pa med do// 
100b5(1): dri za'i khyim la thogs pa med do// lham yin gyi khyim la thogs pa med do// na mkha'i lding gi khyim la thogs pa med do// ma 'am ci'i khyim la thogs pa med do// 
100b6(1): ljo phye chen po'i khyim la thogs pa med do// mi 'am mi ma yin pa'i khyim la thogs pa med do// lag te brgyal 'jig rten gyi khams cad na yod pa'i sgra chen po 'jig rten
100b7(1): gyis khams tha dad pa'i sgras/ 'jig rten gyi khams tham cad gang ste/ ca co 'dre bar gyur kyang / de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i gsung ni 'dul ba'i ses
101a1(1): gcan rnams kyi rna ba'i rnam par dmigs pa la bsgribs pa med pa yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung 'ba' shig de dag girna ba'i rnam
101a2(1): par dmigs pa la lhang de lham me lha ne ste/ go bar mdzad pa'i tshig dang ye shes rnams kyang rlag ma 'gyur ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu bo che chen
101a3(1): pa'i stobs sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi chos bdun pa'o// gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs ni chags pa mi mnga' ba ste// bskal pa
101a4(1): byed khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par yongs su sbyangs pa'o// 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad rgyan gci/ 
101a5(1): du 'gyur ba'o// rnyog pa med cing rnam par dang ste/ shin du gsal ba'o// bdag gi zhes bya ba mi mnga'o// chos thams cad la mi gnas pa'o// rang na gnas pa ma yin
101a6(1): pa'o// phyi rol na gnas pa ma yin pa'o// bskyes pa'o// dmigs pa thams cad kyis dben pa'o// zhi zhing gnas med pa'o// rtsom pa med pa'o// 'du shes
101a7(1): tshogs thams cad la migs pa'o// dbang pa'i rnam par rdzogs pa thams cad 'gagra pa'o// rang bzhin gyis 'ad dang ning gsal ba'o// yongs su das pa'o/ 
101b1(1): dmigs pa dang yi la b+ha ba thams cad dang ba 'dres pa'o// chos thams cad can mongs pa med pa'i yul dang ldan pa'o// yang dag pa'i mtha' 'dang chags dang thal pa
101b2(1): dag pa'o// chos kyi dbyings shin du bstan pa'i mthar thug pa'o// chos kyi dbyings kun nas mi zad pa dang ldan pa'o// 'du shes kyis dam pa thams cad kyi tshad dang tshang
101b3(1): med pa dang bral ba'o// 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi brjod pa thams cad lags pa'o// tshig gi lam kyis brjod du med pa'i mthar thug pa'i yul lo// mi zang
101b4(1): pa dang chags pa med pa'i byings kyi mthar thug pa'i// ye shes sngon du 'gro ba'o// stobs bcu'i rgyan du 'gyur ba'o// chos thams cad kyis rnam par dag pa'o// 
101b5(1): thabs mkhas pa 'byung ba'o// chos du ma dang / chos thams cad shin du bstan pa dang mi 'gal ba'o// dus gsum du tha dad pa med pa'o// chos kyi dbyings thams
101b6(1): cad du chos bzhi med pa thams cad kyi mnga' ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa brnyed pa'o// chos thams cad la mnga' ba'i 'byung gnas dang mdzod du gyur pa'o// chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho
101b7(1): thams cad la dgongs pa khyad spongs pa med pa'o// zhing gi rgyud du gtogs pa thams cad dang phyogs kyi dra ba dang rgyud 'byabs klas pa ma lus pa thams cad la mi gnas
102a1(1): pa/ bstan zhing mi g.yol nyams pa med pa'i ye shes kyi rab tu gzigs pa/ chos ma lus pa thams cad kyi mthar thug pa/ zag
102a2(1): pa thams cad yongasu zad pa/ thugs rnam par grol zhing zag pa mi mnga' ba dang / shes rab rnam par grol ba shin tu rnam par grol ba/ yang dag pa'i mtha' ma
102a3(1): zad pa'i klas pa/ chags pa med par spyod pa/ rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa/ dus gsum thams cad du bsgribs pa med par 'byung ba/ sems can thams ca
102a4(1): kyi dus gsum gyi sems dang spyod pa thams cad ma lus par thugs skad cig gis rab tu mkhyen pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu che chen po'i
102a5(1): stobs sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa rgyal mtshan gyi chos brgyad pa'o// gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi sku ni sku mnga' ba ste/ rang bzhin gcig tu
102a6(1): gyur pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul tshad med pa'i sku'o// mtha' dang dbus med par yongasu grub pa'i sku'i// 'jig rten thams cad kyis zad par mi nus pa'i sgra'o/ 
102a7(1): khams mamam pas shes pa med pa'i su'o// gan pa'i sus rnam par dgags pa'o// gag pa'i bas pa pa dang rdzas sa drang pa'i bye gyi rlangs kyis sku'i ji
102b1(1): yang dag par smon pa'o// bden pa med pa dang / brdzun pa med pa sku mnyam pa nyid kyis yong su dag pa'o// chos kyi su bzhud pa dang byon pa med pa'i sgra'o// 'dus pa byas
102b2(1): pas 'jig pa med pa'i sku'o// mtshan nyid med pa'i mtshan nyid gcig pa'i chos kyi sku'i rang bzhin no// yul na mi gnas pa dang / phyogs na mi gnas pa'i sku'o// ma lu/ 
102b3(1): kyi sku'o// sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu byung ba dang / rnam par 'phrul po mtha' yas pa'i sku'i rang bzhin no// migayo ma grongs pa'i sgra rnam par dge pa'o// yong
102b4(1): pa yong ma yin med pa yang ma yin pa'i tshul dang tshul ma yin par rab tu brjod pa'i skye'o// sems can gyi mos pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul ba 'gyur ba'i sgra'o// 'gags
102b5(1): pa yang ma ni ma 'gags pa yang ma yin pas 'dul ba ston pa'i sku'o// yon tan rin po che thams cad yang dag par 'byung bas shin du 'phags pa'i sku'o// chos thams
102b6(1): cad sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi de bzhin nyid du yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i sku'o// rang bzhin gyis rab tu zhi zhing bsgribs pa med pa'i mthar thug pa'i sku'o// thogs pa mnga' ba
102b7(1): chos thams cad thugs su chud pa'i sku'o// thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i chos kyi dbyings kyis rnam par dag cing // 'jig rten gyi thams cad du shin tu rnam par phye ba'i sku
103a1(1): phyir mi ldog cing bsgribs pa mi minga' la/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pas ye shes thas cad kyi rjes su 'brang zhing yang dag par gzhol bas
103a2(1): thugs chud pa'i sku ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni kyi mthu bo che chen po'i stobs sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi chos dgu pa'o// gzhan yang sangs rgyu
103a3(1): bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes mnyam pa med pa dang mnyam pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis thugasu chud pa s+ho// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad kyis byung ba'o// 
103a4(1): mngon par 'grub pa'i spyod pa khyad par du 'phags pa'i smon lam dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas rnam par dag pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad kyis
103a5(1): su rdzogs par byas pa'o// tha dad pa med pa'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad kyis byung ba'o// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa brgya mtsho'i
103a6(1): spyod tshul thams cad thugs su chud pa'o// smon lam dang spyod pa chen pos yongs dag pa'o// spyod pa thams cad mi dmigs pa'ang yongasu rdzogs par byas pa'o// 
103a7(1): spyod pa'i stobs la thub pa dka' ba'i spyod pa thams cad kyis mngon par byung ba'o// spyod pa thams cad kyis rnam par dag pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa legs por spyad
103b1(1): bsar+b+ba dadama' ba med do// sangs rgyas thams cad kyis tshad med par spyad pa'o// ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyis spyod yul mtha' yas pa'o// lam thams cad kyis rab tu/ 
103b2(1): brjod ma yin pa'o// lam gyi yul med pa'o// lam thams cad la rab tu zhugs pa'o// ye shes dam pa'i stobs kyi tshul mkhyen pa'o// bag tsha ba mi mnga' bas rma
103b3(1): kyi char 'bebs pa'i 'khor lo dang ldan pa'o// dge ba dris pa dang / ma dris pa rjes su mthun pa'i chos kyi tshul ston pa mkhyen pa'o// mnyan pa med dang / mnyam pas shin
103b4(1): tu dag pa'o// sku dang gsung gi yan lag dag par spyod pa rnams la 'dzin las gsum yongs su dag pa dang sangs rgyas kyi bsgoms pas brnyes pa'o// sangs rgyas kyis
103b5(1): par spyod pas brnyengs pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad bskyed pa'i don du sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis mdzad pa thams cad rab tu byung ba'o// thams cad mkhye
103b6(1): pa'i gnas kyi bstan pa tshad med pa'i gnas kyi rtsa ba med pa dang ldan pa'o// mngon par shes pa'i ye shes thams cad kyis mthar thug par mi 'gyur ba'o// 'jig rten gyi sem
103b7(1): kyis sbya pa ches pa thams cad kyi ba sam gyis ma che dzim// tshas thams cad 'a lus pa ma rgyan ci gzugs pas sems na thams cad yongs su kyib pa
104a1(1): dus gsum yangs pas thams cad kyi tshul shin tu 'phra ba mtha' dang dbus med pa ma lus par mkhyen pa'o// 'jig rten la
104a2(1): 'das pa'i don mkhyen pa'i phyir/ phra ba'i ye shes thugs su chud pas 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus thams cad rnam par dag pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i ye shes kyis/ 
104a3(1): sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las brjod du med pa 'jig rten thams cad du sbyor ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi sku bgrangs pa cung thugs su chud pa'i ye shes kyis yi ge med pa'i tshe
104a4(1): thugs su chud pa'o// yi ge med pa'i sna tshogs rnam par phye ba dang / yi ge thams cad smos shing brjod pa mkhyen pas brjod du med pa thugs chud pa'o// kunatu/ 
104a5(1): bzang po'i ye shes kyis dge ba'i chos spyad pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'o// dam bcas pa'i tshul bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi lus dang skye mched ji lta bar
104a6(1): thugs skad gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyi chos thams cad khong du chud par ston pa mkhyen pa'o// thams cad kyi don du chos yongasu btang zhing rim gror bya bas
104a7(1): thugs su chud pa'o// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par yul du byur ba'o// chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad yul du gyur ba'o// dus gas
104b1(1): thams cad la thugs skad cig gis chags pa med par mkhyen cing thugs su chud pa'i yul dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas byung ba ma
104b2(1): lus par yul du 'gyur ba'o// 'jig pa med par 'dul ba thams cad yul du gyur pa'o// 'jig pa med par 'dul ba thams cad yul du gyur pa'i/ 
104b3(1): thams cad kyi rjesu song zhing rnam par dag pa'i yul thams cad mngon par sangs rgyas pa'o// sa mtshams med cing thug pa med pa'i mngon par shes pa rnam par
104b4(1): sangs rgyas pa'o// sems can thams cad kyi sems dang / yang dang rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa dus gsum du brjod pa ma lus pa thams cad thug sung gcig gi
104b5(1): mkhyen cing thugs su chud pa'o// sems can gyi rnam pa thams cad las mtshams ma bcad pa'o// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rnam pa thams cad la mu med pa'o// 
104b6(1): dus gsum rnam pa thams cad la mtha' yas pa'o// sangs rgyas kyis khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba'i rnam pa thams cad la tshad med pa'o// shes bya'i rnam pa tham
104b7(1): pad la lhag ma ma lus pa ste/ de dag thams cad lhag ma med par mngon par sangs rgyas pas sangs rgyas kyis ye shes sangs rgyas kyi rdzun 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul
105a1(1): pas 'byung ba thams cad thugasu chud pa dang // mkhyen pa thams cad rgyun mchad pa med pa ste/ de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
105a2(1): sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba'i sgras mtha' dang dbus med par spyod pa yin/ chags pa med pa'i thugs kyis spyod pa mtha' dang dbus med par spyod pa yin/ thugs
105a3(1): rje chen po'i sbyor bas dus thams cad du rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par chos bstan pa la spyod pas/ mtha' dang dbus med par spyod pa yin te/ 'dis ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan
105a4(1): 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu bo che chen po'i stobs sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi chos bcu pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
105a5(1): rnams kyi mthu bo che chen po'i stobs sa sa rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi chos namra te// 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sems can thams cad dang / nyan thos dang / 
105a6(1): rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsam gyis ma khyab cing dpag tu med pa'i de dag go// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thogs pa re mi
105a7(1): mnga' ba rnams te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dga' ldan gyi srid par bzhugs nas 'pho ba la grags pa mi ming // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
105b1(1): rnams ni thub bcas bltam pa bstan pa la thogs pam med 'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'as rnams na mngon par 'byung bar dgyes pa'i thugs kyis mngon par byung ba la tshu
105b2(1): pa mi mnga'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni byang chub kyi shing drung du bzhugs nas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon par 'tshang rgya ba la thogs pa mi mang
105b3(1): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs skad cig gis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon par sangs rgyas nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshes
105b4(1): pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad yongasu bstan pa thogs pa ma ming 'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dus bzhin du 'dul ba rnams la chos kyi 'khor lo// 
105b5(1): bskor ba la thogs pa mi mnga'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ji ltar bskyed pa'i tshul bzhin du dus la bab par bshad cing lung bstan pa
105b6(1): la thogs pa mi mnga'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dus la bab pa'i tshul bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi com ldan 'das phrin las mdzad pa la thogs pa ra
105b7(1): yang 'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni byang chub sems dpal yongasu grub pa rnams lung bstan pa la thogs pa mi ma 'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan lnga
106a1(1): rnams ni skad cig gag du sems can thams cad kyi dri ba yongasu dris pa skad cig gcig gis lung bstan pa la thogs pa mi mnga' ste/ 
106a2(1): skye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thogs pa mi mnga' ba'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
106a3(1): rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ma thag tu myur du 'byung ba'i chos rnams te/ bcu gang zhen sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthong ma thag tu sems can rnams myur
106a4(1): bA ngan song dang bral bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthong ma thag tu sems myur du bsod nams yongs rdzogs pa thob par 'gyur ro// sangs rgya
106a5(1): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthong ma thag tu sems can rnams myur du dge ba'i rtsa ba la yongasu smin par 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthong ma thag tu sems ca
106a6(1): rnams myur du mthongs su skye ba yongasu dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthong ma thag tu sems can rnams myur du yid la gnyis dang ne ma nur yang
106a7(1): dag par bsngal ba thob par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mim thong ma thag tu sems can rnams myur tu byang chub kyi sems bskyed nas phyir ma ldog pa thob pa
106b1(1): 'gyur te/ sems can thos pa yangs su pa dang ldan pa sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba las/ byang chub sems bskyed pa'i rnams kyang blar med pa yang dag par rdzogs
106b2(1): byang chub tu sems bskyed do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthong ma thag tu skyon med par ma 'das pa dmigs pa'i lta ba can gyi sems can rnams myur du ston
106b3(1): med pa 'da' ba'i rgyu rab tu 'dzin to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthong ma thag tu sems can rnams myur du 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
106b4(1): dbang po rnam par dge bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthong ma thag tu sems can rnams myur du bsgribs pa thams cad byed ba thob par 'gyur ro// 
106b5(1): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthong ma thag tu sems can rnams myur du snang ba 'thob cing ma 'jigs pa zhum pa med pa'i spos pa rab tu rlom ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras
106b6(1): bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ma thag tu myur du 'byung ba'i chos rnams so// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs
106b7(1): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rjes su dran pa rnam par dag pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sngon gyi sbyor bas kyang byang chub sems dpa' rnams
107a1(1): kyis rjes su dran par bya ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni spyod pa rnam par dag paste kyang byang chub sems rnams kyis rjes su
107a2(1): dran bya ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni pha rol tu phyin yong su rdzogs pas kyang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rjes su dran par bya ba yin// sangs rgyas bcom
107a3(1): ldan 'das rnams ni smon lam chen po yongasu rdzogs pas kyang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang rjes su dran par bya ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yang dag par
107a4(1): sbubs pas kyang byang chub sems dpa' rnabs kyis rjes su dran par bya ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sngon gyis mthar sangs rgyas kyi tshangs par spyad pa la spyod/ 
107a5(1): kyang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rjes su dran par bya ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mngon par 'chang rgya ba'i sgos kyang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
107a6(1): rjes su dran par bya ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gzugs kyi sku tshad med mu med pas kyang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rjes su dran par bya ba yin/ 
107a7(1): sangasargyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi yul gyis rnam 'phrul pa chang med mu med pas kyang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rjes su dran par za ba yi
107b1(1): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pas kyang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rje su dran par bya ba yin te// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag
107b2(1): ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rjes su dran par byarnam par dag pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i
107b3(1): kyi rnam par spyod pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings thams cad dang dus gsum gyi sems can thams cad kyi sems na tshogs sems du ma dang spyod pa dang / g.yo hrI
107b4(1): rgyud thams cad ma lus par thugs cig gis thug su chud pa dang / dus gsum gyi sems can thams cad kyi las dang las kun nas klas pa na tshogs tshe mtsho dga'adam pa tha dad pas
107b5(1): mngon par 'gro zhing nye bar sogs pa mang nyung dang / rnam smin pa tha dad pa ma lus par thugs gcig gis thugs chud pa dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi sems can gyi ris sna
107b6(1): tshogs dang sems can gyi ris du ma'i sems can ma lus pa thams cad 'dul ba'i dus ci lta bzhin du yongasu bstan pa'i phyi 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / 
107b7(1): rdzu 'phrul gyi chos 'phrul gyis byin gyi rlabs yang dag par bstan pa ma lus par thug su chud pa dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad dang / phyogs kyi dra ba'i rgyud thams cad
108a1(1): dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud thams cad kyi sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi mtshan ma bzung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa dang / 
108a2(1): skye ba dang rnam par dbye ba ma lus par thugs su chud pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khas thams cad kyi sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba dang / mos pa ji lta ba dang / 'dul
108a3(1): badza lta bzhin du rnam pa tha dad pa tshad med par skad cig tu sangs rgyas bstan pa dang / rnam par dmigri pa bya ba dang / byin gyi brlab pa ma lus par thugs su chud pa dang / 
108a4(1): 'jig rten gyis khams thams cad kyi sems can pha rol gyi bsam pa la sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs yang dag par bstan ma lus par thugs su chung pa dang / chos kyi dbyi
108a5(1): thams cad kyi sems can rnams 'dul ba ji lta ba bzhin du nye bar len pa med pa'i sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur bar gdams ngag dang rjesu bstan pa de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba bstan
108a6(1): pa ma lus par thugs chung ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi sems can thams cad kyi thams cad du 'gro ba dang / de dang der 'gro ba'i lam ma lus par thugs kyi skad
108a7(1): cig gcig gis thugs chud pa dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi sems can rnams kyi sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa phyogs thams cad du btang ba'i tshul ma lus par thugs
108b1(1): kyi skad cig gcig gis thugasu chud pa dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi sems can rnams kyi mos pa dang / sems kyi tshad ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi sku kha dog med
108b2(1): pa dbyings mtha' yas pa bstan pa 'am lus par thugs kyis skad cig gcig gis thugs su chud pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni de bzhin gshegs po dgra bcom
108b3(1): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam par spyod pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
108b4(1): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan
108b5(1): 'das rnams ni thams cad la rtag tu mnyam par bzhag kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi seMs can rnams la'ang skad cig gcig du chos ston par mdzad do// sangs
108b6(1): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams na chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams kyi sems can thams cad la mnyam par bzhag kyang / skad cig gcig gis sems can gyis khams sA
108b7(1): tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa rnams kyang / bdag med pa'i mtha' la gnas par yongasu bston to// sangs bcom ldan 'das rnams na chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi
110a1(1): rnams kyi rnam par thar pa rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na/ rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la sangs rgyas skye ba brjod du med pa'i yang brjod med pa'i
110a2(1): yongasu bstan pa'i rnam par thar pa dang / rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la chos kyi 'khor lo brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa bskor ba yongs bstan pa'i rnam par thar pa dod/ 
110a3(1): rdul shin du phra ba gcig la sems can yong su smin par bya ba dang / brdul ba brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa yongasu bstan pa'i/ rnam par thar pa dang / rdul shin
110a4(1): tu phra ba cig la zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i yongasu bstan pa'i rnam par thar pa dang / rdul shin tu phra ba cig la 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung / 
110a5(1): ba'i sangs rgyas skye ba thams cad yongasu bstan pa'i rnam par thar pa dang / rdul shin du phra ba gcig la 'das pa dang / ma b+h+yon dang / da ltar byung ba'i zhing brtid yongs
110a6(1): bstan pa rnam par thar pa dang / rdul shin du za ba gcig la 'das pa dang / mi byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul ring rnam
