248a5(1): s+yAr+yA bar gyur na/ nub blugs pa tho bar gyur to// du baphyogs das bar 'gyur na// gar phyogs mtha bar myur to//  b+h+yogs dam 'a gyur d+ha / rlung rgyas
248a6(1): mtho bor gyur te// khyod phyogs dasa' bar gyun/  phyogs mtho bar gyu // dbus dpa' bar 'gyur ro// mtha mtho bar gyur to// mtha' dpa' bar lus
248b1(1): dbus mdzu bar gyur to// de la ga shebs pa'i mthus b+ha rdzas lus 'das pa mchog gi sbyin pa / na bapa'i sprin dang 'drugs kyi b+h+yor dang / rgyal ya sbyin
248b2(1): bdun gyi sprin gyi cher mngon par bab po// lha rjesA las 'das pa'i spos kyi spyin gyi char mngon par bab po// lha rdzas las las pa'i phreng ba dang / byug pa'i sprin gyi
248b3(1): mngon par ba bya po// lha rdzas las 'das pa'i rgyan dang / lte ba lhub kyi sprin char mngon par bab bo// l+yAdz+dza sA las 'das pa'i nor bu rin po 'i 'od chen po dang ldan ni
248b4(1): sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo// lhardzas las 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i legs so// zhes brjod pa'i sprin gyi char bangon par 'ba'o// swa rjes las 'das
248b5(1): pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus brjod du med pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo// 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyi ma khyab par yong su dag par mngon par 'tshang rgya ban
248b6(1): spyan gyi char mngon par zab bo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung chos dbyings mtha' dad dbus med brgyas bang 'gengs pa'i sprin gyi che mngon par baba'o// gling ni
248b7(1): 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub thugs chung ba'i chos dbyings kyi byin gyi rlabs bkyis byang chub sems dpa' dga' bar gyur pa de bzhin du/ 
249a1(1): 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du'ang phyogs bcu rgyas pa thams cad rab tu dga' bar gyur to// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi
249a2(1): khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa brgyad bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol dganas kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi
249a3(1): zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa brgyad cu rdul shin tu phra bA mtshan kun tu bzang por mthun pa sha stag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la
249a4(1): zhal mngon par bstan te/ 'di skad ces gsungs// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshal mang pos sangs rgyas kyi zhing
249a5(1): byin gyi rlabs dang / chos nyid rjesu bstag pas bstan pa legs so lagaso// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod
249a6(1): med pa brgyad cu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed thams cad kyang mtshan 'thun pa sha stag/ chos bstan pa 'di la legs par rjod pa mdzad do// nged kyis kyang de skad du brjod
249a7(1): pa yinan// de kyis ji srid du brjod pa de bzhin dus ngas rgyas thams cad kyis kyang brjod do// chos bstan pa 'di shin tu bstan pa ma/ byang chub sems dpa
249b1(1): sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya phrag stong gi rdul shin tu phru ba snyed kyis// byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad mngon par shes pa rab tu thob par gyur te/ des
249b2(1): kyang nged kyis thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu tsho gcig gis thogs par lung snyan to// sems can sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya phrag stong gi rdul
249b3(1): shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de dag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus bskal pa sangs rgyu
249b4(1): kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi yul phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
249b5(1): pa'i sangs rgyas dag tu 'gyur nged kyis lung bstan to// chos bstan pa 'di yang ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ma thos pa bya ba'i phyir nged kyis brla bya
249b6(1): so// gling bzhi po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di sems can rnams kyis ji ltar shes par gyur cing dul bar de bzhin du/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig
249b7(1): brgya stong tshad med pa/ grangs med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ mtha' yas pa/ mu med pa/ sa mtshams med pa/ dpag tu med pa
250a1(1): @brjod du med pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ namakha'i dbyings kyis mthas gtugs pa/ thams cadam lus pa dag tu yang
250a2(1): sems can rnams rnam par dul bar gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi mthu' dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi byin
250a3(1): brlabs dang / chos nyid rab tu thob pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa mthu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes nyams pa med pa las mi 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi
250a4(1): 'thob pa las gzhan du mi 'gyur ba dang / dus la ji ltar bab pa bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par bskul ba dang / sdod mngon par sgru zla pa chung ma zos pa dang / 
250a5(1): byang chub sems dpa'i kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang / mthu shin tu yengs pa dang / thams cad ye shes kyi mang 'i sbyar ba yang dag par bstan pa'i mthus/ phyogs
250a6(1): bcu'o 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya srong brjod du med pa drug bcu'i rdul shis rtsu ba srid kyi pha rol tu nas/ byang chub sems dpa
250a7(1): sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed/ phyogs bcu chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs shing / byang chub se
250b1(1): dnga'i rgyan chen po rab tu bstan pa dang / 'od gzer gyi dra ba chen po rab tu dkye ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab tu gzhig pa dang / ngan song gi yul thams
250b2(1): rab tu zhi bar bya dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba nyid rab tu brjod dang / cho yang dag par 'gro ba rnam pa tha dad pa tshad med pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i legs pa brjod pa
250b3(1): dang / rnam pa thams cad du chos kyi chur tshad med pa dbab pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par dbab po dang / lus rnams pa tha dad pa tshad pa rab tu bstan pa dang / de bzhin
250b4(1): gshegs pa'i thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin chen po rang rang gi rgyud kyi snod tshad med pas yang dag par bzug med cing 'ongs par gyur to// de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi byin kyi
250b5(1): kyi brlabs kyis 'di skad du rjod de/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid mi 'phrogs shing bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di brjod pa legs so// 
250b6(1): legs so// kye rgyal ba'i sras bdag cag kyang thams cad kun tu bzang po zhes bya bar ming mthun pa sha stag ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan kun tu grags
250b7(1): pa'i dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya ba dag drung nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi ming kun tu snang ba'i 'od ces bya ba dag nas 'dir phyin te/ thams cad du yang sangs rgyas
251a1(1): @kyi mthus dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid rab tu thob pas/ chos bstan pa 'di nyid byung bar gyur to// kye rgyal ba'i smras
251a2(1): de ltar bdag cag kyang dag du gyur pa shA stag/ sangs rgyas kyi byin rlabs kyis 'khor 'dir phyin te/ ji ltar bdag cag 'khor 'dir phyin pa de bzhin du/ phyogs bcu
251a3(1): 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ na mkha'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa cang du 'dra de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang mthus/ 
251a4(1): byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed phyin par gyur te/ thams cad na yang de bzhin
251a5(1): gshegs pa'i mnga' mi phrogs pa chos nyid tshig 'di dag nyid dang / yi ge 'di dag nyid dang / nges pa'i tshig mngon par bsgrubs pa 'di nyid kyis don 'di nyid kyis don 'di
251a6(1): nyid brjod de/ lhag chad med par rjod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad la rnam par smras
251a7(1): nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs brjod cing / sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid smos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid mi 'bogs pa yongasu brjod pa dang / sngon
251b1(1): gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba tshad med cing yangs pa don yod par brjod pa dang / rnam pa mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas skye ba smos pa/ sems can ma lus pa thams cad
251b2(1): sems can gyi bsam pa rab tu brtag pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad la dus la ji ltar 'bab pa bzhin du/ chos bstan pa rnam par dgod pa yongasu mi gtang ba dang / 
251b3(1): byang chub sem dpa' thams cad kyi chos snang ba mtha' cad dang dbus med pa yang dag par bskyed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa dang / byin kye rlabs rnams par dgod pa
251b4(1): chen po rab tu bstan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang rang bzhin gcig lus ma'i khrugs par bye ba byed cing / sngon gyi spyod pa'i stobs dang / shugs kyis
251b5(1): mngon par sgrubs te/ rang gi rgyud kyi mthus yang dag par blangs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byin gyi rlabs kyis de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// ngape rnams ji snyed 'jig
251b6(1): rten kun na gang yod pa// de dag thams cad sangs rgyas spyod lam 'di dang thul// 'on kyang 'grol ban phyir sems can bstan pa'i phyir// dpe med rnams la don gyi tshul
251b7(1): gyis dpe yang blangs// bde gshegs pa gsang ba 'di dag thams pa dmas ma thos// bskal pa brgya phrag stong du de'i sgra dkon no// gang rnams brtson 'grus blo ldan shin tu dul
252a1(1): gyur pa// de dre'i skyes bus sangs rgyas gsang ba 'di 'dra thos// gang gis 'di thos gyur nas rab tu dga' 'gyur
252a2(1): ba/ des ni sngon thams cad sangs rgyas brgya stong bkur cing mchod// bde gshegs rnams kyis byin brlabs rgyal bas yongs su bzung // lha dang mis bsto
252a3(1): mkhas pa rnams kyis rim gro bya ba yin// 'di ni bde gshegs 'jig rten 'das pa kun gyi dkos// rgyal ba sems can sgrol ba kun kyang 'di las byung // 
252a4(1): 'di ni drikar bya'i sam mnga' yas rigs// de phyir bag yod kyis te 'di ni bzung bar gyis// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa
252a5(1): rgyas kyis mngon par gnang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs
252a6(1): byung ba'i dpal yid dga' ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag thams cad dang / lha dang mi dang / lha ma dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / 
252a7(1): gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / ba byin dang/ tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi mgon po dade/ gtsa ma'i gnas kyi gakho du bcas pa thams cad byang chub sems
252b1(1): dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos bshad pa la mngon par dka'o// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas phag po che zhes bya ba las// de bzhin
252b2(1): gshegs pa skye ba 'byung ba bsten pa'i li'u ste/ bzhi bcu gsum pa'o// // shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mido// sangs rgyas phal zhes bya ba las/ 
252b3(1): dam po bdun cu rtsa lnga // / bcom ldan 'das shin tu rnams par sangs rgyas pa'i thus mnga' ba mi gnyis pa la yang dag par spyod pa/ mtshan nyid med
252b4(1): pa'i chos la rab tu rten pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang menyam pa nyid brnyes pa/ bsgribs pa med par thugs su chud par rtogs pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i chos dang ldan
252b5(1): pa/ spyod yul la 'phrogs pa med pa dus gsum rnam par dgod pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mnyam pa nyid du byung ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams thems cang ngu shin tu
252b6(1): khyab pa'i sku mnga' ba/ chos thams cad la the tsom mi mnga' ba'i ye shes can spyod pa thams cad spyod pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i thugs mnga' ba/ chos kyi ye shes
252b7(1): la nem nur mo mnga' ba/ rnam par ma brtags pa'i sku dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis yang dag par gnod pa'i ye shes can/ sangs rgyas kyi
253a1(1): spyod pa ma gnyis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog nas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par thar pa tha med pa'i ye shes kyi mthu r+ya
253a2(1): paHsangs rgyas mings mtha' dang dadrung rid pa'i mnyam pa cingad thug su chung ba/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ rnamapa'i dbyings kyis mdzes btugs pa/ sa 'angs rgyas kyi
253a3(1): bas rnam par spyad cing yul ma ga d+hA'i chos kyi dgon pa'i snying po byang chub la po zang 'od kun nas byung ba na/ gan seng ge'i khring rje'i snying po can la bzhugs shing / byang chu
253a4(1): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye bakhrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed thams cad kyang / blan med pa yang dag pa
253a5(1): rdzogs pa'i byang chub du tshi gcig gis rdzogs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan nas 'dus pa kun kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi tshul thams
253a6(1): rab thob pashasug s+ho/ 'di ltar sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs smin par bya ba dang / rnam par gdul ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos la btu
253a7(1): gam kyi mas rgyas sas byung khrigs kyi pas pa 'argyas pa / 'dis sa ma
253b1(1): sa dang / spyod yul dang / ye shes lnga dpyod cing rtog pa/ spos pa thams cad yongasu chad pa smod pa nye bar bzung ba/ rgyun mi 'chad pas sems can thams cad yang da/ 
253b2(1): bar bzung ba la mkhas pa/ chos kyi tshul la 'jug par bya ba mtha' dang / dpung med pa rab tu zhugs pa/ sems can thams cad kyi las rnam pa smin pa chung
253b3(1): mi za zhing mi dmigs par brtag cing 'byung ba la shi tu mkhas pa/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang bgra la nyal ba dang / dbang po dang / btsun pa dang / 
253b4(1): sbyor ba mthon dman brtag cing dpyad pa la rab tu mkhas pa/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs
253b5(1): pa'i don dang tshig dang yi ge gzung zhing bcad pa dang / shes rab bya ba dang / mnyam par bzung ba dang / brtag par bya ba la shin tu mkhas pa/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten
253b6(1): las 'das pa'i chos kyi tshul la 'jug par bya ba la mtha' dang dbu med pa la shin tu zhugs pa/ 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / dus rnam pa tha dad pa'i tshul
253b7(1): brtag pa la ba tu mkhas pa 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / daltar byung ba'i di bzhin gshegs pa mthas cad kyi dkyil 'khor skad gcig gcig gis de thag tu
254a1(1): tu 'thob pa la rnam par spyod pa/ sems kyi skad cig re re la mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa yang dag par ston pa/ sems can thams
254a2(1): cad kyi skad cig re re la mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa yang dag par ston pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sems bskyed pa dang / mi 'bral bar byang chub tu rnam par
254a3(1): 'tshang rgya ba/ sems can gcig gi sems kyi dmigs pa la zhugs pas/ sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi sems kyi dmigs pa la mkhas par 'ong du chud pa rang
254a4(1): byung gi ye shes dang / sa mngon tu gyur pa las mi mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang ldan pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa thob kyang rgyur mi 'chad pa'i las phyir mi ldog pa/ 
254a5(1): byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'du bya ba'i mthu rgyun mi 'chad pa/ mngon par 'du med pa'i ye shes kyi tshul la zhags pa/ sems can gcig gi don tu bskal pa mu med pa/ 
254a6(1): spyod pa yongasu 'dzin pa'i byin gyi rlabaso la mkhasde pa/ bskal pa grangs med par 'byung zhing mthong bar dka' ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rin pa che shin tu bzang po rje
254a7(1): kyi 'khor la thogs pasod pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis 'gro ba thams cad dam par 'dul ba'id dbyings la 'dug par mkhas pa/ 'das pa dang / mabyon pa dang / 
254b1(1): ltar byung ba'ide bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par dag pa'i gnas yang dag par gzung ba'i phyir sngon gyi spyod pa'i mthu'i khad par dang / smon lam phun sum tshogs pa dgas/ de dag
254b2(1): dang de ma yin pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yon tan bsngags shing yongasu brjod kyang / bskal pa mu med par mi zad mi thug pa legs pa shin tu brjod pa rab tu thob pa
254b3(1): sha stag ste/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu mig dang / byang chub sems
254b4(1): dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu 'phrul pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu shes rab dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu/ 
254b5(1): ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu gsal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa
254b6(1): sems dpa' chen po kun tu dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu blo dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shugs chen po dang / 
254b7(1): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par 'phrul pa chen pos rab tu mdzes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa brtson 'grus kyis rnam par gnon pa
255a1(1): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par bsgyings pa chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par bsgyings
255a2(1): pa chen po stobs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po glang po che'i dam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po glang po chen po spos kyi glang po
255a3(1): dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zla ba chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zla ba bzang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
255a4(1): dpa' chen po yon tan zla ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin cen zla ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zla ba kun tu snang ba dang / 
255a5(1): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos dri ma med pa'i zla ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par snang ba'i zla ba dang / byang chub sems
255a6(1): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par grags pa'i zla ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od gzer rab tu 'gyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sem
255a7(1): dpa' chen po zla ba yongs rgyas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sos dpa' chen po ngas pa'i
255b1(1): dbang po brug gi dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos grub pa'i sgra'i dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bachos kyi dbyangs
255b2(1): rab tu sgra sgrogs pa'i dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jom pa'i dbyangs dang / byang chub sem
255b3(1): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi rnga sgra'i dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu go bar byed pa'i dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa'
255b4(1): sems dpa' chen pos bzhi rab tu sgrog pa'i dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yan lag thams cad kyi dbyangs kyis zil gyis gnon pa dang / 
255b5(1): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun nas dri ma med pa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan gyi snying po dang / byang chub
255b6(1): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par snang ba'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpal
255b7(1): sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zlo ba'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma
256a1(1): / sing po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' ma ba gca rasnying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa bcu'i song po dang / 
256a2(1): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher po pad+mo'i dpal gyi sring po dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya
256a3(1): stong brjod du med phrag bcu'i rdul phra ba snyed kun kyang / kun du bzang pos spyod pa dang / smon lam du ldan pa/ lhag pa'i bsam pa phur sum tshogs pa sangs rgyas 'byung ba zas
256a4(1): cad kyi drung 'gro zhing gsol ba gdab pa la mkhas pa de bzhi gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul yang dag par 'dzin pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs rgyur mi gcod pa
256a5(1): sangs rgyas 'byung ba cig nas gcig tu lung bstan pa dang / mngon par 'chang rgya ba dang / ming dang / zhing dang / 'khor lo'i tshul yongs su spyod pa/ sangs rgyas mi bzhugs
256a6(1): pa'i 'dis ra gyi khams su sangs rgyas skye ba yongs su son pa/ kun+da ras nan mongs pa'i sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su dag par byung ba/ byang chub tsa/ 
256a7(1): 'ba'i las kyi phreng ba mam pad ba bsil ba chos kyi dbyings bslabs pa ma pal shin zugs pa gag sa dang thabs cwa bzugs/ 
256b1(1): rnanas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rgyan ba kun tu bzang ba'a' na/ sangs rgyas pal po chu sa bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la sems par zhugs sa
256b2(1): byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che ba kun tu bzang pos tIng nge 'dzin rten bsangs rdzas bal pa chazhes pa bde la mnyam par bzhag mthen tra/ 
256b3(1): tshe phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mtha' gtugs pa/ ma lus pa/ thams
256b4(1): cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ g.yos so// rab tu g.yos so// kun tu g.yos so// 'bral to// rab tu 'bul te/ 
256b5(1): kur tu rab tu 'phrul te// ldegs/ rab tu ldag ga/ kun tu ldag go/ che mtshe ma rab tu chem chem/ kun tu tshomachem/ bur 'ur/ rab tu'ur 'ur/ 
256b6(1): kun tu'ur 'ur ro// shig shig/ rab tu shig go/ kun tu shig shig go// de ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa/ ma lus thams cad rab tu bskyod de/ dbyangs
256b7(1): kyis mngon par go bar byas nas/ ting nge 'dzin de las langs par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun shes rab kyis/ byang chub sems
257a1(1): dpya'i rtogs chen pa 'dus par shes nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu 'azung ba la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras
257a2(1): lags par bsnun par mdzod cig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis rgyu mthun pa ni gang / ngo mtshar gyi 'ashes ni gang / spyod pa ri gang / dge ba'i// 
257a3(1): bshes gnyen ni gang / rtson 'grus tsam pa ni gang / dbugs phyin pa thob pa gang / sems can yongs su 'byin pa ni gang / tshul khrims ni gang / lung bstan pa ni gang / kye rgyal ba
257a4(1): sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' la 'jug pa ni gang / de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug pa ni gang / sems can gyi khams bas pa pa dang / spyod pa la
257a5(1): 'jug pa gang / 'jig rter gyi khams la 'jug pa ni glang / bskal pa 'jug pa ni gang / dus gsum bstan pa ni gang / dus gsum la 'jug pa ni gang / mi dro zhing yongs su spyod lag
257a6(1): bamed pa'i sems skyed pa gad / kun tu dbye ba'i ye shes ni gang / gzugs ni gong / kyai rgyal ba'i sras/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas bstan pa rjes su rtogs
257a7(1): bang bya ba ga gram bang po sems bskyed pa nga/ thar gyung ba ma pa phreng ba ma 'ang tsha ga sa thang chu chu mas brgyang
257b1(1): chub kyi sems kyi rkyen ni gang / dge ba'i shes gnyen la gus pas sems ni gang / yongs su dag pa ni gang / pha rol tu phyin pa ri gang / shes rab khang du chud pa ni gang / rab
257b2(1): rdzogs pa ni gang / kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs kyi shugs ni gang / mnyam pa nyid ni gang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi tshul gyi lam ni gang / chos
257b3(1): bstan pa ni grang / yongs su gzung ba ni gang / spobs pa ni gang / dbang ba ni gang / mi granas pa ni gang / sems mnyam pa ni gang / ye shes mngon par bsgrub ni gang
257b4(1): kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sprul pa ni gang / byin gyis rlabs pa ni gang / dbugs phyin pa chen po rab tu thob pa ni gang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
257b5(1): zab mo la 'jug pa ni gang / gnas su ba ni gzi/ sems bskyed pa brtan pa bya ba ni gang / nem nur thams cad gcod pa'i sems bskyed pa ni gang / bsam
257b6(1): gyis mi khyab pa ri gang / dgang de bshad pa la mkhas pa ni gang / ye shes rnam par dpe ba la mkhas pa ni gang / kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams
257b7(1): kyi sems par 'drug pa ni ga pa/ rnam par thar pa ni ga / mngon par shes pa ni gang / rig pa nigang / rnam par bral ba nis byengad mas

258a3(1): yangasu dag pa ni gang / phyag rgya ni gang / ye shes snang ba ni gang / byang chub sems dpa'i gnas tshungs pa med pa ni gang / sangs rgyas kyi byang chub du zhum pa med pa'i sems
258a4(1): bskyed pa ni gang / lhag pa'i bsam pa ri bo lta bu ni gang / kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du ye shes kyi
258a5(1): 'dug pa rgya mchog bran gang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par spyod pa ning che la bu ni gang / theg pa chen po'i chog rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed pa ni gang / rtsom pa

259b6(1): dpa' rnams kyi bdud kyi bdud kyi byin gyi rlabs ni gang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rna bas ni gang / chos kyi byin gyi rlabs ni gang / dga' ldan na gnas 'i las ni gang / 
259b7(1): dga' ldan gyi gnas nas 'tsho 'pho bo ston pa ni gang / mngalan gnas par ston pa ni gang / shin tu phra ba'i rgyu ston pa ni gang / cher skye ba ni gang / gang mcher dgod pa ni gapa
260a1(1): gom pas rnam par gnon pa ni gang / kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzhon nu'i sa kun tu ston pa ni gang / btsun pa'i
260a2(1): khor nye bar ston pa ni gang / mngon par 'byung ba ni gang / dga' ba spyod pa'i sbyor ba ni gang / sdong po byang chub ngu 'gro ba ni gang / snying po byang chub la 'dug pa ni gang
260a3(1): snying po byang chub la 'dug pa rnams ni gang / ngo mtshar skad du byung ba'i chos ni ga / bdud 'dul ba ston pa ni gang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi stobs mngon par rdzogs par
260a4(1): byang chub sems dpa' bo ni gang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba ni gang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i chos dkar po'i rnam pa ni gang / kye rgyal ba'i sras de
260a5(1): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yongasu mya ngan las 'da' ba chen po ston pa ni gang / de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sem

260a7(1): smras pa/ me rgyal ba'i sras kyipa ga ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi brdzun pa ste/ bcu ga chen/ 'di ltar chung mi za ba'i phying byang chub sems dpa
260b1(1): sems kyi rgyu 'thun pa dang / rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu bya ba'i phyir/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rgyu mthun pa dang / shin tu bsags pa'i phyir/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyu mthun pa dang / ra
260b2(1): tan du bya ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu mthun pa dang / 'byung ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi rgyu mthun pa dang / byang chub brtan pa'i phyir smon lam gyi rgyu mthun pa dang / rgya chen po yang dag pa
260b3(1): bsogs pa'i phyir byed pa'i rgyu mthun pa dang / tshul gcig tu bya'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang rgyu mthun pa dang / sems rab tu dang ba'i phyir sangs rgyas mchod pa tu mthun par
260b4(1): pa lta bur brjod pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang rgyu mthun pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu pa de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyu mthun pa dag ste/ de dag la granas nying

260b6(1): gyi 'du shes te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar mi dmigs dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la mi dge bar 'du shes pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la byang chub kyis bon du 'du shes pa dang
260b7(1): sems can thabs cad la byang chub kyi snod du 'dushes pa dang / smon lam thams cad smon lam med par 'du shes pa dang / chos thams cad la 'a blang ba 'du shes pa dang / spong pa thams cad
261a1(1): la spyod pa med par 'du shes pa dang / chos thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi chos su 'du shes pa dang / tshig tu spyod tu pa thams cad la ngag gi lam med par 'du shes pa dang / sas
261a2(1): rgyas thams cad la bar 'du shes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gnyis su med par 'ju shes pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sem
261a3(1): dpa' rnams kyi ngo mtshar gyi 'ju shes te/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'du shes rnam par zlog pa la mkhas pa/ bla na med pa thob par 'gyur
261a4(1): bdag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad yongasu smin par bya ba
261a5(1): don du spyod pa dang / chos thams cad yongasu btsal ba'i don tu spyod pa dang / bslab pa thams cad nan tan du bya ba'i don du spyod pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bsags kyi
261a6(1): da spyo pa dang / ti nge 'dzin ci gcig tubya ba'i dzin du spyod pa dang / ye shes rab tu shes par bya ba 'don du slong pa dang / bsgrud pa yongs su bskam pa'
261a7(1): da kyi spyod pa dang / zhing brgyan pa'i'adon tu snad pa dang / dge ba'i shes gnyen bkren pa'i ngon du srong pa 'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa mdzad cing rimi gro tha ba
261b1(1): tu spyod pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu pa de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyong pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin
261b2(1): gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po'i spyod pa bla na med pa yongasu rdzogs par 'thob par 'gyur bdag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sa
261b3(1): kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chubab kyi sems la rab tu gzhog pa'i bzhes gnyen dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba la sbyor ba'i bshes
261b4(1): gnyen dang / pha rol tu phyin pa la 'jug pa'i byed pa'i bshes gnyen dang / chos thams cad ston pa'i bshes gnyen dang / sems can thams cad yongasu smin par bya ba
261b5(1): la gzhog pa'i bshes gnyen dang / spobs pa la rnam par gdon mi za bar byed pa'i bshes gnyen dang / 'gro ba thams cad nas gyen du spyod pa'i bshes gnyen dang / 
261b6(1): bskal pa thams cad du gnas shing mi skyo bar byed pa'i bshes gnyen dang / kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la rab tu gzhog par byed pa'i bshes gnyen dang / sangs rgyas
261b7(1): thams cad kyi ye shes la 'jug cing 'ibab par byed pa'i bshes gnyen te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu podo dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i ni
262a1(1): rgyas kyi rigasu skyes pa yin gyi sa dung gzhan yang / sangs rgyas kyi rig su skye ba la rab dgod par bya'o zhes dbugs phyin pa 'azod
262a2(1): bo/ bdag ni dngos po med pa'i chos kyi tshul la zhugs pa yin gyis/ dadung gzhan yang dngos po med pa'i chos kyi tshul la dgod par bya'o zhes dbugs byin pa 'thob bo// 
262a3(1): bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mi spong ba la brtson pa yin gyis/ da dung gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mi spong ba brtson pa la dgod par bya'o zhes dbugs
262a4(1): byin pa 'thob bo// bdag gis ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i byang chub du smon lam yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur gyis/ da dang gzhan yang thams cad mkhyen pa'i byang chub smon la
262a5(1): yongasu rdzogs par byed pa la dgod par bya'o zhes dbugs phyin pa 'thob bo// bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi mdzod mi zad par zhugs pa yin gyis/ 
262a6(1): dadung gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi mdzod mi zad par 'jug pa la dgod par bya'o zhes dbugs phyin pa 'thob bo// kye rgyal po'i smras bcu bdag
262a7(1): ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbugs phyin pa 'thob pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po'i dbugs phyin
262b1(1): pa bla na med pa thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems can yangasu smin par bya ba dag ste/ bcu gang zhen/ 
262b2(1): 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ byis pas kyang sems can gyi khams yong su smin par byed do// gzugs kyis kyang sems can gyi khams yongasu smin par byed do// 
262b3(1): chos ston pas kyang sems can gyi khams yongasu smin par byed do// skal pa mnyam pas kyang sems can gyi khams yongasu smin par byed do// gnas med pas kyang sems
262b4(1): can gyi khams yongasu smin par byed do// byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa brjod pas kyang sems can gyi khams yongasu smin par byed do// 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu 'bar
262b5(1): yang dag par snyan pas kyang sems can gyi khams yongasu smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos mdzesu smin par byed do// kyi che ba nyid brjod pas kyang sems can gyi khams yong
262b6(1): su smin par byed do// rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs kyi rnam par 'phrul pas sems can gyi khams yongasu smin par byed do// tha bas khas pa'i sbyor ba dang tshul gyis 'jig rten du sbyang bsna
262b7(1): tshogs kyis kyang sems kyi khams yongs smin par byed do// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu pa de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems can yongasu smin par bya ba ste/ 
263a1(1): de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can gyi khams yongasu smin par byed pa dag go// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu pa
263a2(1): 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub kyi sems mi nyams pa'i tshul khrims dang / nyan thos dang
263a3(1): rang sangs rgyas kyis yongasu spong ba'i tshul khrims dang / sems can thams cad la phan par dga' bas rnam par blta ba'i tshul khrims dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos tham
263a4(1): nAd la rab tu dkod pa'i tshul khrims dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa thams cad la nan tan du bya ba'i tshul khrims dang / chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i rgya
263a5(1): khrims dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad byung chub du yongasu sngo ba'i tshul khrims dang / sangs rgyas kyi sgo thams cad las phyin phyogs su mi lta ba'i tshul khrims dang / chos
263a6(1): thams cadangs par gas pa la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i tshul khrims dang / dbang po sdom pa'i tshul khrims so// t+pal ba'i sras babu pa de dag ni byang chub sems pa
263a7(1): rnams kyikyib rnams te/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa 'a rnams kyi sring bdun pa pe/ lung bag pade gagis grang ban pa'i gyi chung sems pa
263b1(1): rnams ni/ bdag cag lung bstan to// zhes bya bar shes so// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar snying thag pa nas byang chub kyi sems phran sum tshogs pa ni/ byang chub sems
263b2(1): dpa' rnams kyi lung bstan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' la gcig tu chad par mos shing yid ches la mngon par dad pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
263b3(1): lung bstan pa'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par sogs shing sgrubs pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lung bstan pa'o// sems can thams cad sangs
263b4(1): rgyas kyi byang chub la rab tu dgod par btsun pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i' rnams kyi lung bstan pa'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad dang rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu byed na
263b5(1): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lung bstan pa'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad la ston par 'du shes pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lung bstan pagro/ 
263b6(1): sngon gyi byang chub kyi smon lam rjes su srung ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lung bstan pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu pa de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
263b7(1): kyi lung bsan pa sa/ lung bstan pa de dag gis lung bstan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bdag cag lung bstan to// zhes bya ba shesas// rtsernal babasas
264a1(1): bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' la 'jug pa ste/ bcu gang zhen/ 'di ltar sngon gyi smonam
264a2(1): la 'jug pa dang / spyod pa la 'jug pa dang / yang dag par sgrub pa la 'jug pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa la 'jug pa dang / bsgrub pa la 'jug pa dang / smon lam rnam
264a3(1): pa tha dad pa la 'jug pa dang / mos pa tha dad pa la 'jug pa dang / zhing gi rgyan la 'jug pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug pa dang / skye ba bstan pa la 'ju/ 
264a4(1): pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' la 'jug pa ste/ 'jug pa de dag gis ni 'das pa dang / mi 'o sma lta
264a5(1): byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la 'jug pa dag go// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug pa
264a6(1): s+t+waM bcu gang zher/ 'di ltar bu med pa'i mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa la 'jug pa dang / mu med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la 'jug pa dang / mu med pa chos kyi rgya
264a7(1): la 'dug pa dang / mu med pa'i dbyas kyis dkyil 'khor la 'jug pa dang / bu med pa'i sems can 'dul ba la 'jug pa dang / mu med pa'i dri 'phral gyis rnam par phrul
264b1(1): pa la 'jug pa dang / mu med pa'i sku sna tshogs la 'jug pa dang / mu med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa dang / mu med pa'i stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la 'jug pa dang / mu med
264b2(1): pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa yongasu bstan pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu pa de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug pa ste/ 'jug pa de dag
264b3(1): gis ni 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'jug par 'gyur ba dag go// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu pa de dag ni po byang chub sem
264b4(1): dpa' rnams kyi sems can gyi bsam pa dang / spyod pa la 'jug pa ste/ sems can gyi spyod pa dang / bsam pa la 'jug pa de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams sem
264b5(1): can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang spyod pa la rab tu 'jug pa'o// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi sngon gyi mtha'i spyod pa la 'jug pa dang / sems can tham
264b6(1): cad kyi phyi ma'i mtha'i spyod pa la 'jug pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi ltar byung ba'i spyod pa la 'jug pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i spyod pa la 'jug pad
264b7(1): sems can thams cad mi dge ba'i spyod pa la 'jug pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa la 'jug pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang pa'i spang

265a2(1): chags dang / bag la nyal ba'i spyod pa la 'jug pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dus dang dus ma yin par yongasu smin par bya ba dang / rnam par 'dul ba'i spyod pa la 'jug
265a3(1): pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu pa de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems can gyi sam pa dang / spyod pa la 'jug pa ste/ de dag gis byung
265a4(1): chub sems dpa' rnams/ sems can gyi bsam pa dang / spyod pa la 'jug pa dag go// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi
265a5(1): khams la 'jug pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams la kun nas nyon mongs par 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rnams la rnam par byang bar 'jug pa dang
265a6(1): 'jig rten gyi khams rnams la chung ngur 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khas rnams la chen por 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rnams rdul shin tu phra mor chung bar 'jug pa dang /

265b2(1): dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams la 'jug pa ste/ de dag gis ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la 'jug par 'gyur
265b3(1): bdag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bskal pa 'jug pa ste/ de dag gis ni byang chub sems rnams kyi bskal pa thams cad

266b4(1): gro bya bas mi skyo zhing yongasu spyod lug pa med pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad bsnyen bkur bya bas ma zhing yongasu sgyid lug med pa'i sems
266b5(1): bskyed pa dang / chos thams cad btsal ba la mi skyo zhing yongasu sgying grag pa med pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / chos thams cad mnyan pa la mi skyo zhing yongasu sgyid lug pa med
266b6(1): pa'i sems snyed pa dang / chos thams cad bstan pa la ma skyo zhing yongasu spyod lug pa med pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba
266b7(1): dang / gdul bas mi skye zhing yongs su spyod lug pa med pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la rab tu gong par bya bas ma sbyin
