388b6(1): chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis byung ba ni chos kyi byin gyi rlabs so// sangs rgyas kyi yul zhing thams cad dang chos thams cad dang / chos thams cad dang / 
388b7(1): sems dpa' thams cad dang / dus thams cad rab tu mkhyen pa'i ye shes mnga' ba ni chos kyi byin gyi rlabs so// mya ngan las 'das pa yid la bya ba thams cad yongs su chad pa
389a1(1): 'dzin pa thams cad rnam par snangs padang / sman gyi mthu' dang / bri ma'i mtha' rang bzhin gyi rjes su sang bar shes pa ni thun gyi rnangs sa
389a2(1): sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos kyi byin gyi rlabs te/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs pa
389a3(1): bla na med par thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ kyi rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dga' ldan na gnas pa'i las te/ bcug pa zhen/ 'di ltar 'dod pa'i
389a4(1): khams kyi lha'i bu rnams la 'dang pa'i dben pa bstan pa dang / dbang phyug pa rtag pa bstan pa dang / phran sum rtogs pa thams chud par 'gyur 'gyur ba bsan pa dang de dag byeng chub
389a5(1): kyi sems la yang dag par dgod pa 'di ni dga' ldan gnas pa'i las dang po'o// gzugs kyi khams kyi lha'i bu rnams la bsam gtan dang / rnam par mthar pa dang / rnying
389a6(1): 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par ldang ba ston cing bsam gtan dang / bsam gan gyi yan lag de dag la mngon par zhen pa dang / srang
389a7(1): b+hA bas byung ba'i 'jig rten 'jig tshogs su lta ba dang / gti mug gi shas che ba'i tsan mongs pa rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du bstan pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i phyin
389b1(1): ci leg la zhugs pa thams cad la sdug par yid la byed pa thams cad ni sdug cing mi rtag pa yongs su bsten te/ byang chub kyi sems la dgod pa 'di ni dga' ldan na gnas pa'i las
389b2(1): gnyis pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dga' ldan gyi gnas rab na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni rgyan bzang po'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas te/ lus las 'od bkye zhing stong gsum gyi
389b3(1): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba chen pos rgyas par bkang nas sems can rnams la dad pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos sna tshogs kyi sgra skad rab tu brjod de/ chos kyi sgra skad de dag rjes
389b4(1): nas sems dang bar gyur te/ dga' ldan gyi lha dang brtul zhugs mthun par skyed par 'gyur zhing de ltar 'gyu skyes nas kyang byang chub kyi sems la dgod pa'i di na dga' ldan na gnas pa'i las
389b5(1): gsum pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dga' ldan gyi gnas rab gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mig bsgribs pa med pa med pas phyogs bcu'i dga' ldan gyi gnas rab na gnas
389b6(1): ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' de mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang chos yang dag par 'gro ba chen po dang / yang
389b7(1): pa'i chos kyigs chen pa byed de// yum gyi sbrum dug shegs pa dang / sle ba dang / 'byung ba dang / sring po byang chub kyi rgyan rnam par dgong pa yang dag par 'gral// sun gyi srung ba pa
390a1(1): gis ye shes kyi che ba nyid de/ thob par gyur pa'i sngon gyi spyod pa de dag kyang rab tu brjod do// gnas nas mig yo'i yang bya ba 'di lta bu dag ston pa 'di ni dga' ldan na
390a2(1): gnas pa'i las bzhi pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dga' ldan gyi gnas rab na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i drung du byang chub sems dpa' de la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur
390a3(1): ba'i phyir phyogs bcu nas dga' ldan gyi gnas rab na 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'ongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems dang bsam pa yongs su tshim par bya ba dang / spen
390a4(1): pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir chos yod dag par 'gro ba'i sgo chen po yang dag par ston te/ so sa'i sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gang bar ba pa dang / gang spang bar
390a5(1): gang bsgom pa dang / gang mngon du bya ba de dag kyang yang dag par ston to// yang dag par 'gro ba'i chos dag thos nas kyang rab tu dga' zhing mgu ba dang / rangs pas legs pa brjod cing rang
390a6(1): rang rang gi zhing dang rang rang gi gnas su 'dod par 'gyur ba 'di ni dga' ldan na gnas pa'i las lnga pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dga' ldan gyi gnas rab na gnas pa'i gan du nam du bdud sdig can 'dod pa'i
390a7(1): khams kyi dab pa'i lal mang pos yongs su bskur ba ni ga grags btsal ba'i phyir 'angs par gyur na 'a kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' 'du thamam ca na cing po nis bya ba ma
390b1(1): la gnas shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pas yang dag par gzung ba'i ye shes kyi sgos mnyam zhing mnyen pa'i mtha' gnyis bzung nas/ ci nas kyang bdud sdig can grags rnyed par
390b2(1): mi 'gyur ba de ltar kyi byin gyi rlob bo// de lta de ltar chos kyang ston te/ bdud kyi 'khor chen po byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pas de lta bu mthong nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
390b3(1): byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ba 'di na dga' ldan na gnas pa'i las drug pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas rab na gnas pa ni/ gang gi tshe 'di ltar 'dod
390b4(1): pa'i khams kyi lha'i bu 'di rnams chos nyan pa dang / yang dag par 'gro bas skyo bar 'gyur to zhes bya bar shes par gyur pa de'i tshe/ 'dod pa'i khams kyi gnas thams cad sgra sgeg cing dbyangs
390b5(1): 'byin te/ grogs po dag de ring byang chub sems dpa' btsun mo'i 'khor chen po ston pa mdzad kyis lta bar su 'dod pa dag myur du sheg shig ces nas/ de ltar lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong kun nas 'dus
390b6(1): par 'gyur te/ de dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kun nas 'dus par 'gyur nas kyang / lha'i bu de dag gis sngan cad ma mthong ma thos pa'i btsun mo'i 'khor de lta bu bstan nas de dag nam dga'
390b7(1): bsams par gyur pa'i tshe/ de dag gis rol mo brdung ba dang / dkrol ba de dag las kye grogs pa rnams 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa'o// 'du byed thams cad no sdug bsngal ba'o/ chos thams
391a1(1): cad deng dag mad med pa'o// mya ngan las 'das pa mi na pa'o// zhes sgra 'byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sbyang bas ni thams cad mkhyen pa'am shes yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur
391a2(1): zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byang ba zos par 'gyur te/ de dag gis chos kyi sgra de thos pa dang / skyob skye bar gyur te/ byang chub kyi sems la yang dag par gzhol bar 'gyur ba 'di ni dga' ldan na gnas pa'i
391a3(1): las bdun pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas rab na 'dug pa ni dga' ldan gyi gnas nas kyang lus mi snang bar ma gyur la/ phyogs bcur yang de bzhin gshegs
391a4(1): pa rnams la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur dang / chos nyan pa'i phyir 'gro ba ste/ de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i sa mngon par dbang bskur ba
391a5(1): thob pa'i mchog tu phrin pas thams cad mngon par shes pa zhes bya ba yang drug par bstan par 'gyur ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i yeshes kyi yan lag dang / nye ba'i yan lag thams cad dang ldan 'a nas
391a6(1): pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa la 'jug pa/ sems kyi skad gcig gis sbyor ba yang dag par bstan par 'gyur ba 'di ni dga' ldan gnas na gnas pa'i las brgyad pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub
391a7(1): sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas rab na gnas pa'i mthus khyang par 'dod pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa dang rim gro rnam pa chang med pas rnam par dag pa mtha' yas pa'i rnam pa yongs su sun
391b1(1): pa chos kyi dbyings kyi klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'jams klas pa'i de gshegs pa'i mchod pa'i las kyi don du 'byung ste/ mchod pa de mthong nas sems
391b2(1): can grangs med tshad med pa rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du sems bskyed de/ 'di ni dga' ldan na gnas pa'i las dgu pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' dga'
391b3(1): ldan gyi gnas rab na gnas pa/ mtha' dang dbus med pa'i chos sgyu ma la zhugs pa ni/ mig g.yor lta bus shin tu bsgrubs pa'i ye shes kyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad du gzugs
391b4(1): sna tshogs dang / kha dog sna tshogs dang / dbyibs sna tshogs dang / spyod lam sna tshogs dang / bya ba sna tshogs dang / sbyor ba sna tshogs dang / bstan pa mngon par sgrub pa sna tshogs dang
391b5(1): dgod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sems can rnams mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ sems dang bsam pa mgu bar bya ba'i phyir chos ston cing gzugs yongs su ston te/ 'di ni dga' ldan na gnas pa'i las bcu
391b6(1): pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dga' ldan na gnas pa'i las te/ de dag byas nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams phyis mi'i 'jig rten du 'ong bar 'gyur ba
391b7(1): dgag/ kyai rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dga' ldan nas shi 'phos pa'i tshe/ rkang pa'i mthil gyi 'og nas bde ba'i rgyan ces bya ba'i 'od gzer 'byung sa/ 
392a1(1): de byung nas kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba chen pos rgyas par bkang zhing ngan song dang mi khom pa'i rgyud du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi lus la
392a2(1): 'bab po// de ltar 'od des lus la 'bab mthag tu de nyid kyi tshe/ sems can de dag bde ba thams cad kyis tshim ning / sdug bsngal tshor brtso zhal bar 'gyur ro// bde ba'i nyams de nyams
392a3(1): su tshor ma thag tu de dag gis 'di ltar grogs po dag sems can gzhan zhig ni 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir skyes so zhes bya bar shes te/ 'di ni dga' ldan gyi gnas nas shi 'pho ston pa dang po'o// kye rgyal
392a4(1): ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' de'i smin 'tshams mdzod pu nas yang dag par bskul ba zhes bya ba'i zhes 'od gzer 'byung ste/ de byung nas kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig gyi
392a5(1): khams rgyas par bkang zhing / sngon lhan gcig tu spyod spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lus la 'bab pa// 'od gzer des de ltar lus la bab ma thag tu de nyid kyi tshe/ byang chub
392a6(1): sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i dgra 'dzin gyinarnas nam she'atha pa ma tshang du d+hu / de dag thams cad 'dus nas byang chub sems dpa' lamatshad pa'i mngangan par bsgon
392a7(1): 'don dag 'a ldan gyi gnas nam go' ba san pa'o// kyernal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i lag pa'i mthal sa yongs su dag pa'i yul nas bya ba'i 'ang gar 'byung ma
392b1(1): de byang nas kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su sbyong zhing / de na zag pa med pa'i rang sangs rgyas 'khod pa de dag 'jig rte gyi khams gzhan du gsol to// ma yin na yang
392b2(1): gdogs par gyur pa de dag tshe'i du byed 'dor ro// gzhan yang 'dul ba'i dbang du de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin du brlabs sems can ma gtogs par bdud dang mu stegs can gzhan dang / phas kyi
392b3(1): kyi rgol ba dang / kun tu rgyu dang / dmigs pa la mngon par zhen pa'i sems can rnams 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du sel te/ 'di ni dga' ldan gyi gnas nas shi 'pho ston pa gsum pa'o// kye rgyal
392b4(1): ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga gnyis nas dri ma med cing bzang la 'o gsal ba'i rgyan ces bya ba'i 'od gzer 'byung ste/ de byung nas kyang lha'i gnas thams
392b5(1): nye bar bzung ba yan chad 'og min gyi lha'i gnas man chad du snang bar byed de/ des lha'i bu de dag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas nas 'pho bar shes nas de dag kun nas kyang skyo ba skye bar
392b6(1): yin gyis me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan thogs te/ rol mo gdung ba dang / dkrol ba'i sgra rab tu phyung nas byang chub
392b7(1): sems dpa'i drung du mchod pa'i las kyi phyir 'dong ste/ shi 'pho nye bar bzung ba nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po bstan gyi bar du bsnyen bkur byed de/ phyi bzhin du 'brang ngo // 
393a1(1): 'di ni dga' ldan gyi gnas nas shi 'pho ston pa bzhi pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub dpa' de dpal gyi be'u'i rgyan dang ldan pa rdo rje'i khams ltar sra
393a2(1): zhing brtan pa'i snying po can gyis snying kha nas gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i 'od gzer gtong ste/ de btang nas kyang lag na rdo rje'i 'jig rten thams cad yongs su snang bar
393a3(1): byed do// de nas lag rdo rje khrag khrig phra brgya 'ongs te shi pho ston pa nye bar bzung nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba chen po bstan kyi bar du byang chub sems dpa'i phyi bzhin 'brang ste/ 'di ni
393a4(1): dga' ldan gyi gnas nas shi 'basten pa lnga pa'o// kye rtul ba'i sgras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' de'i ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas 'gro ba thams cad du rnam par byed zhes bya ba
393a5(1): 'od gzer 'byung ste/ de byang nas kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas nas byang chub sems dpa'i lus la 'bab bo/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus
393a6(1): la bab nas lha dang ma'i gnas su 'char ro// des byang chub sems de dag kyang bdag cag gis 'dir gnas te/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
393a7(1): mdzad pa bya bar 'gyur resam du'ing du drang pa 'di dga' ldan gyi gnas nas 'chi' ba stan pa drug pa'i/ grergyal ba'i sras gzhan yang bying chub sems dpa' de'i khang par bung
393b1(1): chen po'i snying can nas rnam par bsags pa shin tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i 'od gzer 'byung ste/ de byung nas kyang khyim gang du byang chub sems dpa' skye bar 'gyur ba'i khyim der 'char/ 
393b2(1): gzer de de ltar shar ma thag tu de nyid kyi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag khyim 'am/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ 'dzam bu'i gling du sems can 'dul ba nye bar bzung zhing smyed
393b3(1): rab tu 'dzin te/ 'di ni dga' ldan gyi gnas nas shi 'pho ston pa bdun pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' de'i khang pa rtsegs pa/ lha thams cad kyi gnas kyi
393b4(1): rgyan ces bya ba/ las gnas thams cad rnam par dag pa'i rgyan ces bya ba'i 'od gzer 'byung ste/ de dag byung ma thog tu yum gang gi sku g.yas par skye bar ba de'i lus la 'bab po// de ltar
393b5(1): bab ma thag tu de nyid kyi tshe byang chub sems dpa'i yum bde ba thams cad thob par 'gyur te/ yon tan drang sdom pa thams cad la'ang gnas par 'gyur ro// yum gyi sku drir yang pho brang
393b6(1): brtsegs pa chen po rin po che'i dam pas brgyan pa byang chub sems dpa'i longs spyod pa kyi don du 'byung ste/ 'di ni dga' ldan b+ha gnas nas shi 'pho ston pa brgyad pa'o/ kye rgyal sras
393b7(1): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa'i mthi lo gyi 'oganas gnas pa zhes bya ba'i 'od gzer 'byung ste/ de byang ma thag tu lce 'bu'am tshangs pa gang la la byang chub sems dpa'i mtsha
394a1(1): pa'i las kyi don du shi 'pho bar 'dod par gyur la/ byang chub sems dpas kyang lha'i bu de dag de ni 'khod bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las mngon par bsgrub
394a2(1): par gnas par shes pa de dag gi lus la 'bab po// de ltar 'od gzer des 'bab po// de ltar 'od gzer des bab par gyur ma thag tu de nyid kyi tshe/ lha'i bu de dag shi 'pho ba'i las de las
394a3(1): rnam par ldang ste/ de dag de na 'khad na 'khor bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' la shi 'pho nye bar bzung ba nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba bstan gyi bar du mchid pa'i las byed de/ 'di ni dga'
394a4(1): ldan gyi gnas nas shi 'ab ston pa dgu pa'o// kye rgyal po'i sras gzhan byang chub sems dpa'i dpe byang brdang po rnams las nyim sna tshogs kyi tshul zhes bya ba'i 'od gzir 'byung ste/ da byung nas kyang byang
394a5(1): chub sems dpa'i las sna tshogs sbyin to// sas kyi rtul ba'i sras de la lha dang mi la las ni/ byang chub sems dpa'adaga' ldan gyi gnas rab nyid ni 'dug par mthong ngo // la las ni yum gyi slar bzung pa
394a6(1): mthong ngo // la las ni skye bar mthong ngo // la las ni 'byung bar mthong ngo // la las ni rnam par 'tshang rgya bar mthong ngo // la las ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar mthong ngo // la las ni de bzhin gshegs
394a7(1): brgya lapa' 'ab ma / 'dzi pa pa gyi shi bags sam sa ses cung chu sems dpa'i 'a cu ga pa mas da
394b1(1): med pa brgya stong phrag bcu byang chub sems dpa'i lus las 'byung ste/ de bzhin du stan dang / gzhal med khang dang / khang pa rtsegs pa dag nas kyang 'byung ste/ de dag byung nas kyang byang chub sems
394b2(1): dpa'i las sna tshogs yongs su ston te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar las yongs su grub pa'i byang chub dpa' rnams chos thams cad rab tu grub pa'i phyir/ lha'i gnas dga' ldan nas shi 'pho ston
394b3(1): to/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngal gnas par ston pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar sems rgya chung ba dang / dma' ba la mos pa rnams yongs su smin par bya/ 
394b4(1): ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i dngos po'i bsod nams kyi rtsa ba la yid mi ches par 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes byang chub sems dpa' mngal na gnas par ston pa 'di ni mngal na gnas par ston pa dang pa'o// 
394b5(1): gnyen gshes kyi tshogs dang / sngon lhan cig tu spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / sems can gang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba mngal na gnas pas yongs su smin par bya ba pa dang ma dang / de dag gi don
394b6(1): tu byang chub sems dpa' mngal na gnas par ston te/ 'di ni mngal na gnas par ston pa gnyis pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras byed chu sems dpa' ni rmongs pa med cing dran la shes bzhin du ma'i na ltor 'gro
394b7(1): ste ma'i ldan 'dug pa'i che'ang dran pa nyams pa med do// 'di'i mngal na gnas par sen pa gsum pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' ma'i mngal na 'dug kyang 'di lta ste/ byigs da
395a1(1): @#'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi la mgon po rnams dang / lhan cig 'grogs shing ches bslab
395a2(1): pa dang / yang dag pa'i gtam bya ba rgyun mi gcod cing / byang chub sems dpa'i stobs yang tshad med pa yang yongs ston te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de dag mngal na gnas kyang de lta bu'i smon lam gyi khyad
395a3(1): bar bdeg pas byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni ye shes mu med pa dang ldan pa ste/ 'di ni mngal na gnas pa bzhi pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa'i ma'i mngal gnas pa'i tshe/ de na
395a4(1): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor kun nas gnas par 'gyur ba yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sngon gyi smon lam gyis de dag yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' mngal na gnas
395a5(1): par ston te/ 'di ni mngal na gnas par ston pa lnga pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' ma'i 'jig rten du byang nas kyang mir skyes pa rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan ston te/ 
395a6(1): 'di ni mngal na gnas par ston pa lnga'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' ma'i 'jig rten du byung nas kyang mo ri skyes pa rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa ston te/ 'di ni mngal na
395a7(1): gnas par bdug pa'i/ kyi rgyal pa'i bras byang chub sems dpa' ma ma 'jug pa 'dzin sa sa kyil ba ma sa su ma gyi kyil sa su
395b1(1): gsus ma sang chen pa'i 'angag rten gyi khams su sAng ste/ de la mas pa chen pa dang / ldan pa'i sa dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri ba dang / lA ma yin dang / nam mkha' mang dang / ma 'a
395b2(1): lha 'phye chen po dang / maM dang mi ma yin pa de dag gis shes par gyur nas/ de dang che bar 'ongs shing mchod pa dang / rim gro byed de/ 'amal na gnas par spyon pa bdud pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dru
395b3(1): chub sems dpa' mngal na gnas pas 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' srid pa'i tha mar gyur pa rnams dang / tshogs te chos kyi brda'i sgo chen po ye shes chen po'i
395b4(1): snying po zhes bya ba yang dag par 'gro bar bya ba yod do// de dag dang 'du ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams mngal na gnas par ston te/ 'di ni mngal na gnas par ston pa brgyad pa'o// kye rgyal
395b5(1): ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' ni dri ma med pa'i snying po can zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs shing / ma'i mngal du 'gro ste ting 'dzin de'i mthus ma la'ang gnod par mi 'gyur bar
395b6(1): dga' ldan gyi gnas rab par kyang lhag pa'i rgyan ma'i 'od du kun nas gnas par 'gyur te/ 'di ni mngal na gnas par ston pa dgu pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
395b7(1): ma'i mngal du 'dug 'i mthus 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i las kyi phyir bsod nams chen po'i me tog kun nas rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin
396a1(1): gshegs pa'i rim gro 'byung ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang de la byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par spyod pa de la chos kyi dbyings kyi snying po mtha' dang dbus med pa
396a2(1): yang dag par rab tu ston ste/ shes par bya ba de shes pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams shin du phra ba'i 'gro ba bcu ston to// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shin tu
396a3(1): phra ba'i rgyu ston pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa'i mngal na yang gnas la/ thog ma sems bskyed pa nye bar bzung ba nas dbang bskur ba'i bar du yang yongs su ston pa dang / 
396a4(1): ma'i mngal na yang gnas la dga' ldan na gnas pa yang yongs su ston pa dang ma'i mngal na yang gnas la skye ba yang yongs su ston pa dang / ma'i mngal na yang gnas la gzho nu'i sa yang yongs su ston
396a5(1): pa dang / ma'i mngal na'ang gnas la btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na 'dug par yongs su ston pa dang / ma'i mngal na yang gnas la mngon par 'byung ba yang yongs su ston pa dang / ma'i mngal na'ang gnas
396a6(1): mdaga' bsrung pa'i sbyor ba dang / song pa byang chubarngu gru bas rnam pa yang chu ba'i bar du yang yang yangs su ston pa dang / mdzamangs ni yang las la kyis kyi lajimam ban pa ya sa sa rnas
396a7(1): bla ma'i ma yong ba mas rgyang rnalas la 'gro mang yangs su phyin pa dang / sa masan sang gnas la rgyan pa 'jus pa'i rgyam rgyas mangs kyi ga cing byang chub sems dpa'i byung pa sa sa
396b1(1): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs ma kyi rnam pa dang sgo yang yongs su ston pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shin du phra ba'i rlung
396b2(1): ston pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams ye shes chen po'i shin du phra ba bla na med par 'gyur ba dag go// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshor
396b3(1): skye ba ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ kye rgyal rgyal ba'i sras 'ad la byang chub sems dran zhing shes bzhin du skye ba dang / 'od gzer gyi dra ba dang / snang ba chen pos stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
396b4(1): gyi khams rgyas par bkang ste/ lus snang ba dang / ldan par skye ba dang / phyir mi ldog cing srid pa'i tha ma par gyur par skye ba dang / ma skyes shing 'byung ba med par skye ba dang / khams gsum pa
396b5(1): sgyu ma'i rnam pa lta bur khong du chud de/ skye ba dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi khams su lus yongs su ston cing skye ba dang / lus de nyid kyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes khong
396b6(1): du chud par bya ba dang skye ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la ma lus pa thams cad kyi 'od gzer bkye bas yang dag par bskul ba'i lus su skye ba dang / ye shes chen pos rnam par 'byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin
396b7(1): la snyoms par 'jug pa'i lus su skye ba dang / kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' skyes nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyang rab tu g.yo bar 'gyur/ sems can thams cad kyang rab
398a1(1): gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can 'dul ba'i dbang gis phyir dgod par 'gyur ba dag go// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnam
398a2(1): pas rnam par gnon pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i mthu yongs su bstan pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams gnas pa'i rnam par gnon pa dang / nor bdun yongs
398a3(1): btong bar ston pa'i phyir gom pas rnam par gnon pa dang / sa'i lha'i bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir gam pas rnam par gnon pa dang / khams gsum las 'das pa'i rnam par
398a4(1): gnon pa dang / 'gros yongs su bstan pa'i phyir gom pas rnam par gnon pa dang / glang pa'i 'gros dang / khyu mchog gi 'gros dang / seng ge'i 'gros dang / 'gros thams cad las 'das shing
398a5(1): byang chub sems dpa'i 'gras khyad par du 'phags pa yongs su bstan pa'i phyir byang chub sems rnams 'gres kyi rnam par gnon pa dang / kye rgyal ba'i sras sa chen po yang rdo rje'i dbyings kyis
398a6(1): kun nas gzung bar 'gyur te/ sa'i phyogs gzhan gyis byang chub sems dpa'i lus bzung bar mi nus pa bstan pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams gam pas rnam par gnan pa dang / sems
398a7(1): ban gzhan sring bra ba'i phyi byang chub sems dpa'arnams sam pas rnam par mnan pa dang / byang chub kyi ma rnalas pa'i'i bdun cinanangan yongs su bsan pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
398b1(1): gom pas rnam par gnon pa dang / chos nying rab tu thob pas gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa yongs su bstan pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams gom par rnam par gnon pa dang / bdag na gtso ba yin/ 
398b2(1): bdag ni 'jig rten na phul du phyin pa yin no zhes tshig brjod pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams gom pas rnam par gnon pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sgras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni gom
398b3(1): pas rnam par gnon pa ste/ de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnams sems can 'dul ba'i drin du ston pa dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzhon nu'i sa
398b4(1): kun tu ston pa'i las ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar yi ge dang / grangs dang / badz+ra dang / rtsis kyi sbyor ba thams cad las rab tu 'dus pa'i bya ba kun tu ston pa'i las dang / rta dang / glang po
398b5(1): dang / shing rta brgyag pa thams cad 'phong kun las 'phags pa tu ston pa'i las dang / tshe lo dang / thabs dang / gar dang / brgyan po dang / rtsed mo dang / 'jig rten gyi dga' ba la 'phel las
398b6(1): 'phral mas 'phags pa'i bya ba kun mA pa'i las dang / lus da / ngag dang / yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba med pa kun du ston pa'i las dang / mya ngan las 'das par sna ting nga 'dzim la rnams par
398b7(1): 'jug pas mag ga mas tshang me pa dbang ba kun tu smin pa'i las dang / chothams cad dang / phra thams cad dang / klu dang / gardang myin dang / drib dang / sum yin dpa / rnamam par
399a1(1): lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs dang / 'jig rten gyi mgon po thams cad las shin tu 'das par byang chub sems dpa'i mthu kun tu
399a2(1): ston pa'i las dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi mgon po'i gzugs dang / kha dog dang / gzi brjid las shin tu 'das par byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs dang / kha dog dang
399a3(1): gzi brjid kun du ston pa'i las dang / 'dod pa dang / dga' ba dang / rtse bas mos pa'i sems can rnams la chos kyi dga' bas rab tu dga' ba yang dag par bskyed pa kun tu ston pa'i las dang / chos
399a4(1): kyi rim gro bskyed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / rim gro bya bas 'dod pa'i khams thams cad rgyas pas 'gengs pa kun tu ston pa'i las dang / chos la dga' ba'i snang bas/ 
399a5(1): de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlangs yang dag par blang ba kun tu ston pa'i las so// kye rnal ba'i sgras bcu pa de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzhon nu'is kun tu ston pa'i las
399a6(1): de dag yongs su bstan nas de'i 'og tu byang sems rnams btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du 'dong par gyur pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ri byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi btsun mo'i 'khor nye bar ston
399a7(1): pa te/ bcug zhen/ 'di ltar sngon ltan cig tu spyad spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge pa'i rna ba yongs su smin par bya ba'i don du byang chub sems dpa'i btsun mo'i 'khor nye bar ston pa
399b1(1): dang / byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba brjod pa'i phyir bcur mo'i la bar nye bar bsten pa dang / longs spyad dang sring la chags pa'i lha dang mi rnams la longs spyad dang / sbed pa'i che
399b2(1): yongs su bstan pa'i phyir btsun pa'i 'khor nye bar ston pa dang / rnyog pa lnga'i zhing du sems rnams kyi bsam pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i banan ma'i 'khor ce ba sten pa dang / bcur mo'i 'khor gyi na
399b3(1): na ting nge 'dzin la gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu dang / che ba nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir btsun mo'i 'khar nye bar ston pa dang / sngon gyi smon lam dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams kyi bas
399b4(1): pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir btsun mo'i 'khor nye bar ston pa dang / pha dang ma dang gnyen pa'i tshogs kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir btsun mo'i 'khor nye bar ston pa dang / 
399b5(1): chos kyi dbyings chen po dang ldan pa'i rol mo brdung ba dang / dkrol ba'i sgras de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod cing bsnyen bkur ba yongs su grub par bya ba'i phyir btsun mo'i 'khor nye bar
399b6(1): ston pa dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang nas byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin la gnas shing shin tu phra ba mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba nas/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i bar du ston
399b7(1): pa'i phyir btsun ma'i 'khor nye bar ston pa dang / chos kyi skyabs dang ldan pas yang dag par bstan pa'i drir btsun mo'i 'khor nye bar ston pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po dag ni byang chub sems
400a1(1): dpa' rnams kyi btsun mo'i 'khor nye bar ston pa ste/ de dag ni srid pa tham pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yongs su bstan nas de'i 'og tu mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag po kye
400a2(1): rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par 'byung ba ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar khyim gyi gnas smad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'byung ba
400a3(1): dang / gnas la dga' ba'i sems can thams cad gyen tu bskyed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams mngon par 'byung ba dang / 'phags pa dang mthun pa'i lam gyi lags pa yongs su
400a4(1): bstan pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams mngon par 'byung ba dang / rab tu byung ba'i yon tan dang legs pa yang dag par bsngags pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams mngon
400a5(1): mngon par 'byung ba dang / mtha' gnyis kyi lta ba dang bral ba yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams mngon par 'byung ba dang / 'dod pa'i bde ba dang phyung bar
400a6(1): brtson zhing bdag gi bde ba lhur len pa'i sems can skyo bar bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'o rnams mngon par 'byung ba dang / khams gsum pa thams rgyud las 'byung ba'i sngon
400a7(1): shA las yang dag par bstan pa'i phyirang byang chub sems dpa' rnams mngon par 'byung ba dang / rang la rag las par spyang cing sa ni gyi dring mi 'dag pa la ston pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa
400b1(1): rnams mngon par 'byung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa thob pa dang / 'thun par yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams mngon par
400b2(1): 'byung ba dang / kye rgyal ba'i sras chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa ni gdon mi za bar mngon par 'byung ba dang ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems
400b3(1): dpa' rnams sems can 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir mngon par 'byung ba yongs su ston pa dag go// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dka' ba'i spyod pa'i sbyor ba ste/ 
400b4(1): bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar dma' ba la mos pa'i sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams dka' ba spyod pa ston pa dang / lta ba'i rnam pa la gnas pa'i
400b5(1): sems can rnams kyi gyen du spyod pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams dka' ba spyod pa ston pa dang / las dang bya bas 'khyams par gyur pa'i sems can rnams la/ las kyi rnam par smin pa
400b6(1): mngon sum du snyan pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams dka' bskyed pa ston pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa chos nyid rjes su 'breng bar ba'i phyir byang chub
400b7(1): sems dpa' rnams dka' ba skyed pa son pa dang / bdag gi dub panyi bar ni ring mtha' dang ldan pa yongs su bstan pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams dka'i bskyed pa son pa dang / ma yin na
401a1(1): chos la chags pa rnams kyi don du byang chub sems dpa' rnams dka' ba spyod pa ston pa dang / 'dod pa'i bde dang phrad par brjon ning rang gi bde ba ltar len pa'i sems cad
401a2(1): rnams skyo bar bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams dka' ba spyod pa ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spong ba brtsam pa'i khyang par yongs su bstan pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
401a3(1): rnams dka' ba spyod pa ston pa dang / skye bo phyi ma'i rnams brtson 'grus bcom ma la yang dag par sbyor bar bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams dka' ba spyod pa ston pa dang / ma yin
401a4(1): na dbang po yongs su ma smin pa'i lha dang / mi rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i dus bsdad pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams dka' ba spyod pa ston pa'o// kye rgyal po'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang
401a5(1): chub sems dpa rnams sems can 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir dka' ba spyad pa sbyor ba yongs su ston pa dgag// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu pa 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams semasa'i
401a6(1): 'dul pa'i dbang gi byu da' bskyed pa'i rgyung pa yongs su ston pa tshig rgyal pa'i sas bcu pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams so slong po byung zla ba trA ShAg+h+ra bi ni/ bcum
401a7(1): zhes 'das bang gyinyi gyi sa mam pa kyi srung ba'i drung chub sems dpa'i rnams rung 'i byang chub tu 'ding po dang 'a rten gyi khas sa thams ca rab tu bsgreng nga'i phyir byang chub po
401b1(1): dpa' rnams snying po byang chub tu 'dod pa dang / 'jig cher gyi khams thams cad du bdag gi lus bstan pa 'bur byang chub sems pa mas phung po byung rgyab du 'dong ba dang / sna ldan
401b2(1): tu spyad pa spyod pa'i grogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams bskul ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub 'dod pa dang / snying po byang chub kyi rgyar rnam par phye ba yongs
401b3(1): su bstan pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub tu 'dod pa dang / sems can ji ltar mos pa rnams la lus dang spyod ma lam dang / byang chub kyi shing gi rgyan rnam par
401b4(1): phyi ba yongs su bstan pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub tu 'dod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon du
401b5(1): blta ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub drod pa dang / gem pa dor ba dang / bgegs thams cad du ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo la 'jug cing gcig tu rnam par 'tshang mi rgya ba las
401b6(1): 'da' ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub 'dod pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto
401b7(1): 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten mgon po thams cad kyi mchod ba blang ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub tu 'dod pa dang / chags pa
402a1(1): med pa'i ye shes chen pos rnam par phye ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yid la byed cing phyogs thams cad du rnam par phye ba'i mngon par
402a2(1): rdzogs par byang chub yongs su bstan pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub 'dod pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying po byang chub
402a3(1): du 'gro ba sems can 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir yongs su bstan pa dag go// bam po brgya bcu rtsa lnga pa'o// kye rtul ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams
402a4(1): rnams kyi snying po byang chub la 'dug ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du bskyod cing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do// 'jig rten gyi
402a5(1): thams cad snang bar byed cing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do// ngan song thams cad du zhi bar byed cing byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod
402a6(1): yang nas rnams cad rab tu ni par byed cing byang chub sems dpa' rnams stong po byung chub la 'khod do// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad d+hA'i rang bzhin du byin thos rlob cing / byang chub sems
402a7(1): dpa' rnams snang po byang chub la 'khang do// deng zhen gshegs pa'i gad ni seng po'i khril rnam par sa zhing byang chub sems dpa' rnams sring pa byang chub la 'a' // yid nam mngal
402b1(1): mnyam pa la rnam par ma rtag cing byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do// ji ltar 'thun pa'i lus dang spyod lam yongs su bston cing byang chub sems dpa' snying po byang
402b2(1): chub la 'khod do// rdo rje'i snying po'i ting nge 'dzin rjes su rtogs par byed cing byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlab
402b3(1): rnam par dag pa'i gnas yang dag par len cing byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod // bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i mthus 'gro ba thams cad byin gyis rlob cing byang chub sems
402b4(1): dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying po byang chub la 'dug pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams
402b5(1): snying po byang chub kyi mchog la 'khod nas kyang ngo mtshar rmad du byung ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de la snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'jig rten gyi khrus
402b6(1): thams cad ni bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis mngon par bstan te/ phyag g.yas pa brkyang zhing / kye ded dpon po rgyal bar gyur cig
402b7(1): rgyal bar gyur cig ces gsung brjod pa/ 'dono mtshar rmad dbyung ba'i chos dang po'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la deng gartsams
403a1(1): cad dgongs pa dang / byin gyis rlob pa yang dag par mdzad de/ 'di ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos gsum pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod
403a2(1): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la sngon lhan cig tu spyad pa spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'ongs te byang chub sems dpa' de dag la kun du nas bskor cing mchod pa'i rnam par phye
403a3(1): brnam pa sna tshogs mngon par bsgrubs te/ 'di ni ngo mtshar smod du byung ba'i chos gsum pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras snying po byang chub mchog la 'khong pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la
403a4(1): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi tshe dang / gel ba dang / nags 'tshal thams cad kyang bsam pa yang ke lA ste/ snying po byang chub gan pa der 'dud cing phrag 'tshal to/ 'din ngo mnar smad du byung
403a5(1): ba'i ches bzhi pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba'i tshe'ang chos kyi dbyings par 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin mngon du gyur te/ ting nge 'dzin
403a6(1): thob mthag du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur te/ 'di ni ngo mtshar smad du byung ba'i chos lnga pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras rgya mtsho mchog gi dam pa dri ma
403a7(1): bla ma med cing kun nas sngang la 'dags la ba'i snying po la 'khang ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhinag shegs pa rnams cad kyi chos kyi smin chen pos kun nas log par 'gyur te/ 'di ni ma
403b1(1): smad du byang ba'i chos drug pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mthus de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / rim gror bya ba shin
403b2(1): tu rgya chen po rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa'i las kyi phyir 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam pa thams cad du 'byung ste/ 'di ni ngo mtshar slad du byung ba'i chos bdun pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras snying po byang
403b3(1): chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ye shes mchog gis sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / dbang po dang spyod pa mngon du 'gyur te/ 'di ni ngo mtshar smad du byung ba'i chos brgyad
403b4(1): pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la blo shin tu rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mngon du gyur to// ting nge 'dzin thob ma thag tu
403b5(1): nam mkha'i dbyings tshad med pa dang / dus gsum sangs rgyas par 'gengs pa'i lus kun nas gnas par 'gyur te/ 'di ni ngo mtshar smad du byung ba'i chos dgu pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras snying
403b6(1): po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems rnams kyi lus kyi las dus thams cad la yang dag par gzhol zhing ye shes chen po chags pa med pa rdul dang bral ba'i snang ba dang ldan par 'gyur
403b7(1): te/ 'di ni ngo mtshar smad du 'byung ba'i chos bcu pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngo mtshar slad du byung ba'i chos rnam byang ba'i chos rnams te/ byang chub sem
404a1(1): dpa' snying po byang chub mchog la gnas pa rnams la 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag go// kye rgyal ba'i sras don rnam pa bcu po 'di dag gi dbang yang dag par mthong nas snying
404a2(1): po byung chub mchog la 'dug cing byang chub sems dpa' bdang 'dul ba sten te/ bcu gang nan/ 'di sar kun nas can mongs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'bum klas panan me
404a3(1): gsol la mos pa'i sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i stobs kyi che ba nyid yang bar bsad pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' bdud 'dul bster te// yod gnyis dang the tsam du byu
404a4(1): pa'i mi dang / lha rnams kyi yid gnyis dang the tsom gcad pa'i phyir bdud 'dul ba sten pa'o// bdud kyi sde yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bdud 'dul ba ston to// zab mo dang / g.yul
404a5(1): la mos pa'i lha dang mi rnams kun nas bsdu ba dang / nas kun nas 'dus pa'i lha dang mi rnams 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir bdud 'dul ba son to// byang chub sems dpa' mthul thub pa med pa
404a6(1): yongs su bstan pa'i phyir bdud 'dul bston to// sems can gnan mos shing sgo bar bya ba'i phyir bdung 'dul ba b.ran te// phyi ma'i skye rnams la srid rje ba'i phyir bdud 'dul ba san/ 
404a7(1): stong pa byang chub kyi bar gyi bdud kyi las yongs su bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi las thams cad las 'das pa yongs su bstan pa'i phyir bdud 'dul la ston/ 
404b1(1): mongs pa'i stobs kyis nyam smad cing stobs med par byas pa yongs su bstan pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su brjod pa dang / byams pa'i stobs yang yadag par bstan pa'i phyir bdud
404b2(1): 'dul ba ston pa'o// kun nas nyon mongs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa dag tu chos nyid rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' bdud 'dul bstan pa'o// kye rgyal
404b3(1): ba'i sras don bcu po de dag gi dbang thob pas na byang chub sems dpa' bdud 'dul ba ston pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs
404b4(1): pa'i stobs mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams bdud dang las dang nyon mongs pa thams cad las 'das shing / 
404b5(1): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad la rnam par rtse bar yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan
404b6(1): 'byam klas pa thams cad dang ldan pa yin/ chos dkar po'i tshigs thams cad yang dag par bsags pa yin/ chos snang bar dpyad par bya ba thams cad shin tu rnam par phye ba yin/ 
404b7(1): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab pa'i lus dang ldan pa yin sems can thams cad la snyoms pa'i sems dang dbyangs su ldan pa yin/ byin gyi brlabs thams cad kyis rab mchog par
405a1(1): byin gyis brlabs pa yin/ 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang / da ltar byang ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / dgongs pa rnam par mi rtog pa thob
405a2(1): pa yin/ skad cig gcig gis dus gsum rnam par 'tshang rgya ba yin/ shin tu rnam par sangs rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang rab tu thob pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang
405a3(1): ldan pa yin te/ 'di ltar gnas dang gnas ma yin pa'i stobs dang ldan pa yin/ zag pa zad par shes po'i bar gyi stobs dang yang ldan pa yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni
405a4(1): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ste/ stobs bcu po de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni de bzhin gshes
405a5(1): ba zhes bya ba'i grangs su bgro'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni chos kyi
405a6(1): 'khor lo chen po rnam bcur bskor te/ rnam pa bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar mi 'jigs pas shin tu sbyangs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa dang / so so yang dag par rig par bzhi'i sgra zhes
405a7(1): rtswa bslags pa dang / bden pa pazhi'i tshul gyis shin tu brtags pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa sgrib pa med pa'i rjes su seng ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems
405b1(1): dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / thogs pa med cing blta bar dka' la g.yo ba med cing sdug bsnga gyi gsal shing 'byin pa dang / sngon gyi snying rje chen po'i byin gyi brlabs pa dang
405b2(1): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du grag pa dang / bskal pa grangs med par chos ston pa rgyun mi chad pa dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / bsam gtan dang / 
405b3(1): rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / legs par spyad pas bskor ba'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras sgo rnam pa bcu po de dag la sogs pa rnam pa chang
405b4(1): med par de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos 'khor lo
405b5(1): de ni sems can gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud la chos dkar po'i rnam pa bcus thogs pa med pa dang / mngon pa med par 'byung bar 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar smon lam thams
405b6(1): kyi stobs kyi shugs dang / snying rje chen po'i byin gyi brlabs dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad mi gtong ba dang / ye shes kyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston
405b7(1): pa dang / rus la bab par zab par byed pa dang / rigs pa'i tshul bzhin du mi 'khrul pa dang / dus gsum shes par bya ba rab tu rtogs pa dang / lus kyi dbang zil gyis minon po dang
406a1(1): tshig gi dbang dang dmigs par dka' ba dang / ye shes kyi dbang tshig bzhin du khong du chud byed pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras chos dkar po'i rnam pa bcu po de dag
406a2(1): gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'khor lo sems can gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud la thogs pa med pa dang / mngon par med par 'byung
406a3(1): bar 'gyur ba'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las rdzogs par mdzad zin pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni don bcu'i dbang
406a4(1): gzigs nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba chen po ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar rdzogs par ji lta ba bzhin du 'du shes byed mi rtag pa yongs su bstan pa dang / 'dus byas thams
406a5(1): yid brtan du mi rung bar bstan pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyogs bde bar 'gro bas 'jigs pa dang bag chab thams cad dang bral ba yang dag par bstan pa dang / gzugs kyi sku la zhen pa'i 'dra
406a6(1): lha dang ma rnams la gzugs kyi lus mi rtag pa nyid du yang dag par bstan pa dang / chos kyi skul yang dag par sbyar ba dang / rnam par 'gyur ba'i mthu phyir mi zlog par yongs su bstan pa dang / 
406a7(1): sgra 'du byed thams cad 'dod pa dgur ma ring zhing dbang bsgyur du med pa yongs su bstan pa dang / so gsum gyi 'khor ba thams cad sgra ma'i rnam par lta bur yongs su bstan pa dang / mya ngan las bas
406b1(1): pa ni snying po dam pa ste mi 'jigs chos nyid du yang bar bstan pa dang / kun 'byang zhing 'jigs pas dpral bar 'gyur ba yongs su bstan pa dang / kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi
406b2(1): chos nyid kyis kyang de bzhin te/ sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad rdzogs par mdzad de/ dgongs pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs shing chos kyi 'khor lo bskor shin tu bskor te/ 'dul ba thams cad shin dul
406b3(1): nas/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad shin tu lung bstan par gyur te/ mnyam pa med pa'i go 'phang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras don bcu
406b4(1): po de dag par gzigs nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mnyam pa med pa'i go 'phang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po yongs su ston to// kye rgyal ba'i sras
406b5(1): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yongs su spyod pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo ste/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mang pos gsungs pa'o// don tshad med pa khong du chud par 'gyur ba'o// 
406b6(1): mkhas pa'i skye bo dga' bar byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa dang / smon lam chen po rgyun mi 'chad par byed pa'o// sems can gang gis 'di thos par 'gyur te/ 
406b7(1): thos kyang mos par byed pa dang / mos par gyur nas kyang nan gyis yang dag par sgrub pa de dag thams cad myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su mngon par 'tshang rgya bar
407a1(1): 'gyur ro// kye rgyal ba'i sras de ci'i phyir zhe na byang chub sa ni byang chub sems dpa' nan tan lhur byed pa rnams kyis 'grub kyi nan tan dang mi ldan pa rnams kyis
407a2(1): ma yin no// kye rgyal ba'i sras de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ran tan la gnas pas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sgo'i spyang ba dang yon tan gyi 'byung gnas
407a3(1): ngornarnam par gdon maza ba'i matog chos kyi sku thams cad la yang dag par gzhol pa'i ye shes kyi sgrol 'jug pa'i 'jig rten gyi lam thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ nyan rdzas dpa
407a4(1): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lam dang bral ba 'gro ba thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa/ chos thams cad kyi sgo snang bar byed pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das
407a5(1): pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar byed pa 'di ma gror byas te mnyan par bya'o// bla mar bya'o// yongs su bzung bar bya'o// yongs su gzung nas kyang nges par rtogs pa'i sgos yongs
407a6(1): sra sbyang ba dang / smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa la bstan par bya'o//  rgyal ba'i sras de ltar btsun pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ni blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byu
407a7(1): rna chu ba dzin pa ma yin no// 'dzig rten mas 'das pa'i chos kyi sgom 'i masathams cad kyi sgor yang dag par ga nam chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthu
407b1(1): kyi rnam grangs 'di'i chos nyid thob pas/ phyogs thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa rnams rab tu g.yos par gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams g.yos par gyur to/ de dag
407b2(1): thams cad kyang snang ba chen pos rgyas shing gsal bar gyur to// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyang dgyes par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la zhal bstan
407b3(1): nas gsung brjod pa/ kye rgyal bu legs so legs laso// ji ltar khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u byang chub
407b4(1): sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / yon tan gyi 'byung gnas don rnamasar gdon mi za ba'i me tog chos kyi sgo thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba ye shes kyi sgo la 'jug pa/ 'jig rten gyi
407b5(1): lam thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lam bral ba/ 'gro ba thams cad mthun mong ma yin pa'i chos thams cad kyi sgo snang bar byed
407b6(1): pa 'gro ba thams cad kyi 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar byed pa 'di bstan pa ni/ rgyal ba'i bu khyed kyis chos 'di dag la legs par bslabs
407b7(1): pas shin tu byung ba ste/ rgyal ba'i bu khyod kyis chos kyi byin brlabs dang / mthus mos pa'i chos kyi rnams grangs 'di legs par bshes de/ nged kyis kyang mngon par bsngags so// 
408a1(1): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang mngon par bsngags so// kye rgyal ba'i bu khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'didi ltar dang / ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
408a2(1): rnams kyis mthos pa'i chos thos par bya ba'i phyir nged kyis byin gyis brlabs par mdzad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs
408a3(1): kyis phyogs bcur ldas te/ 'khar gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la bltas nas/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras sa// gang rnams de dag pa sal pa
408a4(1): gakhragu khrig sang du brtul nubs dka' spyad pa/ gang rnams de dag sangs rgyas byeg khrag drog phreng las 'byung ba'i chos kyi smras/ gang rnams de dag sems can bye khrag phrog steng rnams byang chub 'amadang
408a5(1): dperla med pa de dag rnams kyi spyad pa bshad kyis rtse gcig nyan par byos/ gang dag sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig mtha' yas mchod kyang bdag ni sangs rgyas mi gnas pa/ gang dag nyon mongs bcings pa'i
408a6(1): bzar byung sems can 'du shes mi gnas dang / gang rnams de dag sangs rgyas yon tan rtag tu tsam sang san ngan ma gnas pa/ de dag 'jig rten du druga' bar byed pa'i spyong mchog mangs par byed/ gang rnam
408a7(1): ded gzung pa ga man da mangs 'ang kyi ba ma shAs/ ga mas na 'dags pamam ca ldananapa rgyam tshig rnyed panan pa'i// gang mas de shi tshus dag na ma sa ma
408b1(1): bsam pa zhi zhing rab zhi pa/ 'gro ba rnams la spyod pa'i rim pa ston pa de dag yon tan brjod par bya/ gang rnams de dag gdud g.yo 'gro kun las rgal te thams cad las sprul pa sna tshogs tha dang mtha' mas
408b2(1): rab tu ston/ sems skyed gyur ma thag tu gnas dang 'jig rten pa'i bya ba thams cad ston byed pa/ de dag yon tan sna tshogs mdzes pa sems can dga' bar byed pa/ brjod par bya/ srid pa'i rgyu na sems
408b3(1): can sdug bsngal nyan cing skye dang dga' bas gzir ba dang / 'chi dang mya ngan 'das kyis gtses shing gnod byas nyon mongs kun tu gzir mthong nas/ de dag thar bar bya ba'i phyir snying rje chen bskyed nas ye shes mchog 'god pa/ 
408b4(1): de dag yon tan shin tu dge ba'i phyogs tsam bshad kyis rtse gcig gzhan par byas// sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus dga' bar bsam gtan la yang rnam par brtsen// shes rab thabs kyi pha rol phyin
408b5(1): cing byams dang snying rje'i lhag pa'i bsam pa dang dga' ba'i chos la brtson zhing btang snyoms dga' bas bskal pa brgyar yang spyod pa spyad kyang // de dag spyod ldan yon tan ldan pa rnams kyi yon tan bstan gyis de
408b6(1): dag nyon// gang rnams de dag byang chub gnyer phyir bye ba khrag khrig steng gis skems pa/ gang rnams byang chub zhi pa tshol phyir srog lnga lnga ba med par gyur pa dang // gang rnams de dag sems can pa na rtag brtson
408b7(1): bdag gi bde ba mi tshol ba/ byams dang snying rje'i sems dang ldan thub pa de dag kun gyi spyod mchog brjod par bya// rgya mtsho'i chu thigs grangs pa re res thams cad zad par bya bar rung srid kyi/ dengs
409a1(1): yon tan bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig du ma stong du brjod byas kyang // dpe tsam bya bar mi nus legs par brjed cing bstan par mi nus 'on kyang go/ sems can pan pa'i
409a2(1): don du sangs rgyas yul rnams bstan par bya ba mnyan par byos// gang dag 'gro ba rnams kyi don phyir dge ba kun 'dzin dkar po 'phel byed kyang // mthe bar mi sems dpa' bar sems med mi
409a3(1): mi dman chos chos tshol ngoms par yang mi 'gyur// 'gro ba kun gnas don nyer chu klung ye shes mtsho che ngangab shing spong ste// son pa'i mkhas pa de dag rnams nis lngar 'gro ba thams cad 'tsho ba yin/ 
409a4(1): byams pa'i brlan yin snying rje'i rtsa bdaga' ba sdeng po brtan pa sdom pa ste/ zab le shes drini rdul khrims bzang ba'i lom me tog yon na can/ sangs rgyas med kyis rab tu rgyas byas blo gros ldan pa sems
409a5(1): can dgar byed pa/ de dang dag pad+ma lta bur 'dus byas ma gos 'gro ba rnams la snang / sa bon mos pos gzhi bsam pa byams dang snying rje dag ni rtsa ba ste/ sdong po shes rab thams ni yal ga lcug mdag ni pha rol
409a6(1): phyin rab lnga/ bsam gtan shes rab mngon shes matog rgyas pa kun mkhyen ye shes 'bras bu ste/ chos kyi shing mchog rdzu 'phrul bya 'khong de dang des ni 'jig rten gsum po khyebs/ rim gyis dkar yang
409a7(1): spel pa'i sras ni pan pa rnams ni dang pas// dran pa 'dzin pa byung mchas shes rabam mas ma pa rlo che ba// grong ba dngas sum dang zug pa gyis sa nga sris da kyim nas / 
409b1(1): de dag seng ge lta bur bdag med sgra 'byin bdud sde rab tu skrag par byed/ 'gro ba ma lus rnams ni 'khor ba'i 'grog dgon nyon mongs mi zad la khyams gyur te/ bdud kyi byam dang rkun par bcas pas dril cang gti mun
409b2(1): mdongs gyur pa/ lam ni rab ma stor mi mkhas sems can mthong nas ded dpon mkhas pa de dag ni/ lam gyi mthar khrid 'jigs med pa'i grong khyer dam pa mchog la rab tu 'god// 'gro ba dag ni 'dod chags
409b3(1): zhe sdang mun pa nyon mongs sna tshogs nad btab cing // yun ring nas ni 'dus byas sdug bsngal dag la gzhol zhing sdug bsngal rab 'bar ba// sems can mthong nas snying rje bskyed de nyon mongs pa'i nad pa
409b4(1): kun gso zhing // nad rnams zhi bar byed pa stong phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi dam pa dag kyang ston// rgyal po lta bur de dang de dag 'khor rnams dgar byed 'grol chos ston pa// sdig par spobs la dge bar snyen
409b5(1): cing sangs rgyas yon tan rnams kyang tshel cig ces/ rkang gnyis dbang po'i chos kyi yul kun mkhyen ye shes dbang bar dbang bskur ba// rgya chen byang chub yan lag rin cen 'byung gnas de dag 'gro ba'i
409b6(1): 'phags pa'i nor// tshul khrims lte ba ting 'dzin mkhyud brgyan pa'i ye shes 'od dang shes rab mtshon// ye shes rno ba'i gzhung can nyon mongs 'jom zhing bdud kyi sde rnams dkrug byed pa/ 
409b7(1): ye shes chos kyi sgron ma che 'byin mchog rnams de dang de dag sangs rgyas bskor ba yin// 'khar ma mtsho rnams pasgos ning pa'i margol ba dag dang mu stegs thams cing 'joms/ lazhi ba
410a1(1): @pad shin tu rgya chen chos kyi ro dang ldan/ byang chub yan lag de bzhin bsam gtan rin chen gang ba 'gro kun shes par dka'/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i las kyi mtha' brlabs mtha'
410a2(1): yas yul rnams dag cing lhag bsam dge/ de dang de dag ye shes rgya mtsho mtshungs med bstan pas zad par mi 'gyur ro// 'jig rten rab 'phags rtag du yul gyis mi gos 'gro ba rnams kyi gnas gyur pa
410a3(1): bsam gtan mngon shes rab 'phel ye shes rtse mo lhag pa'i bsam pa mi skul ba/ gang dag de dang nyer srad shes rab ye shes mchog gi rab tu 'dra bar 'gyur// de dang de dag yon tan ri bar shes rab rab brtan
410a4(1): 'gre bkun gyis bltas// lhag pa'i bsam pa mchog ni rdo rje mtshungs shing 'dras brtul zhugs thams cad brtan// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyad lam bsam pa ma byed de
410a5(1): bdud dang sems canan mangs 'jig rten du dgags rnam paskyong bang lda pa// deng nga dag 'jig ngas pa ma mangs 'bar ba dag las brlag par byed// byams pa'i sgon rnams kun 'dus kyi ma
410a6(1): ba rig pa rjog ca tu gapa/ thub pa rnams ni du 'phrul gnas pa ni dbyas kyi 'jug nga sa rdzuH/ sam das par na dang rdul rnams parnalas brgya na bsas pa
410a7(1): shA de dag sbyi me na mangs ni bring sems cad da byar medan par 'phags// shes rabar bdag 'ding khros pa dag ni 'bas te chos kyi rgyal mtshan bslang // mi shes shing dgas yin mer pa'i sgo phyi 'ad pa das pa
410b1(1): ma// bden pa rnams ni la mchen bzhi ste dge ba'i rdzu 'phrul rab brgyan pa// snying pa gsuman bdud sde dag gis ma thub grang khyer chos cid dag du ston// thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos mtshan shing la rab 'an
410b2(1): rdzu 'phral rkang pa'i rkang pa brtan// bshog pa thabs kyi stabs te pha rol gnon mthu byas dang snying rje mi gnyis yin// ston pa de dag 'gro ba kun mthub meng mkha' lding dbang po'i drag shul 'dra// srid pa'i
410b3(1): nas 'don cing lha mi rnams kyang mya ngan 'da' ba'i mchog la 'god// tshul khrims dkyil 'khor rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i shugs lnga na ye shes 'od gzer phreng ba mdzes// 'od snang kun 'char nyon mongs 'joms
410b4(1): shing srid pa'i brgya mtsho rab tu skam par byed// stobs dang dbang po dge ba'i sman 'phel sems can pad mo yongs su rgyas byed pa// de dang de dag snang byed chos kyi nyi ma'i khyu mchog 'gro ba kun tu 'byung / 
410b5(1): dbyings rnam par dag dkyil 'khor 'gro ba kun gyis bltas na mdzes pa ste// nyan thos rang rgyal rnams kyi tshogs mang skar ma 'dra ba dag ni zil gyis mnan// sems kyi rgyud rnams mthong nas srid pa
410b6(1): gsum du 'phel dang 'grib pa rnam par ston// de dang de dag ye shes zla ba 'gro la 'char zhing mkhas pa nam mkha'i mtha'// chos kyi dbang po 'gro ba kun la dbang byed gzugs dang yon tan dag gis brgyan/ 
410b7(1): ye shes rdo rje mkha' ba thabs ni mig ste chos la dbang chen skur gnas pa// lus dang mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po sna tshogs kun gyis blta ba'i dbang po ste// ches kyi 'gro ba kun las rgyal ba de dang de dag gi
411a1(1): dbang po yin/ srid pa gsum na 'dod pa'i 'dam dang nyon mongs las las rab 'das kun dbang po// byams pa snang dang thugs rje bsam gtan dga' dang btang snyoms rnams
411a2(1): la mos// srid pa gsum po kun tu tha dang lus ston chos kyi sgras kyang gi byed pa// de dang de dag tshangs pa lta bur ma ngag mos shing lta ba'i rnam pa sel// 'khor las rab 'das shing rnam dag lu
411a3(1): dang ldan pa bdag po'i chos kyi dbang // phyir ldog mi 'gyur blo gros che 'chang gang rnams theg pa dma' dang tha dad la// chos kyi dbang po dbang skur 'jig rten dam pa ye shes phyir ldog mi 'gyur ba/ 
411a4(1): thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan dbang phyug grags chen de dang de dag 'jig rten dbang // nam mkha'i dbyings lta bur dngos dang rnam bral dmigs pa thams cad rnam brtsil pa// 'gro ba kun du bya ba
411a5(1): rnams lem pa mchog ci la 'ang gnas pa med pa ste// 'gro ba kun du spyod pa dkar zhugs mkhas pa de dag rab du mi gnas// de dang de dag ye shes dge zhing dag pas shes rab nam mkha'i dbyings dang
411a6(1): / de dag shin tu che mkhas ldanas ltar 'gro ba kun gyi gsas// chu 'dra dang de dag thams dang snying rjes non mongs rnams ni rab tu sel// de dang dag ye shes mesan mamam
411a7(1): ga tsang bag chags bcas pa bstsal// ston pa dedag mi gnas rlung dang 'dra bar srid pa gsum na rab turgya/ de nga ngag rin chen 'dras shin tu dkon zhing 'gro ba dbul yang sel/ de
411b1(1): dag rdo rje lta bur srid pa gsum na lta ba kun tu 'jom// de dang de dag yon tan kun gyi 'phreng ba sna tshogs 'jig rten gsum mdzes byed// smon pa de dag ner bu rin chen mtshungs 'dra spyod pa kun gyi
411b2(1): gtsug tu phyin// de dang de dag me tog lta bur yon tan rab rgyas byang chub yan lag rtse// 'phreng ba lta bu de dang de dag smon lam bcings shing 'jig rten mgo la gnas// de dang de dge tshul khrims
411b3(1): ma nyams skyon med rnam dag dri ni dri rab zhim// de dang de dag 'jig rten gsum na chos dang ye shes kyis ni bag chags dag/ gdugs 'dra dang de dag stobs kyi bla res nyon mongs rdulas skyob par byed/ 
411b4(1): ye shes rgya mtsho bsgreng ba'i thugs mnga' de dang de dag spyod pa'i ba dan sna tshogs yid 'ong ye shes kun tu 'phags// gos 'dra de dang de dag rdzu 'phrul yon tan 'gro ba kun la khebs par byed/ theg pa
411b5(1): 'dra ba khyu mchog mtha' yas de dang de dag 'jig rten gsum las 'byin te/ de dang de dag rab tul glang po lta bur yid kyis rtag du dul la gnas// de dang des ni rdzu 'phrul rtas ni khal chem khyer zhing 'jig rte gsum
411b6(1): las 'da'// klu'i dbang po lta bur de dag de dag sems kyi yul du chos 'char 'bebs// de dang de dag 'gro ba kun la me tog u dum+WA ra mtshungs 'dra shin tu dkon// dpa' bo lta bur de dang de dag nyon mongs 'jom zhing
411b7(1): bdud kyi sde rnams 'khrag/ mi ldog 'khor lo lta bu de dang de dag 'dren pa rnams kyis rab tu btsud// de dang de dag sprin ma lta bur mun pa sel cing sems can la yang sten// de dang de dag chu klung lta bur
412a1(1): du brtan pa la brtson pa yin/ las kyi rig ga thams cad dang mi 'gal bar gnas pa yin/ byang chub sems dpe spyod pa rigs thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la rab tu brtson pa yin/ 
412a2(1): smon lam gyi rigs thams cad rgyun mi gcod pa'i phyir yang dag par zhugs pa yin dus gsum gyi rgyud thams cad ye shes kyis khong du chud par bya ba la zhugs pa yin mos pa'i rigs shin du brtan par
412a3(1): bya ba'i phyir brtson pa yin te/ de ni de bzhin gshegs ma mang ba thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yang dag par dgongs pa yin/ byang chub sems
412a4(1): dpa'i thams cad dang mnyams pa nyid du gyur pa yin/ 'phags pa thams cad kyis rjes su dgyes par bya ba yin/ tshangs pa'i dbang po thams cad kyis mngon par dga' bar byas pa yin/ lha'i
412a5(1): dbang po thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod pa yin/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang po thams cad kyis yongs su bsrung ba yin/ srin po'i dbang po thams cad kyis rim gror byas pa yin/ klu'i dbang
412a6(1): thams cad kyis bsra pa yin/ mi'am chi'i dbang pa thams cad kyis mngon par bgrod pa yin/ 'jig rten gyi dbang ba thams cad kyis yang dag par bsngags pa yin/ des ni sems cad
412a7(1): khams thams cad kyang 'ang ming gi las rgyang gsum tha yangs su gcod pa dang / mkham pa dang / ngang sang ga las thams cad thog pa dang / dpral ba'i 'am thams cad las yang dag
412b1(1): bar bzla ba dang / lha dang mi'i phun sum rtogs pa thob par bya ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong ba dang / ma 'bral ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po mnyar pa dang / 'bral bar
412b2(1): mi 'gyur ba dang / byang chub kyi sems kyi yan lag yongs su dag par bya ba dang / byang chub kyi sems 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i las snang ba thob par bya
412b3(1): ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes khong du chud par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sa la gnas par bya bas dbugs phyin par byas pa yin/ rigs kyi bu de la bdag 'di snyam
412b4(1): du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dga' ba byed pa ste/ 'byung bar dka' zhing mthong bar dka'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can rnams la bag dro bar byed
412b5(1): bas pa dang ma lta bu'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi rkyen du gyur pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sdug bsngal gyis mnar ba rnams la skyabs su
412b6(1): thar ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'gro ba thams cad yongs su brda bsrung ba'i phyir gnas su gyur ba/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'jigs pa sna tshogs kyis bcas
412b7(1): brnams la dpung gnyen du gyur pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'gro ba thams cad ngan song gsum du lhung ba las yongs su ston pa'i phyir rlung gi dkyil 'khor la bu'o// byang chub
413a1(1): yon tan ded cing lam rgyun rjes 'gro/ de dang de dag rngam pa lta bur ngal ba med par rtag tu 'gro ba ste// glu dang gru chen lta bur smon lam rab btab ye shes gangs chen mtsho
413a2(1): thob byed// de dang de dag mnyan pa lta bur 'gro ba ye shes thang chen mchog la 'god// de dag bskyed mas tshal dga' la rtse zhing 'gro la yang dag spyod pa sten// de dag chos kyi rnam thar mngon shes me
413a3(1): tog ye shes gzhal med khang dag pa/ mkhas pa de dang de dag sman ltar nang ni byed cing nyon mongs rab tu sel// sman gyis rgyas pa'i gangs ri lte bur de dang de dag ye shes 'byung gnas so// de dag sangs
413a4(1): rgyas lta bur ye shes kyis ni 'gro ba gnyid log mun pa sel// yang dag sangs rgyas lta bur gzhan min yid kyis 'gro ba yang dag rtogs par byed// de dang de dag rgyal ba 'dra de ltar 'ongs te mkhas pa de nyid
413a5(1): gnas// de dag thams cad mkhyen pa lta bur ye shes 'byung gnas skor yang zhugs// zhi ba bskyed pa de dang de dag ston pas rab bsngags 'gro ba kun la s+ho// de dang de dag rang gi ye shes yul dang thams
413a6(1): cang mkhyen gyi spyod yul shes// de dang de dag tshad med dpung dang 'dra bar 'gro ba kun la thub pa med// de dag ye shes mi 'jigs blo gros 'chad pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos kyang shes// gang na gang
413a7(1): b+ha rang 'grob gyi gzugs dang ma mas ming snang ma ga// kun tu gzugs songs bzugs pa rjes bu yang meng mang byangs su meng pa yin/ gzugs rnams kun las 'das nang mang sa
413b1(1): bar bral yang bya ba thams cad sten// de dag mthun 'gro ba rnams kyis rnam pa kun tu brjed par mi nus so// gang dag 'di 'dra'i yon tan thob cing dngos bral dngos po med pa'i chos gnas shing / 
413b2(1): yid dang med pa'i mdud pa thams cad bral ba'i ye shes mngon gsum can// thams cad shes kyang ye shes rten pa ma yin ye shes de la gnas pa min// de dag sbyong la 'jug pa yid 'ong 'jig
413b3(1): rten dag par byed pa bshad par bya// chos kyi tshul ni sgyu ma'i rang bzhin dngos po dben pa lta bur rab rtogs nas// mkhas pa sangs rgyas byin gyis rlabs kyis sman lam thabs dang snying rje dag kyang
413b4(1): byed/ sprul pa'i ye shes sgo dang ldan pas khyu mchog bya ba sna tshogs rab ston pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' ma nor yid can rtse gcig mnyam pa med pa lags par grag/ lus gcig
413b5(1): la mtha' yas lus dang rgya chen lus rnams tha dad rab tu ston// sems med yid med sems kyi yul med 'on kyang 'gro ba kun tu de dag ston// khyu mchog brjod pa'i pha rol phyin pa de dag
413b6(1): dbyangs gcig rnam par brjod byed kyang // 'gro ba dag sgra skad ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu brjod// nyon mongs rgyud 'byung lus dang bral yang sems can rnams kyi lus la dbang
413b7(1): sbyar te// brjod du med pa'i tshul gyis zhi ba rtogs shing sgra rnams thams cad rab tu ston// de dag sems kyi rang bzhin zhi zhing 'ad gsal nam mkha' mtshungs pa yang dag shes// 'gro ba kun
414a1(1): la lar sna tshogs chos rnams su tshol// la lar sangs rgyas gyur cing zhing rnams bye ba brgyar khyab 'gro bar ston byed kyang // byang chub don tu spyod pa de dag tshogs rnams las kyang
414a2(1): phyir ldog ma yin no// bskal pa'i grangs la 'jug pa'i pha rol phyin pas bskal bye ba drug brgya dag/ khyu mchog sems gci nang ga rnasems gcig bskal pa brgyar yang de bzhin ston pa byed
414a3(1): 'gro ba thams cad la yang rtog mi rtog rtog pa'i yul rnams thams cad ston// sogs pa med pa'i cing phyogs la gnas med spyod pa de dag kyang rab tu ston// gang phyir rgyal ba des rgyal de dag ci rtse'i
414a4(1): phyogs med kun na bzhugs pas na// 'gro ba kun gyi rgyal ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad rdul cig steng du mthong // sangs rgyas zhing rnams bsgrubs dang sems can yul dang chos kyi rgyu tshul rnams kyang
414a5(1): mthong // de ltar brtson pas bskal pa khrag khrig brtson byed 'on kyang cha shas zad mi 'gyur// de ltar 'gro ba kun gyi sems can tshul rnams mtha' yas rgya chen rab tu shes// sems can gcig
414a6(1): la mtha' mas lus dang rlung dngad bye ba khrag khrig yod pa rnams// de dag 'gro ba gcig dang ma lus thams cad dag las rnam pa kun tu sbyin pa byed// bslab pa 'di'i phyogs la pha rol phyin sa
414a7(1): bslabs rnams ni ston pa byed// dbang po rnon po dang ni 'bring dang gang dag dbang po rtul ba 'ang rab shes nas// 'gro ba skal ba med pa'i dbang po'i 'khor lo bskor bar byed// dbang por rel
414b1(1): yang dbang po thams cad rnam pa phan tshun gnas pa dang // dbang po'i dngos po phra ba'i tshul dang gang dag dbang po bstan pa'ang rab tu shes// de ltar khams dang mos dang bsam spyod dang nyon mongs
414b2(1): bag chags rnams kyang shes// sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha'i sems can spyod da ltar byung ba'ang de bzhin te// sems can kun gyi spyod pa'i pha rol phyin kyang 'ong dang 'gro ba yong ma yin// ma nor
414b3(1): spyod pa shes nas 'gro ba kun la chos kyi dam pa ston pa byed// de ltar sems kyi sems spyod sna tshogs kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dag/ sems cig la ni khong du chud nas byang chub mchog tu kun mkhyen
414b4(1): nam sangs rgyas// sems kyi skad cig gcig gis 'o ba rnams phye rang gi shes pas rtogs gyur na sa// sems kyi tshul shes sems med rab tu gzhol bas ye shes mchog la kun kyang dgod/ rdzu 'phrul
414b5(1): mchog theb me shes khyu mchog mngon par shes pa kun gyis rab tu 'phags// sems bskyed gcig gis khrag khrig mtha' yas zhing dang phyogs rnams thams cad du'ang 'gro// de ltar ye shes dbang
414b6(1): sgyur 'gro zhing bskal pa bye khrag khrig zad byed kyang // skra rgyung shin tu phra ba gcig la zhugs par gnas las gar yang 'pho ba med// 'tsho ba'i don du sgyu mkhan gzugs rnams sna tshogs 'gro ba kun la ston
414b7(1): byed kyang / sgyu ma kun btsal gzugs su mi dmigs yong ma yin par dmigs pa med// de ltar mkhas pa ye shes thabs dang shes rab rgya chen sgyu mar zhugs pa rnams// sprul pa phun sum tshogs

415a2(1): ltar chos nyid dag pa dkyil mchog la shes pas shin tu 'phags pa rnams// 'gro ba dag pa'i sems kyi yul la snang yang 'gro bdag dang 'dres ma yin// la la gnyid log rmi lam dag na bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad
415a3(1): byed/ lon byeg khrag khrig mang bzang par mis kyang mtshan ma de ma zang // de ltar chos nyid rang bzhin mtshungs par rjes bya ba sa tshogs kun ga te/ skang cig gcig la bskal pa bye ba dang byeng dag ye shes zang mi 'brang
415a4(1): re'i dpung po'o sul gnas pa 'jig rten dag dang mnyan du thos pa'i sgra// kun nas sgra'i sgra brnyan de dag 'dra bar brjed kyang rtogacing g.yo ba med/ de bzhin chos kyi rang bzhin shes pa'i khyum chog byang chub sems dpa'
415a5(1): mkhas pa dag/ rtog pa med par sems can sgra rnams ji snyed par ni chos dang spyod pa ston// dpyid zla dag gi smig rgyu g.yos la ji ltar sems can chur ni 'du shes nas// de nas chu rnyed mi 'gyur btung du med cing je bas je skom
415a6(1): rnam 'phel ba// de ltar mkhas pa thar la zhugs pa sems can dag gi nyon mongs g.yo ba rnams// shes pas rtogs nas sems cad 'du shes bya med phyir zhing bya ba rnam par 'phel// gzugs ni dbu lta bu nA
415a7(1): mtshas man mor ba rgya chung 'ang/ 'du gas rnams sa rgyam zung gsus 'dus byas chu skyes shi nga 'dra// sems ni spyam dra pasgru bya skyed byed de zhin na shegs bya ba sa tshugs rab tus
415b1(1): lhar daphung po dgod pa ston kyang dbang sbyar dag ni de la gnas pa med/ skye mchod stong pa'i rang bzhin dbang med 'phrul 'khor bya ba kun du 'byin byed dang / khams ni chos kyi dbyings mtshungs dngos po ngan/ 
415b2(1): dang bral bar 'gro ba rnams la ston// dam pa'i don tshul bzhin las ni bden pa sna tshogs rnams kyang rab tu ston// de ltar de dag chos tshul rnam par dgod pa sten pa byed kyang gnas pa med// 
415b3(1): 'ong ba med cing phyogs su 'gro ba med la rgyud du gnas pa med pa yi// nyon mongs rgyu las byung ba'i las dang la sdug bsngal de ltar lam gsum du// rkyen la rag las 'byung ba rnams dang
415b4(1): yod dang med las rab tu 'das pa yi// yang dag don dam dbu ma'i lam ni dngos po med la gnas pa rab ston// skad cig gcig la dus gsum khong du chud bya'i/ skad cig sna tshogs rnams
415b5(1): kyang ston// 'dod dang gzugs dang gzugs med khams kyis yul dang bya ba sna tshogs ston par byed// sdom pa gsum gyi spyod dang rab tu ldan zhing thar pa gsum yang rab tu ston// thams cad mkhyen pa
415b6(1): nyid du gcig la theg pa gsum du rnam pa dgod pa de bzhin ston/ gnas dang gnas ma yin pa rab tu dbye ba'i chos dang dbang po pha rol phyin// khams dang mam pa dag dang nyon mongs rnam 'byed kun du
415b7(1): 'gro bzong gyur pa// mig gi yul gyur sngon gyi gnas pa dran zhing nyon mongs ni bar mkhas dag/ sangs rgyas stobs bcu dag gis ye shes shes shin du 'das kyang stobs la dmigs pa med/ 
416a1(1): sangs rgyas thams cad rjes dpog stong 'gro ba kun tu mngon gsum ches bzhed de// nyon mongs pa zag pa lhan cig skyes pa mi mnga' byang ba'ang brnyes par gyur pa med/ 'byung bas
416a2(1): thugs su chud pa'i ye shes rgya chen des ni 'gro ba 'dom mdzad// 'di'i gnas la rgyal sras 'jigs pa med cing 'on kyang zhi bar spyod pa med// 'phrul pa mi mnga' lam las g.yo ba 'ang mi mnga' dgongs
416a3(1): pa nyams pa'ang mi mnga' ste// mes dang brtson 'grus ting 'dzin shes rab rnam par 'byed pa ye shes gang du'ang rnams pa// thams cad ma khyed mngang dus gsum mdzad dus gsum kun la mngon sum mkhyen
416a4(1): mnga' ba// 'gro ba kun gyis mthob byams pa'i chos nyid mi 'phrogs chags pa med bsres pa// ches sgo gang dag gis ni spyad pa 'di dag yon tan mang po don gyis rgyan pa'i phyogs nam bdag gis brjod par
416a5(1): bye/ de dag spyod pa bskal pa khrag khrig dag tu brjod kyang zad par mi nus te// 'on kyang ji ltar sa las rdul 'dra ye shes spyod pa phyogs tsam brjod par bya// sangs rgyas ye shes rten ldan bsam pa thog
416a6(1): pas ngo mtshar 'du shes gnas pa'i rnams// spyod pa mchog dang ldan zhing byams pa'i rjes song brtson 'grus brtan pas rnam gnon cing // tshul khrims g.yo dbugs 'byin de dag 'gro ba thams cad yongs su
416a7(1): sa byes/ l+r-i sa ba rgyal sasarnams kyi srung ba rgyal pa na tha par byed// sangs rgyas man tan dag la zhugs kyang sems can sems dang ldan tsha sems pa med// ngas
416b1(1): pa'i dus la 'jug pa'i ye shes ldan zhing mkhas pa skyo ba'i 'du shes med// gzugs kyi tshul dang yang dag tha dang stobs rnams thob cing yang dag don gyis rgal// bstan pa mtshungs med sems kyis
416b2(1): mkhas pa byang chub zhi pa rnam par 'chang yang rgya// sems kyi skyed pa thams cad bzang po'i yon tan spyod pa'i mchog tu ston par byed// snying rje'i rkyen dang byams pa'i mchog rten byang chub dam pa spyod par byed
416b3(1): dang ldan// brtson pas pha rol phyin rtogs rab tu mkhas shing skyo ba'i pha rol phyin gyur pas// khyu mchog mos dang rab tu rtogs pa'i stobs thob byang chub dam pa mngon 'tshang rgya// mnyam pa nyid kyis
416b4(1): mnyam pa thob cing ye shes tshul gyis chos mchog ston byed pa// yon tan thob byed spobs dang ldan pa de dag chos kyi dbang phyug mchog tu 'gyur// dbang la gnas kyang gnas pa med pa'i sa mnyam pa
416b5(1): med pa'i sems kyi 'brug sgra sgrog/ ye shes mchog dang de bzhin sprul pa bsgrub cing byang chub zhi bar nye bar 'gro/ mkhas pa de dag bskal pa 'byam klas byin brlabs shes pas dbugs byin
416b6(1): rab tu thob// zab la gnas pas brtan par 'gro na gnas shing nem nur bstsal pas mkhas pa rnams// ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab chos kyi dgongs pa mkhas shing rnam phye pha rol phyin
416b7(1): snyoms par 'dug pa'i ye shes yul la zhugs nas thams cad mkhyen par 'chang yang rgya// ye shes rnam thar kun gyi pha rol phyin cing mngon par shes pas rnam par rtsen// rig pa'i sdang
417a1(1): ldan rnam grol nyon mongs bral bas 'gro la bskyed mos 'tshal dang 'dra// gad la dkar ba'i spyod pa'i gzhal med khang mdzes sna tshogs spyod pa ston pa po// 'gro ba
417a2(1): kun gyi brgyan rnams du ma rab tu ston kyang sems las g.yo ba med// bsam pa shin tu shes pas bstan pa rab tu mkhas shing pha rol phyin gyur pa// mkhas pa dag ni dag cing spangs pa'i
417a3(1): byang chub phyag rgya snang ba'i ye shes kyis// 'gro 'dag dang me mtshungs tham med khyu mchog lhag pa'i bsam pa'i ri'o 'dra// ye shes rgya mtsho 'dra dang yon tan mi zad don du spyod pa chen pa skyed/ 
417a4(1): de dag rin chen 'dra ba'i gnas la rdo rje lta bu'i go cha bgos pas gnas// shin tu mkhas shing 'gro ba kun na thub med pa'i// byang chub mchog du lung bstan skyon med khong du chud pa'i rgya chen sems
417a5(1): la gnas// sangs rgyas gter mchog mi zad thos nas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'chang rgya'o// rtag tu rdzob shes pas dbang 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa rnams la mkhas pa na// zhing rnams kun dang
417a6(1): chos kyi yul la rnam par 'phrul pa'i ye shes rgyud la gnas// gnas dang smon lam spyod yul ye shes rnam par 'phrul pa la yang de bzhin te// 'gro ba dag la rnam par brtse ba bye ba khrag khrig du
417a7(1): mamang bkres/ mngon pa shes pa'i rdzu 'phrul skabs kyis rnam par 'phrul zhi ngas par dam par rtse// khyum chog de dag sangs rgyas yul skabs thapa 'tha bkun gyis thub pa med/ mang
417b1(1): 'jig med dang bag cha med dang ma 'dres rnams kyis shin tu brgyan// sangs rgyas sras dag las rnam thams cad byed cing shin tu mnges pa'i lus dang ldan// de dag lus kyi las kyang ngos po shin tu tu che dag ca
417b2(1): rag cing dge// de yang 'byin pa'i chen rgyal bas byin gyis brlabs shing las ni mchog kyang byed// dam pa de dag sems pa skyeng gcig la sangs rgyas phred pa'i sems kyang rab tu ston/ rgyal ba'i dbang thar
417b3(1): pas rtag tu dbang po'i ting nge 'dzin dbang la rab tu gnas/ bsam pa dag cing g.yo sgyu rnams dang bral te lhag pa'i bsam pa mngon sum gyur/ mos pa'i 'jug pa rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad 'gro ba dag la
417b4(1): rab tu ston// bag chags thams cad spangs nas spyod pa dam pa rab tu 'dzin// nan tan bya ba 'grub pa'i ye shes mkhas pas thams cad mkhyen par 'tshang yang rgya// bsam pa rnam par spangs nas de dag
417b5(1): skyon med gnas pa zhi ba mchog kyang thob// mkhas pa 'di las shin tu bslabs pa de dag ming ni yon tan sgo nas grags// mtha' yas sems kyi yul ldan gnas pa med par lam rnams yang du sgom pa
417b6(1): byed/ ye shes tshul la gnas shing 'gro ba rnams la lam gyi brgyan rnams shin tu ston// spyod pa lag pa lta bu dga' dang ldan pa lto yin snying po ye shes mchog/ snying ni rdo rje lta bu snying rje'i go bgos
417b7(1): ye shes gdab pa'i mtshon cha yin// shes rab mgo ste chos mchog mig yin byang chub spyong yang ni rna ba yin// tshul khrims dag cing nyon mongs med la gtsang ste mun pa zhi byed sna yin te/ spangs
418a1(1): pa lce yin lus ni rig pa yin te sems ni ye shes dam pa yin// spyod pa sgyu ma yin te byang chub shing nas seng ge'i khri ni 'dug pa yin// tshangs pa'i lam rnams dag ni lam yin
418a2(1): ston pa chags med dam pa spyod yul lo// gang gis de dag snang bar 'gyur ba'i snang ba bar gshegs pa'i ye shes yul// sems can spyod la rnam par lta ba ye shes mchog ste rnam pasna tshogs bsgyings/

418a5(1): shes tshogs ni ral gri rnon po lta bu snang ba chen po'i rig pa ste// 'gro ba rnams la thos pa ston pas mi ngoms bskal par 'dren kyang 'jigs pa med/ nan tan byed la gnas te bdud rnams btul nas bdud
