419b7(1): kyil mo// tshul khrims spos kyi thug pa rab tu ni bgos yin len sna tshogs brgyan/ chos kyi ge 'phangs sbyin med cing thams cad mkhyen pa yad bzhin nor bu ste// bder gshegs kumakyi
420a1(1): ye shes dbang bskur thams cad mkhyen pa'i thabs la gnas// pha rol phyin pa rtag 'byung 'khor lo yin te glang po mngon par shes pa mchog/ ye shes rdzu 'phrul te ste chags
420a2(1): pa med 'gro shes rab nor bu dam pa yin// spyod pa btsun mo bzang mo bsdu ba rnam bzhi po khyim bdag dam pa'o// thabs la mkhas pa blon po yin te mkhas pa de dag 'khor los sbyar// stong pa
420a3(1): khyim ste ting 'dzin grong khyer mchog yin byams dang snying rje go cha'o// shes rab ral gri yin te dran pa bzhu mdzes dbang po rno ba mda' yang yang yin// 'jig rten mkhyen pa rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs
420a4(1): / ni gdugs te ye shes rgya mtshan bsgreng // de dang de dag bzod pa'i stobs kyis bdud kyi dpung dang sde rnams 'dus pa 'joms// gzungs ni sa ste byang chub spyod pa chu klung ye shes lum shes rab
420a5(1): shing // me tog byang chub yan lagating 'dzin ni rta ste rdzu 'phrul rgyal mtshan brgyan// spong ba rnamathar brgyan pa rdzing bu yin te rnam par dbyed pa bzang ma btsun ma yin// skye ba yongs su mi skye bar/ 
420a6(1): rarab pa bdud rtsi bza' ba yin te chos ni bdung bzlog pa gsum gyi rtse// de dag spyod pa de 'dra yod 'ong khyad par 'phags te de bas gang du mang // gong gis bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig sang du rgyang
420a7(1): yos su rtsi bapa/ gan pasargyas pas mas na pa se shes chags nga / ma ma tha she bsas mas sas rgya na rgya
420b1(1): rdul gyi 'brur blags re re nas kyang bgrang brtsi bar nus 'gyur la// bar snang mkha' chen 'di yang skra'i sa gzhal te zad par bya bar nus srid de// skad gcig gcig la 'gro ba rnams kyi sems ni bgrang
420b2(1): tshul shes par nus srid kyi// sangs rgyas sras rnams skyed pa dag ni bskal pa brgyar brjod zad par mi nus so// gang zhig yon tan rnam dag 'di dag thob par 'dod cing gong du gzhan 'dod dang // gong
420b3(1): zhig sdug bsngal rnams las 'gro ba thar byas pa de la 'god pa 'dod pa dang // gang zhig bde bar gshegs pa'i sku gsung dgongs dang mnyam du 'gyur kya bar 'dod pa dag/ des ni rdo rje lta bur bstan pa'i
420b4(1): sems su gyis te yon tan bslab par byos// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas 'phel po che zhes bya ba las 'jig rten 'das pa'i le'u ste/ bzhi bcu zhe bzhi pa'o// 
420b5(1): bam po brgya cu gya drug pa'o// / bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa 'dze ta'i tshal skyabs med pa la zas byin gyi kun dga' ra ba'i nang / pho brang brtsegs pa chen po can na byang chub sem
420b6(1): dpa' kun tu babang po dang / 'jam dpal lasags pa 'di lnga ste/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po shes pa dam pa'i ye shes dang / brtan pa dam pa'i ye shes dang / chags tshang pa
420b7(1): pa'i ye shes dang // me tog dam pa'i ye shes dang / nyi ma dam pa'i ye shes dang / zla ba dam pa'i ye shes dang / dri med dam pa'i ye shes dang / rdo rje dam pa'i ye shes dang / rdul med dam
421a1(1): mamashes dang / byung chub sems dpa lus par snang ba dam marnam gas dang / byang chub sems dang 'am ya'i sa pa dang / da brgyas pa
421a2(1): chags me rgyal ma ma dang/ me garnamam dang / ris sa la 'du ma
421a3(1): ma'i rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen gci brjid dang / bla thos chen pa gang ba d-i dang / ye shes ga brji dang / dri me grin dang / rnaMs kya 'i ga brdA dang / bas
421a4(1): ri ba'i gzi brjid dang / ye shes snang ba'i gzi brjid dang / kun nas dpal gyi gzi brjid dang / kun nas 'od dpal gyi gzi brjid dang / byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu snang bas rgyas par bgrangs pa'i gzi brjid
421a5(1): dang / byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / pad+ma'i snying po dang / rin po che'i snying po dang / nyi ma'i snying po dang / yon tan rnam dag snying po dang / chos rgya mtsho'i snying po dang / rnam
421a6(1): ba da pa rnying pa dang / bcwag parjing ba dang / byang chub dz+ra rnams dang /  rgyub semam dpa' ba nga dzan nag dang // rnam pa dag pa'i mas dang / rnaMs me ma rna
421a7(1): med pa'ang ba dang bzhams pa dang / tsha sa sa mam mas nas/ byang chu sems pa thams pa'adas dang / byang chub sems dpa'
421b1(1): ches kyi dbyings snang ba'i blo gras rtsod pan dang / byang chub dam pa'i cod pan dang / phyogs rnam par snga ba'i cod pan dang / sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag par byang ba'i snying po'i rtsong par dang / 'jig rten thams
421b2(1): cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i cod pan dang / kun nas rnam par snang ba'i cod pan dang / zil gyi mi gnon pa'i cod pan dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi seng ge'i khri 'dzin pa'i cod pan dang / 
421b3(1): byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings nam mkha' kun nas snang ba'i cod pan dang / byang chub sems dpa' tshangs pa'i dbang po'i gtsug phud dang / klu'i dbang po'i gtsug phud dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
421b4(1): sprul pa snang ba'i gtsug pungad dang / byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i gtsug phung dang / smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu sgrog pa'i gtsug phung dang / rin rten rgyal po'i gtsug phung dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
421b5(1): thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu 'gyed pa'i nor bu'i na chen 'brug sgra'i gtsug phud dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad tha mi dad par rnam par dmigs pa'i rin chen rgyal pos brgyan pa'i gtsug phung dang / 
421b6(1): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rnam par 'phrul pa snang ba'i rgyal po 'dra bas kun nas g.yog pa'i rgyal po'i gtsug pung dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor ma ldog pa'i gtsug pa dang
421b7(1): byang chub sems dpa' dus gsum gyi ming thams cad rab tu sgrog pa'i gtsug pu dang /  byang chub sems dpa' rgya chen po'i 'ong dang / gzi brjid dri ma med pa'i 'od dang / rin po che'i 'od dang / rdul dang bral ba'i 'od
422a1(1): dang / skar ma'i 'ad dang / chos kyi 'od dang / zhi ba'i 'od dang / mama'i 'od dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i 'ang dang / byang chub sems dpa' ma'i dang / byang chub sems dpa'
422a2(1): bsod dmas dpal dang / ye shes dpal dang / chos kyi dpal dpal dang / mngon par shes pa'i dpal dang / 'ad kya dngas dang / med ga dpal dang / rin pa che'i dpal dang / byang chub byu pal dang / 
422a3(1): tshangs pa'i dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun nas snga ba'i dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' tshangs pa'i dbyangs rgya mtsho'i dbyangs dang / sa'i sgra dbyangs dang / 'jig rten dbang po'i dbyangs dang / 
422a4(1): ri dbang rgyal po 'thob pa'i dbyangs dang / chos kyi dbyangs kun tu rgyas pa'i dbyangs dang / chos rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu sgrog pa'i dbyangs dang / bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu 'dul ba'i dbyangs dang / 
422a5(1): snyi chen po'i tshul gyi sprin rab tu sgrog pa'i dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar bya bas dbugs 'byin pa'i dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos kyis 'phags
422a6(1): pa dang / khyad par byas 'phags pa dang / mi shes kyis 'phags pa dang / bzad mas dbes 'apags pa dang / man tshigs kyis 'dags pa dang / thabs pas 'phags pa dang / kun rlu sa
422a7(1): 'phams pa dang / byams pachen pas 'phags pa po migs rgya mchis 'phags par byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyang gyi gdung 'phags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa jo
422b1(1): dpal dang / mchag gi dpal dang / kun du 'phags pa'i dpal dpal dang / zla ba'adapal dang / nam mkha'i dpal dang / raba' dpal dang / dpal gyi dpal dang / byang chub rnams pa ma
422b2(1): shes kyi dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' ri'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / tshangs pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / tshogs kyi dbang po'i rgyal po dang / lha'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / zhi ba'i dbang po'i rgyal ba dang
422b3(1): mi g.yo ba'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / khyu mchog gi dbang po'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' mchog gi dbang po'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' rab tu ni ba'i sgra dang / chags pa med pa'i sgra dang / 
422b4(1): sa'i dbyangs kyi sgra dang / rgya mtsho'i gru'i sgra dang / sprin gyi dbyangs kyi sgra dang / chos kyi snang ba'i sgra dang / nam mkha'i dbyings kyi sgra dang / sems can kur gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rab tu sgrog pa'i sgra dang / sngon gyi smon
422b5(1): lam yongs su bskul ba'i sgra dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bdud kyi dkyil 'khor bcom med par byed pa'i sgra dang / byang chub sems rin po che'i blo dang / ye shes ri bo'i blo dang / nam mkha'i blo dang
422b6(1): dri ma med pa'i blang da / chags pa med pa'i blo dang / rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i blo dang / dus gsum snang ba'i blo dang / yangs pa'i glu dang / kun du snang ba'i glu dang / byangs chub sems papa' tsha
422b7(1): sa bram che'i grangs dgasas gas pa bya chub sems pa'i sa ma/ gro kyi bu pa'i mis dpa' du tsu sa rjes ma gyis #
423a1(1): sangs rgyas rnams cad kyis rnam par 'phrul pa yangs su bstan pa rnam par migs par bru ba la ba bas pa med pa'amag kyi la ba rnam par dag pa/ ring nanag shegs pa thams
423a2(1): par 'chang rgya ba'i tshe/ nye bar 'dod pa rgyu na mi gcod pas tshad med par phyin pas/ ches rgya mtsho'i tshul thams cad la shes snang ba rab tu thob pas snang ba mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa/ so sa yang dag pa
423a3(1): rig pa rnam par dag pas bskal pa mtha' yas par shin tu ston pa/ mi zad pa'i 'gro ba'i bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ gzugs kyi lus yongs su ston pas nam mkha'i dbyings kyis klas
423a4(1): pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul rnam par dag cing mi gnas pa sems can gyi khams sems can med pa dang / srog med pa yongs su shes pas rab rib med pa chos kyi dbyings thams cad du'ang
423a5(1): gzer gyi drabs rgyas par 'gengs pas nam mkha' dang mnyam pa sha stag dang thags gcig tu bzhugs so// can thos rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa lnga brgya ste/ thams cad kyang bdan pa
423a6(1): rgyal kyis rang bzhin mngon par yang du rung pa yang dag pa'i mtha' mngan gsum du gyur pa ches kyi rang po nin la bzug sa ma/ gling pa'i mtshalas rkyen du' sa me ba nim sems pa
423b1(1): sugyur pa'i snying yul can kun nas sbyor ba dang / bag la cal ba dang / bcings pa rnam par zlog pa chags pa med pa'i gnas larten pa/ nam mkha' ltar zhi ba la rnam par skyed pa sangs rgyas lathe tsum pa sa
423b2(1): nur dang / yid gnyis yongs su chad pa sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rgya mtsho las mos pa'i lam du zhugs pa sha stag dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang po sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa/ 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa dang / 
423b3(1): bde ba'i don du zhugs pa/ gsol ba ma gtab par dge ba'i bshes gnyen du gyur pa/ sems can gzhan bsrung ba la zhugs pa/ 'jig rten thams cad las 'phags pa'i khyad par dang ldan ye shes kyi sgo la zhug
423b4(1): pa/ sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstan pa'i spyod yul las byung ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yongs su bsrung ba la zhugs pa/ 
423b5(1): sangs rgyas kyi rigs yang dag par bzung ba'i smon lam gyis yang dag par skyes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung rgyud du byung ba/ mngon du gyur pa thams cad mkhyen pa cing la mngon par mos pa sha stag dang yang thab
423b6(1): gcig go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa de dag dang / nyan thos rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang po'i 'khor dang bcas pa de dag 'di snyam du gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
423b7(1): yul dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i khre 'ashes kyi spyod yul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa dang / de bzhin gshen
424a1(1): pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par spod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mnga' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes la ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang
424a2(1): bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / de bzhin pa shegs pa'i mthu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi smin lam dang / sngon legs par spyang pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / dge ba'i shes gnyen gyi skabs dang
424a3(1): dad pa'i mig yongs su dag pa dag dang / rgya chen po la mos pa'i snang ba rab tu thob pa dang / tha byang chub mes dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa dang / bsam pa zag pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon cing
424a4(1): yang dag par zhugs pa ma gtogs par lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis 'jug pa 'am/ khong du chud pa 'am/ yid ches pa'am/ yongs su shes ches pa 'am/ rnam par rtog pa 'am/ gzung ba 'am rnam par
424a5(1): dpyad pa 'am/ rnam par bsgom pa 'am/ rnam par dbye ba 'am/ rnam par grol ba 'am/ rab tu brjod pa'am/ sems can pha rol gyi rgyud du phyin par bya bar ni mi nus na bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis bdag cag byang chub
424a6(1): sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa'i tshul rngas pa dang / sems can rnabs ma rnam pa da pa dang / mos pa sna tshogs dang / shes rab sna tshogs dang / shes rang sna tshogs kyi tshig dang / brda sna tshogs su myur
424a7(1): 'imams pas bas la 'al pa thil pasas pas byu na papa shem pa sa sa ma sa
424b1(1): pa'i yan na gzhan dang gnan la gnas pa ches bstan pa gzhan dad gnan la mos pa dag la sngon thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du zhugs pa la yang dag par bsan thang/ seMn byung rgyu ba sems pa'i smon pa
424b2(1): bsgrubs pa lnga yang yang dag bstan pa grang / sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa lnga yang yang dag par bstan grang / sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'is mang
424b3(1): sra mnan pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa lta yang yang dag par bstan grang / sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor mngon par bsgrub pa yongs su rdzogag par mdzad pa lta yang yang dag par bstan
424b4(1): grang / sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i tshul mngon par bsgrub pa rnam par phye ba'i snga ba la yang dag par bstan grang / sngon byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi rkyen yongs su dag par lta yang yang dag par
424b5(1): bstan grang / sngon byang chub sems dpa'i 'byung ba'i tshul rgya mtsho mngon par bsgrub pa lta yang yang dag par bstan grang / sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' yang yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / rnam par
424b6(1): 'phrul ba'i rgyan phran sum chags pa lnga yang yang dag stan gang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtshalta yang yang dag par bsnun gyung/ mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi skyes rnam pa rgyu
424b7(1): shes ba sa pa bas mas deb ni dgashes sa pa'i ma kyi 'ab ba btu bathar ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / khyim ma 'i mdum yang ma sa par ma po ri 'ag shes
425a1(1): pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su bstan pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa lta yang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems can gyi khams 'dul ba'i thabs kyi
425a2(1): lta yang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems can gyi khams 'dul ba'i thabs kyi sgo lta yang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos kyi
425a3(1): grong khyer la mnga' mngang pa lta yang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi las snang bar mdzad pa lta yang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad
425a4(1): kyi gnas su gshegs shing rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad pa lta yang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi yon pa zhes pa mdzad pa lta yang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin ga/ shegs
425a5(1): ba sems can thams kyi bsod nams dang yon tan ston pa'i tshe 'phrul mdzad pa lta yang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi tshul la sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan
425a6(1): dmigs pa mdzad pa lta yang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad la rnam par 'phrul pa'i tshe 'phrul mdzad pa lta yang yang dag par bstan glang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems
425a7(1): ra sa su sem sa na pa'i mthu ma bas sa mas pa ga pa/  gagags pam sa rnams ca sa pa sum kyi chen pa kyang thum sa
425b1(1): khyab pas rnam par 'phral pa mdzad pa lta yang yang dag par bstan grang / snyam pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nam
425b2(1): seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la nam mkha' dang mnyam pas dpe med pa/ 'gro ba thams cad du rnam par snang ba'i rgyan dang ldan pa thugs rje chen po'i rang bzhin can thugs rje rnon po'i
425b3(1): sgo dang ldan pa/ thugs rje chen po'i sngon du 'gro/ thugs rje chen po'i chos can la mnyam par bzhag go// bcom ldan 'das kyis de ltar mnyam par bzhag ma thag tu/ pho brang brtsigs pa rgyan chen po can yang mtha'
425b4(1): dang dgus med par yangs shing rdo rje thub pa med pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi sa bzhi rab tu bkod pa dang / non bu rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad kyi dra ba kun tu bkram pa/ rin po che du ma'i me tog sil mas chal par gang ba
425b5(1): nor bu rin po che dam pa mdzes par bkram pa dang / bai dUr+ya'i ga bas mdzes par byas pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po 'gro ba rnam par snang bas rgyan shin tu rnam par phye ba dang / rin po che bzang po mang po dang ldan pa'i
425b6(1): nor bu rin pa tsha'adam bu'i gling gi phung pos shin tu rgyan pa dang / rin po che thams cad las sgo gang dang / rta babs dang / pu shu dang / skar khung byas shing khri 'phang grangs med pa rnam par dag pas brgyan pa
425b7(1): dang 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad dang 'dra ba'i nor bu rin po che'i rgyan dang ldan pa dang / 'gro ba lnga'i rgya mtsho'i nor bu rin po ni rnam par bye ba dang / ner bu rin che thams cad kyi drabs kun nas yin
426a1(1): pa'i bdugs dang / rgyal mtshan rab tu bsnang ba dang / sgo dang rtababs thams cad las 'dag zer chos kyi dbyings su nus par rab tu 'azhengs parab tu byung bas mdzes pa
426a2(1): byas pa dang / pha rol gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyis bzhi stegs su brjod du med pas brgyan pa dang phyogs kun nas them skas kyi phreng ba nor bu rin po ches brtsegs shing shin rnam par dbyebs
426a3(1): rab tu mdzes par kun nas gnas par gyur to/ ma ta'i 'tshal thams cad kyang rgyu zhing gang par shin tu yangs shing rtsa che bar kunanas gnas byung sangs rgyas kyimathus sangs rgyas kyi ning brjid meng pa
426a4(1): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi zhing rnams kyang chu zheng kun tu rgya che zhing yangs pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan sna tshogs dang ldan zhing / sa gzhi nor bu rin po che sna tshogs brjod du med pas kun nas grub pa dang
426a5(1): nor bu rin po che grangs med pa'i rabs kun nas bskur ba dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing ta la'i phreng bas mdzes par brgyan nas gnas par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na spos chu'i chu klung
426a6(1): med pa grong mtha' yas par 'khyil ba'i spos kyi chus yongs su gang ba rin po che sna tshogs kyi me tog med po dang 'dres par gyur la/ g.yas phyogs su 'khyil zhing 'bab pa las sangs rgyas kyi ches
426a7(1): sa rgyas thamam sa ba ga pa thams gas pa /  ma sa su nga rjem ma
426b1(1): nor bu rin po che thos cad kyi dra bas kun nas yog
426b2(1): ma sa nor bu rin pa tshe grangs med pa'i chub kun du snang bas brgyan cing mnges pa dang / na thu na pa cha sanas me la na thun pa mthams cad kyis brta pa/ grangs me dang / zla
426b3(1): thams cad kyi nga kun nas 'byung ba/ bdug spos kyi sprin gyi rgyan dang ldan pa dag kyang kun nas gnas par gyur to// rin po che'i rgyal mtshan grangs med pa dang / gos kyi rgyal mtshan dang / ba da
426b4(1): rgyal mtshan dang / rin po che'i snam bu'i rgyal mtshan dang / me tog gi rgyal mtshan dang / rgyan gyi rgyal mtshan dang / phreng ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / rin po sna tshogs kyi dril bu'i rgyal mtshan dang / rin po che'i
426b5(1): rgyal po'i gdugs kyi rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu rin po che snang bas kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan gyi 'khor lo'i dbyangs
426b6(1): rab tu sgrog pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po seng ge yid du 'ong ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi sbyor ba rab tu sgrog pa'i rgyal mtshan
426b7(1): dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po ches kyi dbyings thams cad rab tu snang ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / rgyal mtshan gyi brgyan rnam par phye ba thams cad phyogs kun nas rgyan tu gyur pa dag kyang kun nas gnas par gyur / 
426b8(1): mdze ta'i tshal gyi nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad lnga'i gzhal med khang sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pas rgyan par kun nas gnas 'gyur te/ 'dze 'i tshal nyid kyang spos sna tshogs kyi shing grangs med pa'i sprin
427a1(1): khams cad dang / zag pa thams cad dang / 'dod pa'i yo byad thams cad dang / rin po che thams cad dang / gnas thams dang / 
427a2(1): snod rnam par sna tshogs thams cad dang / yo byad dam pa sna tshogs thams cad kyis sems can dpral po rnams yongs su sdud cing / 'gro ba sdug bsnga
427a3(1): brnams dbugs dbyung ba dang / sems can gyi sems tshim par bya ba dang / sems can gyi bsam pa rnam par dag par bya ba dang / sems can rnams
427a4(1): byang chub tu yongs su srin par byed cing phyogs bcu bkang ste 'dong ba mthong ngo // zas po'i lha gnyis nas rgyal rigs mkhas pa'i gzugs dang / bram ze
427a5(1): mkhas pa'i gzugs dang / 'jiganyen gyi khams na mkhas pa'i gzugs dang / bzo sna tshogs la mkhas pa'i gzugs dang / me 'gro ba'i rgyud
427a6(1): rnamakhas pa'i gzugs dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las kyi tshul dang rdzas la gsal zhing mkhas pa'i gzugs dang / 
427a7(1): 'jig cad gyis bri ma dpan du bya bar mkhas pa'i gzugs mabyang rnam bdus dang ldan pa/ dbyabs dang rgyan rnam pa dum dang ldan pa yid du'ang ba
427b1(1): tshig mang po brjod pas yid mi bde ba'i sems can rab tu dga' bar byed cing / chos kyi nor gyis dbul ba'i sems can rnams la phan gdags pa dang / 
427b2(1): sdug bsngal ba'i sems can rnams bde bar bya ba dang / log par lhung ba'i sems can rnams mngon par gdon pa dang theg pa'i gru la nyam nyes su gyur pa'i
427b3(1): sems can rnams dbyugs dbyung ba dang / 'jigs pa'i sems can rnams yongs su bskyab pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sgra kun du grag par bya ba dang / 
427b4(1): sdig pa'i las bzlog pa'i sgra yongs su bsgrags pa dang / dge ba'i chos yang dag par blang ba la sems can gzung ba dang / don spyad pa la sems can
427b5(1): dgod pa dang / dga' ba'i shugs yongs su bskyed pa dang / snyad par sla ba'i bsdu ba'i dngos po yongs su brjod pa dang / 'jig rten la don 'thun
427b6(1): par bsgrub pa byed cing phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ 'dong ba mthong ngo // lte ba'i dkyil 'khor nas drang srong mang po 'gro ba thams cad kyi dbyibs su 'khod
427b7(1): balpags pa dang / shun pa'i gos gyon pa ril ba thogs gzugs dang / cha byang dang / dbyibs sna tshogs can/ stod lam rab tu zhi ba dag byung nas/ 
428a1(1): par kun nas gnas shing rab tu brgyan pa dang / shin tu srud pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus yongs su brgyan pa dang / 'je da'i chal du yang dag par gzhom pa dang byang chub sems
428a2(1): dpas yongs su rgyas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho shin tu rnam par gnas pa dang / rgyan thams cad kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi 'od kyis rab
428a3(1): tu snang ba dang / rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab pas brgyan pa dang / zhing thams cad kyi rgyan gyi sprin gyis kun log par brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi lus thams cad kyi sprin gyi cha rab tu 'bab
428a4(1): pas brgyan pa dang / me tog sna tshogs thams cad kyi sprin shin tu rgyas pa'i lhun gyis kun tu rgyus shing brgyan pa dang / gos thams cad kyi shing gi sprin gyi mdong nas ges kha dog sna tshogs su mdzes pa'i char rab tu 'bab pas brgyan pa
428a5(1): pas brgyad pa dang / 'phang ba dang / lA lI dang / se mo do'i rkyen rgyan thams cad kyi sprin gyi char rgyun mi chang par mngon par babs pas brgyan pa dang / spos sna tshogs kyi bdug spos phyogs kun nas 'phrul ba'i sprin dang / 
428a6(1): ni bun gyi char thams cad kyi lus kyi dbribs sngar mngon par 'bab pas brgyan pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi dra ba'i sprin las rin po che'i rgyal po'i phye ma zhi bu'i char rgyun mi 'chad par rab du 'bab pa
428b1(1): chub mngon pa dang ldan pa'i zeb la ral bkod pa kun nas sgra 'byin cing dbyin cing dbyangs snyan par skrag par brgyan pa dang / rin po che'i 'bru sna tshogs kyi dra bdang / ring po che seng ge'i drabs tshams
428b2(1): rnam pa tha dad pa'i 'phreng ba dang / se mo des brgyan par kun nas gnas shing snang bar gyur to// de ltar bcom ldan 'das de gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin chen po seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa de la mnyam par
428b3(1): bzhag ma thag tu de'i tshe shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gser gyi sprin sgron mo'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba de bzhin
428b4(1): gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dpal gyi gzi brjid kyi rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang mdzaba'i smon lam gyi gtsug gi 'od gzer snang ba'i zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'
428b5(1): sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phangs te/ nam mkha'i dbyings brgyan sna tshogs kyi sprin gyis
428b6(1): brgyan pa lha rdzas kyi me tog gi sprin gyi char mngon par rab tu 'bab pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyan gyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'gengs pa dang / lha rdzas kyi
428b7(1): rin po che'i gdugs kyi sprin gyi char mngon par sgrub pa dang / kha dog sna tshogs rnam par tha dad cing shin tu phra ba'i lha rdzas rgyags kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i rgyal mtshan
429a1(1): ba dan gyi sprin nam mkha'i dbyings las byin gyis brlab pa dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi rgyan yid du 'ong bas nam mkha'i dbyings sangs rgyas par 'gengs pa byed cing / mi mjed kyi 'jig
429a2(1): rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ shar phyogs su bstan te khang pa brtsegs pa rgyan kun dang ldan zhing nor bu'i rin
429a3(1): de che'i drabs kun nas khyab pa dang / seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po che phyogs rab tu snang ba'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par smram nas na bu rin po che yang bzhin gyi rgyal po'i dri ba'i rgyan gyis kun nas brgyan pa'i byang chub
429a4(1): sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas/ dkyil mo khrung bcas te 'khod do// lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol tu gyi 'jig rten gyi
429a5(1): khams rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan gyi snying po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi snying po kun nas snang ba'i rgyal po sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi shugs thub par
429a6(1): dka' ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mche de nas 'phangs
429a7(1): 'dig ga sangs rgyam mas cad mas thas tshang rdzas su 'thas par byed kyis pa zang po sangs ma sa nang 'byam gus pa thams cad da pa cha sa tshogs kyi la ljing nab pos pa 'phra
429b1(1): byin gyis brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ning gi rgyud thams cad kyi sna sti dang / 'phreng ba'i dra bas kun nas 'brel bar byin gyis brngub pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ning gi 'khor thams cad 'brang ba dang / lA l+r-i dang sa ma
429b2(1): dra bas kun nas 'brel bar byin gyis brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'og gi gzhi rten rdo rje thams cad kyi 'breng bas yongs su gzung bar byin gyis brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gatshul
429b3(1): thams cad nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi dra bas kun nas 'brel bar byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gos sna tshogs kyi lda ldis kun nas yongs su blangs shing bzung bar byin gyis brlab pa dang / 
429b4(1): sangs rgyas kyi ning thams cad nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi lus kyi 'phreng ba dang lnga ldi mang po'i dra bas kun nas 'brel bar mngon par bsgrub pa dang / zhing thams cad nor bu rin po che dpal 'od gzer gyi l-I l-I dang / 'brang ba'i
429b5(1): dra bas kun nas 'brel bar byin gyis brlobs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rin po che rnam par snang ba'i lda ldi dang dra ba kun du 'brel par byin gyis rlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gzhi nor bu rin po che
429b6(1): seng ge yang du 'ong ba'i 'phreng ba dang / lnga lnga'i dra bas yongs su bzang bar byin gyis brlab pa byed cing / mi 'jed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dang ste 'khor nga
429b7(1): bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas lho phyogs su brtan te/ nor bu rin po che 'grol rnam snang ba'i pad+ma'i spong po can dag mngon par sprul te/ rin po che thams cad kyi me reg gi dra ba'i rgyan rgyan kumams
430a1(1): brgyan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas skyil mo dkrung bcas te 'khod de// nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin
430a2(1): / prapra ba snyed kyi par la 'di rten gyi 'ams rin po che'i ri ra ba rnam par snang ba'i tshul mtshan mar me zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings rgyal nas snyan mo'i sangs rgyas kyi nang nas byang chub sems dan
430a3(1): dpal kun nas 'phags pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten ni khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdum shin tu pra ba skyed dang ldan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khar d+ham
430a4(1): denas 'phags te/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad gdug spos kha dog sna tshogs dang / dri sna tshogs su ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang / chos kyi dbyings
430a5(1): thams cad spos pa dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad bdug spos kha dog dang / dr-i dum dang / ldan
430a6(1): sa nas mam can mas sa sa rgyam ba sa mas mas pa nga la lan sa pa sa rna
430a7(1): sams mtha sa ma mam sa sa rnanapas kyi nga
430b1(1): ma pa ma na sa sa na sa 'ab rna ma ba sa sa rnas
430b2(1): snye kyis rgyas par dbang ba dang / chas kying byings thams cad don patsha'i rgyal brdarje sring ga bdag sna tshogs mam/ rkyen rnam pa tha da pa'i yul dang ldan pa'i rarab kyi na sangs rgyas kyi rang ba du pa
430b3(1): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams nad ner bu rin po che 'jam bu'i chu klung 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du snang ba'i yul dang ldan pa'i ro rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi
430b4(1): brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po chas kyi dbyings thams rab tu snang ba'i ri rab kyi sprin gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du
430b5(1): med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas khyab par byin gyis brlab pa dang / sems can gyi khams bkyi yul thams cad nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan rab tu snang ba'i
430b6(1): ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi nam mkha'i rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon
430b7(1): gyi sbyor ba rab tu snang bar yongs su ston cing byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgra 'byin pa'i ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang / phyogs
431a1(1): bcu thams cad rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sring po byang chub rab tu snang ba'i 'ang 'i ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba se
431a2(1): kyis rgyas par 'gengs pa byed cing / mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas nub phyogs
431a3(1): su bstan te khang po brtsegs pa'i spos kyi rgyal po thams cad kyi lhun dang ldan pa mu tig gi dra ba'i kun ras khyab pa dang / seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po che lha'i dbang po bar du snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi pad+mo'i snying
431a4(1): pa can dag mngon par sprul nas/ rin po che gser gyi dra ba'i brgyan dang / yid bzhin gyi rgyal ba'i cong par bcings pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus byin gyis brlab nas/ dkyil mo dkrung bcas te 'khod do// bya
431a5(1): phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul gan tu phra ba sred kyi pha rol tum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che gos yongs su snang ba zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi
431a6(1): dbyings nam mapa'i dpa la rnam par snang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi nang nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chags pa med pa'i dpal kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'dzin rten gyi khams rgyamacho dza dum
431a7(1): d+hu rdul shin du phra ba skyed pa dang / lhan pa cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas 'thar gyi dkyil 'bar rgya mched nas 'phags te/ nam mkha'i dbyings rir ba che'i snam bu'i sprin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis
431b1(1): brlab pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings rin po che rigs kha dog gser po dang / kha dog gser ba'i sprin gyirgyan gyis brgyan gyis brlabs pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings rin po che'i gos spos snga tshogs kyis rnaMn
431b2(1): por byas pa'i sprin gyi char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings rin po che'i rgyal po nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan gyi sprin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang / 
431b3(1): mkha'i byings nor bu rin po che'i gser gyi mdog shin tu 'bar ba'i sprin gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che 'bar ba'i gos kyi sprin gyis brgyan par byin gyis brdab pa dang / 
431b4(1): nam mkha'i dbyings nor bu rin po che skar ma thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan gyi sna tshogs su gyur pa'i gos kyi brgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang / rin po che'i snam bu khra bo'i rdo ltar snang ba'i sprin gyis yongs su
431b5(1): par byin gyis brlob pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings phyogs bcu kun nas rin po che'i rgyal po rnam par snang ba'i dpal rab tu 'bor ba'i 'od dang ldan pa'i gos kyi sprin gyis yongs su rgyas par byin gyis brlab pa dang / 
431b6(1): nam mkha'i dbyings phyogs bcu kun nas nor bu'i rgyal po snang bshin tu gsal ba'i phyogs kyi dbyings rnam par snang ba'i gos kyi sprin gyis yongs su rgyas par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings rin po che'i rgyal
431b7(1): bo rgya mtsho'i rgyan gyis gos kyi sprin gyis kun nas leg par byen gyis brlob pa byed cing / mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangan ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gangan ba der dong ste/ 'khor dang bcas pa'i bcom
432a1(1): ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ byangs phyogs kyi dbyings thams cad su mngon pa lta ba dang / seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po spos mtshungs pa med pa'i pad+mo'i sring po can dag mngon par
432a2(1): sprul nas rin po che'i rgyal po'i me tog gi dri bas yongs su brgyan pa pa dang / rin po che'i rgal po mdzo tshogs kyi dra bas cod pan bcings pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas dkyil
432a3(1): mo dkrung bcas te 'khod do// shar dang lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mams sa kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyis brgyan pa'i
432a4(1): rgyal mtshan zhes bya de zhin gshegs pa klu dbang rgyal po sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub se'achos kyi 'od 'phro ba dang ldan pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas
432a5(1): brjod du brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas 'khro tsho de nas 'phags te/ nam mkha'i dbyings de thams cad 'od kyi dkyil gser gyi khadog
432a6(1): lta bu'i sngon gyis kun du khyab par byas dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad rin pa'i 'od kying dkyil 'khord kyi sprin gyis kun du khyab par bya ba dang / nam mkha'i
432a7(1): gapapa mas la las ma kyi ma ma tsho ma kyi sa
432b1(1): dkyil 'khod kyis kun du khyab par bya ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa pa'i mdzod spu'i kha dog gi 'od kyil dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun nas khyab par bya ba dang
432b2(1): nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad rin po che'i kha dog lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad pad+ma'i snying po'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khod gyi
432b3(1): sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che'i shing gi yal ga'i dkyil 'khor lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyi kun tu khyab par bya ba dang
432b4(1): nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug gtor lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / nam mkha' dbyings thams cad 'dzam bu'i chu klung gi gser rgya
432b5(1): kha dog lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad nyi ma'i kha dog lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / nam
432b6(1): mkha'i dbyings thams cad zla ba dang skar ma'i tshogs kyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od kyis dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par byed cing / mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ 
432b7(1): bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas dang lho'i phyogs 'tshams su brtan te/ rin po rdul ba la zhing rnam par snang bun sum tshogs pa'i ma
433a1(1): tog gi khang pa rtsegs pa dang / seng ge'i khri rin po che seng ge rdo rje pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas nor bu'i rgyal po rin po'i 'od gzer rab tu 'bar ba'i dra'i yongs brgyan pa'i
433a2(1): byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas skyil me dkrung bcas te 'khong / lha rang nub kyi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjid du med pa'i rdul shin du phram
433a3(1): snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten khams rin po che'i tsam rab tu snga pa'i snying po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo'i ye shes kun tu snang ba'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas chub sems dpa' bdud
433a4(1): kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'brar ba'i ye shes rgya mche zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten khams rgya mtsho brjid du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas 'khor
433a5(1): gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ ba spu'i bug thams cad nas me tog 'od 'phro ba'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu bkye ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas rol mo'i 'od 'od 'phro ba'i
433a6(1): sprin nam mkha' ltar yangs pa rab tu dge ba dang / ba spu'i bug thams cad nas nor bu rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba'i sprin nam mkha' dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dge ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas rin pa che'i 'od 'grong
433a7(1): bris dang 'du khris chags kyis rnam par 'dugs pa'i sminanamamatha na mangs parab tu dag ba dang ba spu'i bus thams cad nas klas rnam par sprul pa'i blo ga 'di 'brang 'dri mam pa chang byengs
433b1(1): ltar yangs pa rab tu bkye ba dang bsku'i bu gathams cad nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba'i 'od 'gro ba'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs par bathung go pa dang / baspu'i bu gathams cang nas nir bu bus
433b2(1): gsar rab tu 'bar ba 'ad 'bri ba'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas rin po che'i rgyal po dpal gyi snying po 'bar ba'i 'od 'bri za'i sbyin nam mkha'i khrus
433b3(1): ltar yangs pa rab tu dkye ba dang / ba spu'i bu gathams cad nas nar bu rin po che de bzhi ga shegs pa'i dgangs pa rgya mtsho ltar dus gsum gyi chung rab tu snang ba'i tshul dang ldan pa'i 'ang 'phro ba'i sprin nam mkha' byas
433b4(1): spangs pa rab tu dbye byed cing / mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas bcom ldan 'das gang na deng dong ste 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas lho dang nub kyi phyogs mtshams
433b5(1): su brtan te/ nor bu rin po che chen po'i 'od gzer gyi dra ba phyogs kun tu mngon par gzhol ba'i thig le'i chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rab tu snang ba'i khang pa'i rtsegs pa dang / seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po che spos kyi spyan ma 'od
433b6(1): 'phro ba'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po'i dra bas yongs su brgyan pa/ dang / rin po che'i rgyal po sems can thams cad rab tu 'dzud pa'i dbyangs dang ldan pa'i cod pan bcings
433b7(1): ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas dkyil mo dkrung bcas te 'khod // nub dang byang gi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol
434a1(1): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi ri bo kun nas snang ba'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang
434a2(1): ba'i smon lam ye shes dpal zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed dang ldan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rtsa mchod
434a3(1): nas 'phags te/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgra thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus du gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gzugs brnyan gyi sprin kun du dgye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad
434a4(1): bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus du byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi lus kyi gzugs kyi sprin kun tu dkye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe bzang po thams cad dang
434a5(1): baspu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i thams thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan gyi sprin du dgye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe
434a6(1): byung babang bams ca bsku'i rnamams ca dang / thas thamasas sang+yas gnas drag shegs pa'i sas rgyas kyi sprul pa'i tshigs kyi gzugs pargya mang pa'i sprin pa dang / mam byed pam mams
434a7(1): ma dang / baspu'i skathams cad dang / lus thams cad nas nus pasum dug shegs pa'i ra bzhin gshegs pathams cad kyi sacu ma gyur pa'i gzugs brnya mang pa'i srin kun dbye ba dang / mdzan dang po bya
434b1(1): bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgomathams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du byang ba'i nan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lus kyi gzugs brnyan rab tu dartse ba dang / mtshan dadrang ba du
434b2(1): bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po byang chub dang / byang chub kyi shing gi gzugs brnyan gyi sprin kun tu dartse
434b3(1): ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i gzugs brnyan mang ba'i spron
434b4(1): dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyi lus kyi gzugs brnyan gyi sprin kun tu dgye
434b5(1): ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan gyi sprim
434b6(1): kun tu bkye ba'i skad cig gcig tu nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad nga rgyas par 'gas shing mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thag ngan ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ 'khor dang bcas par
434b7(1): bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ nub dang byang gi phyogs 'tshams su brtan te rin po che'i rgyal po phyogs kun nas rnam par snang ba'i skye bo'i seng ge'i khri rin po che 'gro ba rnam par snang ba'i pad+ma'i gling po
435a1(1): can dag mngon par sprul nas/ mu tig gi 'od thub pa med pa'i dra ba yongs su brgyan pa dang / rin po che'i 'od kun tu snang ba'i cod pan bcings pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis
435a2(1): brlabs nas dkyi mo dkrung bcas te 'khod do// 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjed du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams de bzhin
435a3(1): gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes nam mkha' lta bur chags pa med pa'i dpal gyi rgyal mtshan rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas
435a4(1): byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i ye shes kyis rnam par gnon pa zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjed du med pa'i dril shin du phra ba sred
435a5(1): lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ ba spu'i ga thams cad nas 'gro ba thams cad kyi skad dang / sgra dang / dbyangs dang / nges pa'i tshig mngon par bsgrub pa rgya mtshor ba du brjod
435a6(1): pa dang / dus gsum gyi byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 'byung ba'i tshul rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi 'brug rab tu bsgrags pa dang / byang chub sdes dpa' thams cad la mngon par bsgrub pa'i tshul rgya mtsho'i tshul rgyam che
435a7(1): dbyangs rab bsgrag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i rgyal rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi sgra rab du bsgeg pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa'i kyis
435b1(1): 'khor zhing thams cad du smras par 'gengs pa'i tshul rgya mtsho'i dbyangs rab tu bsgrag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i tshul rgya mtsho'i dbyangs
435b2(1): rab tu bsgrag pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po byang chub tu gshegs pa dang / bdud kyi dkrugs ma rnam par 'thor ba dang / snying po byang chub tu 'tshang rgya ba dang / rnam par 'phrul par
435b3(1): par mdzad pa'i dbyangs rgya mtsho rab tu skrag pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / mdo sde'i tshul dang / mi rgya mtsho'i dbyangs kyi sprin gyi 'brug sgra bsgog
435b4(1): pa dang / 'gro ba 'dul ba thams dus la bab pa'i 'khor los 'dul ba'i chos kyi tshul dang / thabs kyi sgra rab tu bsgrag pa dang / ye shes thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir smon lam ji ltar
435b5(1): btab pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i khyad par dang / dus dang / thabs dang / chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho'i dbyangs rab tu bsgrag par byed cing / mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ 
435b6(1): bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ 'og gi phyogs su brtan te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzhal med khang gzugs brnyan du rab tu sna
435b7(1): ba'i rin pa che sna chog thams cad kyi mdzad kyi khang pa brtsegs pa dang / seng ge'i khri rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi gzugs pa d+ma'i snying po yongs su bzung ba dag mngon par sprul nas rin po che'i sring po byang chub
436a1(1): thams cad kyi gzug nan rab tu snang du'i rgyal mtshan gyi cod pa na mgol bcings pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis rlabs nas/ zil ma krung bcas te 'dzam
436a2(1): nga gzugs pa 'jig rten gyi bzlas rgyamachisangs rgyas shing brdad du med pa'i dru shin tu ra ba byed kyis sa kyi 'jig rten gyi khamasas surgyas pashing rigs mi da pazhin duldan pa sa drug
436a3(1): de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor kun tu snang ba'i dbyangs kyi smon lam gyi ba ni rab tu rtogs pa zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'dzin gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tum
436a4(1): bsnyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / baspu'i sgo thams cad dang / sras
436a5(1): thaMd dang / yan lag dang nyid lag tham cad dang / tshig gi lam tha~Mng dang / gos dang smad yogs thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor thams cad/ bdag dang bcoM ldan 'das rnam par snang
436a6(1): mdzad dang / snron gyi mtha'i mar thug pa'i de bzhin gsheg pa 'das pa tham cad dang / bIr ma'i myur thug pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan pa dang / lcang mastan pa mthun padzad dang / 
436a7(1): da ltar byung ba phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byam klu sa maM zam cad na bzhugs pa rnam kyi sngon sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho dang / len pa dang sbyin pa'i ngas
436a8(1): badzad kyi gzugs brtan mtshan dang dpe brad po dang / bsgra'i sgo dang lus thams cad nas/ yan log dang nying lag dang chog gi lam dang / gos spyad gi yogs tham cang la rab tu snang bar 'gyur
436b1(1): bas rnam par bstan pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu snang bar bstan pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yan lag
436b2(1): dang nyin lag thams cad thub par rab tu bstan pa dang / ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtshor rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dzad kyi brtson 'grus dang / 
436b3(1): drag shul dang / rnam par gnon pa dang / ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang / de bzhin gsheg pa thams cad kyi bsam gtan gyi rgya mtsho yongs su tshol zhing rab tu
436b4(1): bsgrub pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar 'gyur ba yong su bstan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i tshul yongs su bsgrub cing chos yongasu tshol ba dang ldan pa dang / 
436b5(1): bdog zad yongasu gtong zhing shin tu zhig gnon pa'i lus dang / ngo'i gzugs brtan rnam par dmigs par bya bas sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongasu bstan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd
436b6(1): mthong zhing dga' ba dang / byang chub sem tha~Md kyi yaMl 'gro ba zad mngon par mo par byed pa dang / ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho ba tu snang bar 'gyur ba yongasu bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' tha~Md kyi smon laM rgya
436b7(1): mtsho mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgo yongs dag pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongasu bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' tha~Md kyi stob kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rab tu grub pa dang / 
436b8(1): rna par gnon pa dang / rna bar dag par byas pa dang ldan pa sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar chur pa yongasu bstan pa dang / tshe kye dbying rtsa mtshon par 'phrul pa tha~Md kyi sprin gyis brgyan par bkang ste/ byang chub seMs dang 'thang kyi mes kyi kyi 'khor dang
437a1(1): ldan pa'i sngon gyi tshor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa byed cing / mi mjed ga 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lkugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang nu ga de nga
437a2(1): ste/ 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas steng gi phyogs su brtan terdo rje'i dbang ba'i sna tshogs thams cad kyi rgyan gyi snying po can gyi khang pa brtsegs pa dang / seng ge'i khri rdo rje dang / 
437a3(1): in+dan la'i pad+ma'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas nor bu rin pa cha thams cad rab du 'bar ba'i drabs kun nas brtan pa dang / ri pa che'i rgyal dris gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dbyangs
437a4(1): su sbags pa'i 'phreng ba rab tu 'phyang ba dang / mgo la rin po che'i gcod par thags pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas dkyil mo dkrung bcas te 'khod do// 
437a5(1): bam po brgyad bcu sna bdun pa'o// / byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'khor dang bcas par byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon lam
437a6(1): gyis 'byung ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung nas zhal dulta ba ye shes yongs su dag pa'i mig dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dang
437a7(1): mang lnga'i rgyal mi gsung rgya ma tshol ra ba yongs su gzhol ba byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbang rab tu thab par bral lengs pa'i pha ral tu bgrod par byin pa de bzhin gshegs pa tham
437b1(1): cad kyi drung du 'dong ba/ skad cig skad cig tu yongs su bstan par rnam par 'phrul pas 'jig rte gyi khams thams cad lus gcig gis rgyas par gang ba'i yul dang ldan pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams
437b2(1): cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du lus mngon par 'byung zhing rnam par snang ba rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la 'jig gyi khams thams cad khams gcig tu snang zhing khong du chud par yang dag par ston pa'i yul
437b3(1): dang ldan pa 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i dus la sdod par gzhol ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i sprin gyi 'brug smra ba spu'i bu ga thams
437b4(1): cad nas rab tu sgrog pa'i yul dang ldan pa sems can gyi khams thams cad sgyu ma lta bur yongs su shes pa rab tu thob pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mig g.yor lta bur khong du chud pa srid pa'i
437b5(1): rgyud du skye ba thams cad rmi lam lta bur shes pas byung ba'i las dang rnam par smin pa thams cad gzugs brnyan lta bur shes pas rnam par dag pa ye shes mngon par grub pa thams cad smig sgyu re ltar
437b6(1): mngon par shes pa 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam bkras pa thams cad sprul pa lta bur khong du chud pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i stabs bcu dang / ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob pa/ mi 'jigs pa'i khyu mchog
437b7(1): dang seng ge'i nga ngos rnam par gnon pa/ sa sa yang dag par rig pa mi med pa'i rgya mcher zhugs pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi srang byam tsho dang / chos kyinges pa'i tshig gi ye shes rab du thab pa/ ches kyi dbyis
438a1(1): pa gas pa la ye shes kyi dkyil 'khar rnam par dgu pa/ bdud kyi kyil lakhar thams cad rnam par dkyus pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa/ dus gsum rnams na gyi shes pa'i ska
438a2(1): rab tu gnas pa/ chos thams cad la ye shes bsgribs pa med pa rab tu thob pa/ gnas med pas nam mkha'i spyod yul dang ldan pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa len pa med pa nam mkha' lce'u'i
438a3(1): btsun 'grus dang ldan pa/ srid pa thams cad mi dmigs pa'i ye shes kyi spyad yul can chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi tshul rgya mtshol rab tu zhugs pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad tha medad pa'i yi zhes
438a4(1): kyi sgor zhugs pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gcig nas gcig tu bzung ba'i rnam par 'phrul pas byung ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyung thams cad du skyes pa'i lus yongs su ston pa 'jig rte
438a5(1): khams thams cad bye dubs tha ba dang / rjeche pa dang / yangs pa dang / rig pa sna rnams rab tu rtsigs pazhin du phra bar ning rgyachen pa yang dag par bzung ba'i ye shes khong du nang pa migs pa rgya na pa
438a6(1): mams pa dang / mas mams ca mam kyigs ma ma pa zhi sheg mams sa kyang rgyal mas nas kyi pa sa
438b1(1): thams cad du mgo rmongs pa med pa'i ye shes rab tu thob pa/ sems kyi skad cig gis phyogs rgyas par 'gengs pa sha stag ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis de lta bu'i yon tan chang
438b2(1): med pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sha stag gis madz+re ta'i tshal thams cad yongs su rgyas par gyur kyang / nyan thos chen po shA ri'i bu dang / me'u 'gal gyi bu dang / 'od srungs chen po dang / 
438b3(1): nam gru dang / rab 'byor dang / 'gag med dang / mos po dang / ka t+ya'i bu dang / byams pa gang gi bu la sogs pas/ mdze ta'i tshal na 'khod pa bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa de dag ma mthong
438b4(1): sangs rgyas kyi bkod pa de dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul dang / sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyod
438b5(1): pa rnam par 'phrul pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin brlabs dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa yang ma mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa'i yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa
438b6(1): de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun nas 'ongs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun nas 'dus pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun nas tshogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' nye bar 'ongs pa
438b7(1): byang chub sasems dpa 'a dam par 'phrul pa dang / byang chub sems pa'i cha 'phrul dang / byang chub sems dpa' gakhar gyi dkyil 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa'i phyogs su 'khang pa dang byang
439a1(1): sems dpa' seng ge'i khri bkod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' khang pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par spyad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par
439a2(1): cheb dang / byang chub sems dpa' ma par ga pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ma par brdungs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam pa gan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de ban ga nas
439a3(1): pa la mchod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' yongs su smin par ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'a'i sngon du 'drar ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi lus
439a4(1): rnam par dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi lus yongs su rdzogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' spen lam gyi lus rnam par dmigs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs
439a5(1): kyi lus yongs su grub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan phun sum tshogs pa yongs su dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor kha dog mthu' yas pa'i bkod pa
439a6(1): dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'dag zer gyi dra ba rab tu'i dbadang / byang chub sems dpa'i sprul pa'i sngon kun tu 'phreng ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' phyogs kyi dra brgyas par 'gengs pa dang / byang chu
439a7(1): ma rgya lal ma pa la pas pa la ma sa rgyam dag sa sum ma sa pa rgyal ba
439b1(1): 'i pa bas bgapas sa ldan ldanas sa rnam pamam ldan das kyis byags bana' ba na pa khams sa gdags pa'i sangs rgyas canapa ngan ma
439b2(1): gradag pa'i yang dag par bsan pa ma mdang // de dag la ni sangs rgyas btsam pan 'das rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yang dag par brdung ba ma mngang// de sa ni na pa
439b3(1): 'khor ba'i che/ sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba ma byas sa// de dag gis ni gzharan gyi sems kyi rlung la byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rab du bzhags
439b4(1): byas so// de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung rgyud mi bcad pa'i phyir zhugs pa ma yin no// de dag gis ni sems can thams cad yongs su bsdu ba'i phyir brtson na pa ma yin no// de dag gis ni byung
439b5(1): chub sems dpa' rnams pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul bar ma byas so// de dag gis ni sngon 'khor ba'i tshe/ thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i ye shes kyi sa la dmigs pa ma byas so// 
439b6(1): de dag gis ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar brtsegs pa ma byas so// de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su ma
439b7(1): bsgrubs so// de dag gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa thams cad du rnam 'phrul pa'i mngon par shes pa khong du chud do// de dag gis ni byang chub dpa'i mig gi lam gyis rnam par dmigs par bya ba 'jig
440a1(1): rten las 'das pa thun mong ma yin pa'i byang chub tu shes pa khong du chud do// de dag gis ni byang chub sems dpa'i mig gi dmigs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam chen po
440a2(1): las byung ba khong du chud ngo // nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kun gyis ni byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i ye shes kyis mig gi las kyis rnam par dmigs pa thun mong ma yin pa de bzhin gshegs
440a3(1): pa'i byin gyis rlabs las byung ba'i sgyu ma'i rnam pa'i chos nyid kyis grub pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'du shes sna tshogs yongs su 'dzin pa byin gyis brlob pa byang chub sems dpa'i dga'i shugs can chen po rnam
440a4(1): par 'phel bar byed pa khang du ma chung ngo / de bas na can chen po'i mchog gi zungs dang / bzang po'i brdungs la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa mi mthong ngo // mi thos so// mi shes sa
440a5(1): khong du mi chud de// mi rtogs so// mi rig go// yid mi ches so// mi sems so// rnam par mi lta'o// rtogs par mi lta'o// nges par mi sems so// nye bar mi sems so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de na sangs
440a6(1): rgyas kyi spyod yul te/ nyan thos kyi spyod yul ma yin no// de bas na nyan thos chen po de dag 'dze ta'i tshal de nyid na 'khod kyang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag mi mthong ste// de dag la de dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba
440a7(1): me // de dag gisasangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dag mamang du la thum le shes kyi sagarnam par mngag so// migs bcung ngus rgyanan pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis 'dug nga dzin dag bu'i mang // ngas
440b1(1): shes pa dang blta ba 'am/ khong du chud par bya ba'am/ rtogs par bya ba 'am/ rgyas par dgang bar bya ba 'am/ 'jug par bya ba 'am/ rnam par blta ba 'am/ nyams su myong bar bya ba 'am/ gnan pa 'am/ 
440b2(1): rnam par gnan pa 'am/ gzhan gyis thos par bya ba 'am/ bstan par bya ba 'am/ smos par bya ba 'am/ yang dag par bstan par bya ba 'am/ bstabs par bya ba 'am/ sbyin par bya 'am/ de la sems can
440b3(1): rnams yongs su bskal bar bya'am/ sbyar bar bya ba 'am/ rab tu dgod par bya ba 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i chos nyid la sems can dgod par bya bar yang dag la de lta bu'i rnam par thar pa med do// 
440b4(1): de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul med do// de lta bu'i khyu mchog gi mthu med do// de lta bu'i stobs med do// de lta bu'i dbang med do// de lta bu'i gnas med do// de lta bu'i 'du shes med do// de lta bu'i mig gi mthu med do// / 
440b5(1): de lta bu'i ye shes med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag ni de ltar nyan thos kyi theg pa las byung ba/ nyan thos kyi lam gyis yongs su grub pa/ nyan thos kyi spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs pa/ nyan thos kyi
440b6(1): 'bras bu la gnas pa/ bden pa snang ba/ shes pas nges par rtog pa/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas pa/ shin tu zhi ba'i mthar thug pa/ snying rje chen po'i bsam pa med pa/ 'jig rten thams cad la mi lta mi sdod pa
440b7(1): rang gi don grub pa ste/ de dag ni me te'i tshal de nyid du kun nas 'dus te/ 'khod pa la bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga dang / g.yas g.yon dang / snam logs nas bcom ldan 'das la mngon du lta bar gnas kyang / ma
441a1(1): ta'i chal der sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag mthong bar ma gyur to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yang dag par mi bsgrubs pa dang / thams cad
441a2(1): mkhyen pa'i ye shes yang dag par ma bsdus pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la yang dag par ma zhugs pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la smon lam yang dag par ma btab pa dang / 
441a3(1): thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par ma bsgrubs pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes yongs su ma bsgrubs pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ma sbyangs pa de dag gis ni/ de bzhin
441a4(1): gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug cing / rtogs par bya ba 'am/ blta zhing khong du chung bar bya bar minus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i rigs dang ldan pa
441a5(1): rnams kyi mig lam gyis lta ba ma yin gyi/ nyan thos kyi mig gis lta ba ma yin no// de bas na nyan thos chen po de dag mdze ti'i tshal de nyid na 'khod kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / 
441a6(1): sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'ang yongs su dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun nas 'dus pa yang mthong pong ma gyur to// de yang 'di lta ste dper na/ gang+gA'i chu klung chen pa'i dzam
441a7(1): rnams mchu'i bas brjes pa dang / sem pa 'a dus gnang bas/ gags me pa/ lus kyis padang khang sa tshig tsong 'i rnasas pa
441b1(1): dang rims bskams pa/ bya rog mang pos gtse ba/ spyang khyi dang / was tho brtsams pa brgya steng mang po kun nas 'dus kyang gdagA'i klung chen po mthong ste/ sgrib pa
441b2(1): las kyis bsgribs pa'i phyir te/ la las ni bskams te chu med par mthong ngo // la las ni thal thal bas yongs su gang bar mthong ngo // de bzhin gdu nyan thos chen po
441b3(1): gnas brtan de dag mdze ta'i tshal de nyid na 'khod kyang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs ma rig pa'i ling thog gis mig kun nas khyebs pa dang / thams cad
441b4(1): mkhyen pa nyid kyi sa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i mthus yongs su ma gzung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de dag ma mthong ma shes so// / 'di lta ste dper na/ 'dun ma chen po
441b5(1): 'dus pa'i skye bo mang pos dbus su mi la la zhig gnyid kyis myos te log par gyur nas/ de gnyid kyis leg pa'i rmi lam du gnas de nyid na lha'i grong brdal brgya byin gyi gnas blta na mdzes
442a1(1): pa dang / ri rab kyi steng shing dang bcas pa'i bza' shing gi rab ba'i 'khor dang bcas pa lnga'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis gang ba lta ba'i bu khrag
442a2(1): khrig brgya phrag stong snyed gnas ste/ pa/ lha'i me tog sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i shing lha rdzas kyi gos dang / mu tig gi 'phreng ba dang / 
442a3(1): po che'i brgyan dang / se mo do sna tshogs mang po byin pa dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan rnam pa sna tshogs rlung gis yongs su bskyod cing sgra dbyangs yid du 'ong ba la sman
442a4(1): pa 'byin pa'i sil snyan gyi shing mang po dang / dga' ba'i brtsed ma bkod pa'i pa rnam pa sna tshogs mthong bar gyur la lha'i bu me mang pos glu dbyangs
442a5(1): blangs pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rol mo byas pas sgra yid du 'ong zhing sman pa thos par gyur te/ bdag nyid kyang de na 'dug pa sum byed pa la lha rjes kyi bsad
442b1(1): bas klubs pa'i gnas de dag thams cad mthong bar gyur kyang / skye bo'i tshogs mang po de dgis gnas de nyid na 'khod pa bzhin du mi mthong mi shes khong du mi chud do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
442b2(1): de ni skyes bu gnyid kyis log pa de nyid kyi rmi lam gyis blta ba yin gyis/ gnas de nyid 'khod kyang skye bo mang po de dag gis blta ba ma yin no// de bzhin
442b3(1): du byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang po byang chub la mngon mngon par mos pa de dag sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis rlabs pa rgya chen po

443a2(1): kyi chos nyid dang / yang lag rnam pa thams cad du shin tu rdzogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i khyad par dang / smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bya
443a3(1): ba rnam par dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su gnod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par spyod pa
443a4(1): thams cad la rnam par rtse ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi spyod yul thams cad la chags pa med pa rnam par spyong pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rgyu

443b2(1): de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi yul la zhugs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa yul gyis byung ba de dag gis de bzhi gshegs pa'i seng nge 'dzin gyi
443b3(1): 'phrul ba'i yul de dag mthong yang / lan thos chen po mchog go bzung dang / bzung po'i bzung la sogs pa/ rang gi dgos pas tshim par gyur pa/ gzhan gyi dgos
443b4(1): ba/ sel bar gnog pa/ gtang snyoms can de dag bajed 'i tshal de nyid la gnas kyang / tshe 'di la bde bar spyod pas bde zhing dga' bar gnas pa las par de bzhin gshegs pa
443b5(1): ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i yul de dag khong du mi chud do// 'di lta ste dper na sa chen po rin po che thams cad kyi 'byung gnas kyi phun sum tshogs pa gder brgya stong du
443b6(1): mas gang ba/ rin po che sa tshogs rnamapa tha dad pas yongs su gang ba 'di la yang ri po che 'byung gnas dang / gter gyi rgyas la mkhas shing byang ba'i mi rin po che brdag rje
444a1(1): / gdug lag khang gis brog du byang ba gder gyi gtsug lag dang / rgyus dang dor btags gya dam par lobs pa/ bsod rnams rgya cher

444a3(1): par gas pa byed cing de ma yin pa'i sems can rgan pa dang / rab dang dbul ba dang / nyamanyes pa dang / kha zas dang gis pa'i 'byor pa rnams la sdud cing khyab par go sha byed
444a4(1): la/ nor gyi dga' ba sna tshogs nyams su myong bar byed kyang sems can rin po che 'byung gnas dang gter gyi rgyus mi shes pas/ bsod nams ma byas pa/ rin po che la shes
444a5(1): pa'i mig yongs su bdag pa de dag cing 'kho na 'khod kyang / rin po kyi 'byung gnas de dag dang / ring po tshi ga ra de dag khong du ma chud mo shes pas paring po che yang brang du med
444a6(1): / rin gyi nakyang byang med de// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de ban gshegs pa'i yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la ye shes kyi tshig shin tu rnam par dag pa/ 
444a7(1): de ba gshegs pa segs kyi kyad yul das ma gyim mi khyab pa lazugs pa de dag mdzadza' 'tshal ni 'khod cing / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag mtha

444b2(1): mngon par brjod de/ sdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can de dag yongs su sdud kyang / nyan thos chen po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de dag dang / 
444b3(1): byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po kun nas 'dus pa de lta bu yang ma mtho rim shes so// 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu la la zhig mig gnyis gos kyis bka'
444b4(1): s+ho/ rin po che'i gling du phyin par ma gyur na/ des rin po che gling der phun tshun 'gro ba dang / 'greng ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal ba byas kyang rin po che 'byung gnas de

444b6(1): dag gi spyod yul lam/ rin btang ngam/ yongs su spyad pas rgyus kyang mi shes pas/ de ni rin po che de dag len kyang mi len la/ rin po che'i don kyang nyams su
444b7(1): myong bar mi byed do// gang gi mig la bsgribs pa med pa de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs dag thams cad mthong zhing shes so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'

447b6(1): sangs rgyas chos tshul mi shes pa'i// 'jig rten kun kyang mgo rmongs so// chos kyi rgyal po'i cho 'phrul dag/ tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab

448a3(1): kha'i// rnam 'phrul shin tu zab pa dang // rgyal bas mdze ta'i tshil du bstan// rgyal sras bdag che ba rnams// zhing rnams bsam yas bye ba nas// rgyal ba'i zhal ltar
448a4(1): mos dga' ste/ kun nas 'dus pa'i tshogs la ltos// smon lam yongs su bur sum tshogs// smon lam spyod pa chags med pa// de dag bsam pa shes par ni//

448b6(1): bar bgyis// gnas med len pa med pa rnams// smos pa med cing mi dzin la// rdul bral chags pa'i sems med pa// chos kyi dbyings la gzhol ba dang /
