456b1(1): gas rgyas pa dgang ba bstad ba dang / 'di lta ste/ dmigs pa'i gzhi thams cad du la sangs rgyas kyi rnam par sprul pa dus sum thams cad yang dag par rnam
456b2(1): gyur pa'i byin gyis brlabs pas yang dag par bstad pa dang / 'di lta ste/ zhing thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi rnam par sprul pa dus gsum thams cad la
456b3(1): dag par gzhol bar gyur pa'i byin gyis brlabs pas yang dag par bsad pa dang / 'di lta ste/ zhing thams cad kyi rdul shing tu tha de rnams la dusas su
456b4(1): gyi zhing gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / bskal pa rgya mtsho yongs su bshad cing bstar pa dang / 'di lta ste/ dus
456b5(1): gsum gyi sangs rgyas smon ldem rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu brjod pa phyi ma'i mthar phyin pa byin gyis brlabs pas byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par 'byung ba
456b6(1): bston pa dang / 'di lta ste/ chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa'i seng ge'i khri dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang // snying po
456b7(1): byang chub kyi rgyan tha mi dad pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa tha dad pa rab tu bskor ba'i mthar byin gyis brlab pa bsad pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i ngag de ltar
457a1(1): s+ya// seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la bstan pa bcu po de dag la sogs pa shin tu bstan pa sangs rgyas kyi
457a2(1): smon lam gyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu pra ba snyed yod de/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ni dri bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul lo// de nas byang chub sems dang
457a3(1): kun tu bzang pos de bzhid gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin chen po seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa 'di nyid kyi don gyi phyogs bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis zhal dus
457a4(1): nga / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad la rnam par bltas te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'an
457a5(1): gyi rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' dang dbus med pa la rnam par bltas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab par yang dag par gzhol ba la bltas ras ye shes
457a6(1): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i snam chos nyid la rnam par bltas te/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas mkham pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa la rnam par bltas nas/ 
457a7(1): mnga' nga dbus med pa'i ngag gi las dang / nges pa'i tshig dang chos thams cad la rnam par bzlas dmi tshigs su bcad pa'
457b1(1): smras // baspu gcig la rgya mtsho rgyal ba'i zhing // zhing kun shin tu phra ba'i rdul dang ma'am// de nas sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa
457b2(1): kun gyis yongs bskor sangs rgyas gdan la bzhugs// skad cig rtsel zhing mang rgya mtsho rnams// snying po byang chub pad+ma'i gdan mos pa// chos dbyings rgya chen
457b3(1): yongs su rgyas bkang zhing // shing drung dam pa kun mgon po snang // zhing kun gyi rdul brar mang rab rnyed// rgyal ba spu rtse gcig la yongs bzhugs pa/ byang chub
457b4(1): sems dpa' 'khor gyis yongs su bskor// kun kyang bzang po spyong ba sngon po mdzad// zhing mchog gcig na rgyal ba bzhugs gyur kyang // byang chub sems dang
457b5(1): smin mang mi zad pa// de dag phyogs bcu ma lus thams cad nas// 'jam klas zhing kun bkang zhing kun kyang 'ong // zhing rnams bye ba'i rdul phrar mjam pa yis/ 
457b6(1): byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan rgyo mtsho 'od// phyogs bcu'i chos dbyings rgyas par kun bkang zhing // ston pa de la kun kyang 'khor nas ldang // zhing rnams ku
457b7(1): tu gzugs rab tu bston// chos kyi rgyal po rgyal ba'i ye shes mtsho// de dag kun kyang bzang po'i spyod la gnas// sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor du nye bar 'dod// 
458a1(1): s+ya/ 'jam klas zhing rnams kun na 'khod spyod cing // byang chub sems dpa'i dga' bar rab gnas shing // chos kyi sprin mnyan dpa
458a2(1): bo de dag ni// zhing gcig tu yang bskal pa bye bar spyod// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyod par byed// chos kyi gang chen mtsho spyod rnam par snang // smon lam rgya mtsha
458a3(1): kun la rab tu 'jug/ de dag sangs rgyas sa'i spyod yul gnas// rgyal ba'i chos rnams gzhan dang gzhan byung ba'i// de dag kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa shes/ 
458a4(1): sangs rgyas yon tan lags pa rgya mtsho dang // rnam par 'phrul pa rgya chen yangs la 'jug/ bde gshegs chos dbyings kun tu rgyas bkang zhing // zhing rnams kun
458a5(1): gyi rdul phrad ji snyed pa'i// sku'i sprin rnams rtag tu 'gyed mdzad cing // chos kyi char gyis sems can rab la 'god// 
458a6(1): rnam par bstongs pa 'di nyid la debs kyang brnan te/ dgod par mdzad pa'i don du srid tshabs kyi mdzod spu'i nang nas/ chos kyi dbyings so kun ras rnam par dmigs pa
458b1(1): snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'od gzer chen po// 'od gzer gyi dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / ldang ba bkyes/ 
458b2(1): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya batsho thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jam klas pa thams cad snang bar mdzad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdza
458b3(1): ta'i tshal du tshogs pa de dag gi chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas 'jam klas pa thams cad dang / sangs
458b4(1): rgyas kyi ning thams cad kyi rdul zla ba'i khongs su chud pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba dag la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ming du bya ba kha dog sa
458b5(1): tshogs dang / rnam pa ste tshogs su rnam par dag pa dang / gzhi sna tshogs dang / dbyibs sna tshogs dang / ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag na
458b6(1): byang chub sems dpa' snying po byang chub tu phyin te/ seng ge'i khri la 'dug pa// 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyis shin du mchod pa/ byang chub
458b7(1): sems dpa'i tshogs kyis kun nas bskor ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar mthong ste/ la lan ni sangs
459a1(1): / rgyas kyi ring brjod du med pa tsam du shin tu yangs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na chos kyi dbyings rgyas par khyab pa dbyangs
459a2(1): kyi dkyil 'khor gyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar mthong ngo // la la ra ni lnga'i gnas na 'dug/ la la ra ri k+Sha'i gnas na 'dug/ la lar rigadod sbyin gyi garas
459a3(1): na 'dug la lar ni lha ba yid kyi gnas na 'dug la la ra di dmakha' lding gi ga sa na 'dug/ la lar ri mi 'am ci'i gnasar 'dug/ la lar ni
459a4(1): lto 'phye chen po'i gnas na 'dug/ la la ra ri re 'ab ci'i dbang po'i gnas na 'dug/ la la re ni bi'i 'jig rten gyi grong dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / 
459a5(1): ljongs dang / khams dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dgar rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs dang / spyod lapa sna tshogs dang / lus sna tshogs dang / 
459a6(1): 'dzin gyi sgo rnam par dmigs pa sna tshogs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi mngon par shes pa sna tshogs dang / rigs dang rgyud sde tshags su byung ba dang / kha dog rnam par
459a7(1): dmigs pa sna tshogs dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs dang / 'od gzer gyi dra ba bkye ba sna tshogs dang / dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs dang / 
459b1(1): gtam gyi skyes bu'i ga'i sna tshogs dang / gtan pa'i bzhi sna tshogs dang / yi ge dang nges pa'i tshig sna tshogs kyis dkyil 'khor sna tshogs na chos smon pa mthong ba
459b2(1): gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed kyis 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings mdzab klas pa nam mkha'i mthus gtugs pa phyogs bcur rnam par gnas/ 
459b3(1): phyogs kyi rgyud mtha' yas 'dus pa/ phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad du gtugs pa/ chos sna tshogs kyi sgo dang ldan pa/ phyogs kyi ming bya ba sna tshogs su
459b4(1): gtogs pa/ phyogs sna tshogs kun tu zhol ba/ phyogs cha rnam pa mtha' dad pa rtogs pa/ phyogs sna tshogs kyi rjes su song ba/ phyogs rgya mtsho sna
459b5(1): su gtogs pa// 'di lta ste shar phyogs dang / lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang dang shar phyogs mtshams dang / shar
459b6(1): phyogs mtshams dang / lho dang nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub dang byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi zhing gi lhur gyi phyogs dang / 
459b7(1): sems can gyi lus kyi phyogs dang / sems can gyi ming du bya ba'i phyogs dang / sngon gyi mtha'i mur thug pa'i phyogs dang / phyogs bcu 'di ltar byung ba'i
460a1(1): @s+ya/ phyogs dang / nar / mkha'i khongs su thams cad du skra'i rtse ma can dgod pas dmigs pa'i phyogs dang / zhing thams cad kyi rdul phra ba
460a2(1): sagatsug sa sag du pa thugs la du dag bya ba phyogs dang / las sbyid byed sna tshogs kyis yongasasu grub pa'i thogs dang / skur rnab gtsug
460a3(1): mtha' dang dbus med de ma mkha'i dbyings kyi ming du bar gtogs pa'i phyogs kyi khongs su chud pa'i dus kyi dbyings mi nyam pa'i nyid du gzhol bas kun tu bzhugs
460a4(1): ba'i 'gro ba thams cad tha mi dad pas sems cad thams cad kyi 'du shes kyi rnam pa la mnyam pa'i sgra dbyangs su gyur pa'i 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems la gzugs
460a5(1): brnyan rab tu snang bar gyur pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin rnam par 'phrul pa sems can thams cad kyi lus la mngon par blta bas dpogs par
460a6(1): bya bas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'gro ba'i tshul dang ldan pa/ bskal pa thams cad la ye shes tha mi dad pa/ zhing thams cad le kun tu spobs pa/ 
460a7(1): sems can gyi bsam pa dzaM lta ba bzhin gzugs mdzan sum du bstan pa/ rnam par dmigs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'brel pas sangs
460b1(1): rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bstan pas sems can thams cad 'dul ba rgyan ma 'chad pa mthong bar gyur pa de dag thams cad na sngon bcom ldan 'a
460b2(1): rnam par snang mdzad kyis dge ba spyod pa lam pa mnyam pa dang / sdu ba'i dngos po bzhis yongs su bsdus pa mthong ba dang / mnyan pa dang / 
460b3(1): rjes su dran pa dang / bsnyen bkur bas smras pa mthong ba dang byas pa dgo/ sngon bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du
460b4(1): bcud pa dag go// de bzhin gshegs pa de dang de dag gi drung du gshegs pa'i rtse dge ba'i rtsa bas yongs su bsdus pa dag ste/ de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba
460b5(1): bskal pa mnyam pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su smin par 'gyur ba'i thabs cad kyis shin tu bzung ba'i bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad
460b6(1): kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa chos kyi dbyings ltar yangs shing nam mkha'i dbyings kyis mthas gdugs par gyur pa dag kyang mthong zhing khrod du chud par
460b7(1): gyur pa yin te// la la ni chos kyi sku la 'jug go// la la ni gzugs kyi sku la 'jug go// la la ni sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' yongs su
461a1(1): su bsgrub pa la 'jug/ la la ni pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa la 'jug go// la lan spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor
461a2(1): yongs su dag pa'i rgyud la 'jug go/ l-i la dbyang chub sems dpa'i sa'i rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug go/ la la ri bangod par byang chub par rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug
461a3(1): la la ni sangs rgyas rnam par spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin tha mi dad pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug gi/ la lan de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs mi 'jigs pa la 'jug go/ 
461a4(1): la la ni sangs rgyas kyi so so yang dag par rig pa rgya mtsho la 'jug go// de dag la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du
461a5(1): med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba sred la 'jugs/ mos pa sna tshogs dang / sgo sna tshogs dang / 'jug pa sna tshogs dang / 'bab pa sna tshogs dang / tshul chags
461a6(1): dang / rjes su 'brang ba sna tshogs dang / phyogs sna tshogs dang / snod sna tshogs dang / yul sna tshogs dang / 'jig rjer sna tshogs dang / khong du chud pa sna tshogs
461a7(1): rang tshigs chags dpa/ rnam par 'phrul pa sna rigs dang / thabs snga tshogs dang /  gad cigs dang rangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul brgyam tsho dgal
461b1(1): ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs kyi 'jug pa/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings kun nas brgyad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' ting
461b2(1): nge 'dzir dus su ma thams cad la thogs pa med par yul snang bar byed pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings kyi bzhi tha dad pa'i ye shes snang ba dang / 
461b3(1): byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dus sum thams cad la thogs pa med par yul sdang bar byed pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings gyi gan
461b4(1): tha dad pa'i ye shes snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul gyi dbyings la 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting
461b5(1): te 'dzin na mkha'i dbyings su snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu thos pas rnam par 'byed pa dang / byang
461b6(1): chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba'i rgyan gyis rnam par gnor cing rnam par bsgyings pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'di
461b7(1): chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul thams cad kyi glog gi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings thams cad du thogs pa med par smra bsdogs pas rje
462a1(1): s+ya/ par 'gengs pa'i zla ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid kyis brgyan pa'i 'od
462a2(1): kyis byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzidag bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya patshe de dag la rab tu 'jug go/ byang chub
462a3(1): sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin chos kyi rgyal po'i thabs tshigs byed pa'i rgyal mtshad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dmigs pa thams cad la sangs rgyas
462a4(1): rgya batsho rnab par bralta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ngang nge 'dzin 'jig rted gyi rgyud thams cad du tha ba dad pa'i lus spang ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / byang
462a5(1): chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tha mi dad pa'i yul la 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzid 'jig rjed thams cad
462a6(1): rgyud kyis rjes su 'jug pa snying po can dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad kyi gnas la rter pa'i byin gyis brlabs dang / byang chub
462a7(1): sems dpa' ting nge 'dzi shi shu'i ba la rab tuzhi pas kun tu spang ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / byang chubasapas dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sprul pa bzang po dbigs pas
462b1(1): mad pas kun tu 'phrul pa gzugs brnyan dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin zhing thams cad yongs su 'dra ba'i blon gyis brlabs dang / byang chub sems
462b2(1): dpa'i ting nge 'dzin zhing thams cad du mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam pa rna mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba thams cad du khyad par du
462b3(1): 'phags pa'i dkyil 'khor chags pa med pas rnam par spyod pa dang / bya chub sems dpa'i ting dri de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyed pa las byung ba'i byin gyis rlabs
462b4(1): dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba thams cad du khyad par du 'phags pa'i dkyil yon tan rgya mtsho thams cad la nan tan gyis 'jug pa dang / 
462b5(1): byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dmigs pa ma lus pa thams cad du rnam par 'phrul pa mngon par bslabs pas phyi ma'i mthar byin gyis rlob pa dang / byang chub
462b6(1): sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho la 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin phyi ma'i mthar de bzhin
462b7(1): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs yang dag par 'dzin par byin gyis brlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin phrogs bcu'i zhing rgya mtsho nga ltar byung ba tham
463a1(1): yongs su dag par mos pa'i byin gyis brlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'jig rten gyi khams thams
463a2(1): cad dang rnam par spyod cing 'grogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dmigs pa thams cad la chags pa med pa'i mthar 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems
463a3(1): dpa' ting nge 'dzin 'jig rten gyi khams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu byin gyis rlob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzir 'jog rter gyi khams thams cad
463a4(1): kyi skur 'phrul pa mngon par khasgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dbang po'i rgya mtsho rdo rje dbang po lta bu khong du chud pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
463a5(1): ting nge 'dzi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sku gcig pa'i snying po'i byin gyis rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzid de bzhin gshe sems kyi skad
463a6(1): cig gcig gi cha la smos kyi dbyings kyi tshul thams cad kho ngadu chud pas khob par gnas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings
463a7(1): la mkhas pa bsgrub po sa mtho kyis pa rlabs byang ma mams dpa'i na'i zugs su tshan ma pa pa
463b1(1): rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin spyi'u kyi zhing thams cad kyi sems can gyi lus tha mi dang bar byen gyis rlob pa dang / byang chub sems
463b2(1): ting nge 'dzin ye shes kyi glong thams cad la mngon su du ya nga dag par gzhol ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang / 
463b3(1): mtshan nyid yongs su shes pas rab tu 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dus gsum gyi sems kyi skad cig thams cad chol tha mi dad pa'i dkyil
463b4(1): 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems kyi skad cig thams cad chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul gyi rang bzhin dam pa dang / byang chub sems dang
463b5(1): ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gsher pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i ye shes kyi rnam par gnon pa'i seng ge dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'tshan
463b6(1): dmigs pa thams cad chos kyi dbyings su shes pa'i mig gi dkyil 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin stobs bcu'i rtsal gyis rnam par
463b7(1): gnon pas yang dag par rtsom pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dmigs pa thams cad kan nas mthong ba'i mig gi dkyil 'khor dang / byang chub
464a1(1): dpa'i dang 'dzin kha dog thams cad kyang kyil 'khor gyis 'gro bar shin du mdzes par bstabs pa dang / byang chub sems
464a2(1): ting nge 'dzir glang po g.yo ba'i sring ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos gcig la chos thams cad yongs su 'du bar ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa
464a3(1): ting nge 'dzin chos gcig gi tshig gi la pa la nges pa'i ngag gis tshig rab tu 'byed pas byang chub sems dpa' de dag bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas
464a4(1): kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho de dag la rab tu 'jug/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rgyal mtshad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis
464a5(1): stong pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dus gsum gyi mu la mthar thug pa med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bskal pa thams cad khong du
464a6(1): chud pas ma dad pa'i ye shes dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin tshul shin tu phra bas stobs bcu khong du chud pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzir mi 'dun
464a7(1): ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bskal ba thams ca du mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub se mas dpa'i ting nge 'dzin phyogs thams cad du shugs kyis mdzad du 'tshar
464b1(1): sprin dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzir mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnam par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin tshor ba
464b2(1): thabs cad kyis reg pa med pas bde ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgyan thams cad du nam mkha'i mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang
464b3(1): chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzir skad cig/ skad gcig tu 'gro ba skad kyi sprul ba'i gzugs brnyan gyi spar/ mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa
464b4(1): ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od nam mkha' lngar rdul dang bral ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nam mkhar
464b5(1): byin gyis rlob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ding nge 'dzin chos thams cad la dbang po rab tu snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad
464b6(1): kyi dor rnam par 'byed pa'i skor ma dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzir stobs bcu'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ding nge 'dzin stong
464b7(1): dras bsrim gyi sangs rgyas pal ba stsalam da // byang rgyabs pas dpa tshang la na sangs rgyas sems cad patshag tu las pa'i bang ba / 
465a1(1): byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzir skad cig garig la brnams thams cad mthar phyin par byed pa dang / byang chub
465a2(1): sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bsod rabs pa zad pa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzir sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa mthong ba'i yul rab tu snang ba
465a3(1): dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad la rdo rje'i seng ge lngar rab tu gangs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' ming nge 'dzir de ba'adi gshegs
465a4(1): bathams cad gro spel pas sangs su bsta pas kun tu rnam par dmigs pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang / bya bsems ma tsha nga da pa gshegasapa
465a5(1): mas ca kyis mnan pam ma'i gan pa dang / byang chubasams dpa' dngang 'du sngags ga
465a6(1): khams btsun gyis bdu bang myu byas star tu zlog pa dang / byang chugasum pa'i dang rjid mengs rgyas thams cing mam thangs
465b1(1): ting 'dzin gangs med pa'i phyir chos kyi rnam mkha' la rnam par la ba dang / byang drub sams dpa'i ting nge 'dzir phyugs gcig du byegs bcu'i rgyam tsha yongs su snang ba
465b2(1): blang dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ngong nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings kyi ba ni thams cad kyi ga'i thams cad kyi snong 'dug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'an
465b3(1): rnas thams cad rgya mtsho thams cad dang ldan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems can thams cad la 'od rab tu 'gyed pas rab tu ni ba'i lus su
465b4(1): 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems kyi skad cig gcig la mngon par shes pa dang / smon lam thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa dngo // 
465b5(1): byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzid rtag par thams cad kun nas mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i byin gyis brlabs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge
465b6(1): 'dzin chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyun gcig tu khong du chud par 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad dran pa'i rang bzhin gyis
465b7(1): rab du grang ba byang chub sems dpa'i tshong 'dzin 'gro ba thams cad du khyad por chen pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes mngan par shes pa dang / byang chu
466a1(1): sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems kyi skad gcig gcig gis chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul mtha' yas pa rang gi lus kyis
466a2(1): rgyas par 'gengs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul gcig gis chos thams cad tshul gcig par dgod pa'i 'od dang / byang
466a3(1): chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor lo gzi brjid kyi byin gyis brlabs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems
466a4(1): can gyi khams mig 'phrul lta bu yongs su bsdu ba'i smon lam dang / spyod pa byin gyis rlob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings kyi
466a5(1): gzhi thams cad tha mi dad pa dang / byang chub snyoms dpa'i ting nge 'dzin pad+mo byin rnam par 'phrul bas kun du rnam par gnod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
466a6(1): nga nge 'dzin sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi rgyud khong du chud pas mngon par shes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin lus sems can thams cad
466a7(1): mas rgya / byang chubamam rje sa ni sems ma la ma gyi yan lal pa ya ya kyi
466b1(1): 'byung ba rtsal mdzad par shes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba'i gni tha dad pa thams cad khong du chud pas mngon par shes pa dang / byang chubs
466b2(1): dpo'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad snying rje chen po mdzod tha ma dang pa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad de bzhiratsha
466b3(1): du rtogs pa'i mtha' la 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par mthar pa'i pho zang rnam par lta bas seng ge rnam
466b4(1): bar bsgyings pa dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin kyi lam la 'jug pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba sred kyis
466b5(1): byang chub sems dpa' de dag de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho de dag la rab tu 'jug gi// sems kyi
466b6(1): skad tsog re re la chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rgyas par 'gengs par 'jug pa'i tshul gyis sngon bskal pa mnyam par spyad pa yang rjes su dran no// de ltar byang
466b7(1): chub sems dpa' de dag mdza ta'i tshal du phyin cing bco ldan 'das kyi sbyar sngar 'khod pa/ seng ge 'i khrin po che snga chags kyi badri'i sring bcar 'jig den
467a1(1): gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra bsnyed dang mnyam par 'angs pal 'khod pa ye shes dang ma
467a2(1): par shes pa chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pas byung ba/ ye shes dang mngon par shes pa chen po'i rdo ba dang ldan pa'i sa rjes su thob pa ye shes kyis kun tu rnam par spyod pa
467a3(1): shes rab kyi 'byung gnas kyi rigs su byang ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la mngon du gyur pa ye shes kyi mig rdul rab rib med pa dang ldan pa/ sems can
467a4(1): can gyi kha lo bsgyur ba'i rang bzhin thob pa sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba/ rtag tu rnam pa med par chos spyod pa/ chos kyi dmig
467a5(1): pa thams cad du ba tu rtogs pa chos thams cad rang bzhid gyis ni bar dmigs pa 'jig rten thams cad shin tu zhi bas gnas tha dad pa meng ba la rab dus
467a6(1): 'jig rten tha dad pa thams cad du rab tu zhugs pa/ gnas med badra shing thams cad du 'dang ba chos kyi gnas thams cad larten pa med pa
467a7(1): mas ca tha me pa la / 'grob thams pa mingasas na par byeb la pamarnasapa pa sems
467b1(1): cad la bde ba'i lam ston pa/ ye shes dang rnam par thar pa shin tu 'phags pa'i gnas kyi spyod yul can/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar phyir
467b2(1): pa'i ye shes kyi lus dang ldan pa/ srid pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad las gyer du 'phags pa 'gro ba thams cad yang dag pa'i mtha' rngub par stod pa/ chos rgya
467b3(1): maro shes rab snang ba'i dkyil 'khor can/ ting nge 'dzin gang zhe / mtsho dang ldan pa'i dbyings la shin tu mnyam par bzhag tsang snying rje chen po rab tu sems
467b4(1): pa/ chos kyi tshul sgyu ma'i rnam pa lta bur rab tu rdzogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la rmi lam lta bur zhugs pa de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba thams cad
467b5(1): mig g.yor lta bur khong du chud pa/ sgra skad dang dbyangs thams cad sra bstan lta bur rnam par rig pa chos thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa'i ye shes sprul pa
467b6(1): lta bur rab tu rdzogs pa/ khyad par du 'phags pa'i smon lam shin du bsags pa/ ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor kun nas rnam par dag pa'i mkhas padang
467b7(1): ldan pa/ sems shin tu ni zhing / rab tu zhi ba dang ldan pa/ gzungs kyi rgyud thams cad kyi ye shes kyi yul dang ldan pa/ ting 'dzin gyi stobs
468a1(1): kyis dogs pa med par kun nas rab tu gnod pa chos kyi dbyings kyi gnas kyi mthar phyir pa'i mig dang lda nga / 
468a2(1): chos thams cad dmigs pa med par rngub par spyad ba rab du thab pa/ shes rab rnal tshe mtha' yas pA la rnam par spyod pa ye shes pha rol du phyin ba'i bar 'a ra
468a3(1): bsang ba/ sa rab kyi sa rol du phyin pa'i thabs dang drugs thob pa/ rdzu 'phrul rol tu phyir bas 'gapa thams cad kyi par ma sto pa pa 'dzi
468a4(1): pha rol tu phyin pa dbang du gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don mkhas pa la phyin ci log med pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/ chos kyi mdzod dbye ba
468a5(1): ga la mkhas pa/ nges pa'i tshig shes pa la mngon par shes pa la mkhas pa/ spobs pa'i stobs dang / chos kyi sprin zad ma shes pa dang ldan pa/ 
468a6(1): 'jigs pa'i khyu mchog dang seng ge'i nga ro 'byin pa/ gnas med pa'i chos kyi dga' bsams pa chos thams cad la rab rab med pa'i tshig gos lnga ba 'dzag
468a7(1): rkyen thams cad kyi 'byung ba dang / 'jigs pa shes pa'i tha bar gyur ba shes rab kyi dkyil 'khor gyis bdad pa'i tshul thams cad rnam par srid pa'i 'od
468b1(1): can ye shes kyi rdo rje bsod nams kyi 'khor yug tu gyur pa/ dper bya ba thams cad las shin du 'das pa chos thams cad la dbang po dang ye shes kyim+b+ha gu rab tu
468b2(1): skyes pa/ dpa' bo'i rgyal mtshan dang / ldan pa/ bdud thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan rab tu stsol pa la dga' ba/ ye shes mtha' yas pa'i dkyil 'khor
468b3(1): gyi gzi brjid can/ 'gro ba thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad la shes rab bsgrib pa med pa dang / mi zad pa
468b4(1): mtha' ye shes kyi rnam par sangs rgyas pa/ yang dag pa'i mtha' kun gyi mthar phyin pa la gnas pa/ mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa rnam par lta ba'i ye shes kyi
468b5(1): mig mngon sum can/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgra la mkhas pa/ maM gnyis pa'i ye shes/ kyi spyod yul dang

469b2(1): sa rgyas pas tha na tu la nges par dag pa/ de papam mtshig dang / lag bsung la mkhas pa/ tshig dang / lag dang ri ma da pa dza

469b7(1): glanom par snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin la rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa/ chags pa med pa'i mtha'i chos thams cad rab tu dbye ba'i ye shes la mngon par mkhas pa chos thams

470a3(1): la yang dag par gzhal bshin du phra ba ste/ yangs pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba la byang chub tu rnam par 'chang rgya ba/ rang bzhin bdog med pa las kha dag thams cad yong

470a6(1): du med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mdze tA'i tshal du 'dug ste/ 'khod pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho la 'jug pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe

470b2(1): byung ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen po'i rgyan mngon par 'thon nas/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par khyab par khu gyur to// 'di lta ste sems kyi skad cig
470b3(1): re rol 'od gzer gyi dra ba'i sprin cha shin tu yangs pa 'gro ba thams cad yongs su tshim par byed pa/ mngon par 'thon te/ phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab pa

470b6(1): dpa'i spyod pa sna tshogs yang dag par ston pa'i tshul gyi sprin mngon par mthon nas/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam gyi sgra dbyangs rab tu
470b7(1): bsgrags/ phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sprul pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i sngon mang po mngon
471a1(1): gapar mthon nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa mas dkyi bsrung gi dbrangs rjems brjod cing phyogs rgya sa par khu par gyur to// byang chub sems pa'i
471a2(1): dang dpe zung bzung pos rnam par rna rA pa'i sprin mang po mngon par 'thon nas/ zhing thams cad du byung ba'i sangs rgyas skye ba gcig nas gcig tu rnying pa bdu brjod cing phyogs pa rgyas
471a3(1): khyab par gyur to// dus gsum gyi de brjid gshegs pa thams cad dang ma ma pa'i snying po byung chub kyi srin mang po mngon par mtho rdza/ de bzhir gshegs pa thams cad mdzin

471a7(1): 'jo nas de dzin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam the'i da ma sor ba ridzin par min ci rgyogs ba rgyam par khya par gyur gi// de dag 'a gribs pa cang
471b1(1): de dag gi byin gyi rlabs dang / chos kyi snang ba rgya mtsho bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu thob pa'i chos nyid kyis rgya chen po rnam par sprul pa'i srin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin

471b6(1): gsung rnams rab tu sgrog byed cing / zhing rnams kun gyi dbyings su khyab par 'phro// tshangs pa'i dbang po gzugs 'dra lus rnams dang / spyod lam rab tu zhi ba dag pa'i gzugs/ 
471b7(1): zhing gyi me tog kun las mngon 'thon te/ bsam gtan yan lag brjod cing kun tu 'dod / kun tu bzang po 'dra ba'i rgyal ba'i sras/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos brgyan/

473a3(1): bskul zhing / yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul bar byed do// lha'i gnas nas shi 'pho ba yongs su bsan pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad skye ba longs
473a4(1): su bstan pa'i sgo dang / byang chub sems dpa'i smod pa'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i sgo dang / rmil ma yongs su bstan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shi
473a5(1): d+ha pa bskyed kyis/ sems tan yongs su bskul ba byed do// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sngon lam gyis byung ba'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su
473a6(1): stod pa'i sgo dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su bstan pa'i skyo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad m+b+hi yon na lan na du bya ba dang rab cu sgrub pa'i
473a7(1): dang / phan la dang ni lag gapang ba'i mang 'i mas mas na pa bye pa/ byang chub se ya 'aM sa par 'phrul dzin gyi sa
473b1(1): rol tu phyin pa yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa dang thams cad dang / sangs rgyas
473b2(1): kyi ye shes kyi lam gyi dkyil 'khor snang ba rab tu brjod pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su btsal ba'i phyir chos kyi tshig dang ying ge re re'i phyir lus grangs med
473b3(1): pa yongs su gtong ba yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi drung du 'gro zhing chos thams cad yongs su rdi ba'i sgo dang / dus la ji ltar 'bab pa/ bsam pa
473b4(1): cil ba bzhin du 'gro ba'i drung du 'gro zhing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su smin par 'gyur ba thob par bya ba'i tshul rgya mtsho snang ba rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i sgo dang / 
473b5(1): byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs thams cad bdub dang phas kyi rgol bas mi tshugs pa'i stobs kyi rgyal mtshan yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / gzo thams ca
473b6(1): shes shing mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i shes pa'i sa yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / 'gro ba thams cad las khyad par du 'phags par shes shing mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi yongs su bas
473b7(1): nga'i sgo dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa'i khyad par shes shing mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis yong su bsten pa'i sgo dang / sems na thams cad kyi dbang po 'dug pa'i sems ca kyi 'ongs pa dang / ba ma rnam pa yang sa
474a1(1): shing mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / de dag la sogs pa sems can thams cad yongs su smin par
474a2(1): ba dang / gdul ba'i thabs dang slu ba'i sgo sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shi ra t+na pra ba snyed kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag sems car thams cad kyi gnas su
474a3(1): byin par snang ste// la la ni lha'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo // la la ni klu'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo // lal ni gnod spyir gyi gnas su phyin par snang ngo // la la ni dri za'i
474a4(1): gnas su phyin par snang ngo // la la ni lA ma yin gyi gnas sa phyin par snang ngo // la la ni nam mkha'i lding gi gnas su byin par snang ngo // la la ni mi'ami ci'i gnas su phyin par
474a5(1): snang // la la ri'i gyi che pa'i gnas su phyin par snang // la la ni tshangs pa'i dbang po'i gnas su zin par snang ngo // la yin mo'i gnas su byin la srung ngo // lal ni
474a6(1): kyi gyung // paldan rdzodags kyi gam matsu nga // lal sems/ dang byas dzigan mas ca khyen par sna
474a7(1): me mas kyi skri nas kyi rgyad rnams cad byin par spangs/ mthang bas 'dul ba'i sems can dang / thas pas 'dul ba dang rjes su dra pas 'dul ba dang / 
474b1(1): dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'dul ba dang / ming gi chu klung gyi sgras 'dul ba dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'dul ba dang / 'od gzer gyi dra ba rab tu 'gyed pas 'dul ba dang
474b2(1): sems can rnams kyi bsam pa'i tshul ji lta ba bzhin du yongasu smin par bya ba dang 'dul ba'i phyir snying rje chen po tha dad pa dang / smor lam tha mi dad pa dang / ye shes tha mi dad pa dang
474b3(1): sems can yongasu bsdu ba tha mi dad pa'i tshul du byang chub sems dpa'i de dag dze ta'i nas rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan pa sna tshogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad dang / 
474b4(1): sems can gyi khams 'byam klas rgyas par 'gengs pa byed par snang yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs drung nas mi yo ste/ la la ni rang gi gnas dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / star
474b5(1): dang 'khor du bcas pas phyogs bcu rgyas par byed par snang yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs drung nas mig yo'o// la la ni sprul pa'i sprin rab tu 'gyed par snang / la la ni sems
474b6(1): can yongasu smin par bya ba'i don du gcig pu gnyis su med par 'gro ba snang yang / de bzhir gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na sa mi ga.e'o// la la ni gnyan pas 'tsho ba'i
474b7(1): gzugs/ la la ni tshangs pa'i gzugs/ wa la ni brtul zhugs can thams cad kyi cha byad dang / chog dang / chu zheng gi gzugs/ la la ni sman pa'i gzugs/ lal
475a1(1): ni gar ma khar gyi gzugs/ la la ni pa'i khyad par pa'i gzugs/ la lan pa za thams cad dang ldan pa'i gzugs sa grang dang grang khyer dang / zong brdal dang / ldangs
475a2(1): dang / khams dang / rgyal po'i bo brang 'khor du phyin par snang ste/ dus kyi dbang gis dus kyi rjes su 'brang zhing / ming dang gzugs dang lus mngon par bsgrub pa the dad pa la lus kyi 'dog
475a3(1): dang / dbyibs tshul dang dra ba dang / dbyangs rnams pa the da pa dang / skad rnams pa tha dad pa dang / spyod lam rnam pa tha dad pa dang / gnas rna pa tha dad pas byang chub sems dpa'i
475a4(1): spyod pa 'gro ba thams cad mig 'phrul lta bur shes pa dang / bzo' 'khor thams cad rab tu brjod pa dang / 'gri ba thams cad kyi shes pa brjod pas snang ba'i sgron mo dang bde ba thams
475a5(1): kyibyin gyi rlabs kyis brtun pa dang / las thams cad snang bar byed pa'i 'od dang ldan pa dang / phyogs thams cad theg pa la gnas par rab tu spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa
475a6(1): chos thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu snang ba la spyod cing / sems car yongs su sbyin par bya ba dang / 'dul ba'i don du grang dang grong khyer dang thong brdal dang / ljongs dang / khams dang
475a7(1): rgyal ba'i gnas dag du phyin par snang ngo // de nas 'jam dpal gno nur gyur pa/ gnas med pa'i bang ba cigs pa na 'dug 'dug pa la/ skal pa brdzun pa'i byang chub sems
475a8(1): dab de pa dang / rnag par byi ba bang pa'i la la rje dag dang / 'jis cad ma 'ardab la btsun nong sa sa rgyas thams cad pas tha bar sor ba

475b2(1): lha dgra dang / snying rje cher po la brtson pa'i lu mA dang / mtsho dang / mche'u dang / rdzing bu dang / khron pa dang / chu klung gi lnga dag dang / shes rab kyi 'od sdang bas rab tu bstsal

475b4(1): mo lha dag dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma mngon par bsgrub pa la btsun pa'i nyi ma'i lha dag dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi nam mkha'i brgyan pa la brtson pa'i mtshan mo'i lnga dag dang / 'akra
475b5(1): ba thams cad srid pa'i rgya mtsho las bsgral bar brtson pa'i gang chen mtsho'i lha dag dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du tshogs yang dag par bsags pa la brtson zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba'i spobs pas
475b6(1): mngon par dpags pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i ro'i lha dag dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi lus la brgyad dang ldan par brtsor zhing sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kha dog dang / byin gyi rlabs la smon cing brtson
475b7(1): pa'i chu klung gi lha dag dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi grong brdal yongs su bskyang bar brtson pa'i grong gi lha dag dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos kyi grong khyer du sngon zhing mos pa'i bu'i dbang po dag dang
475b8(1): sems can thams cad yongs su bsrung ba la zhugs pa'i gnod sbyir gyi dbong ba dag dang / sems can thams cad kyi dga' ba'i shugs rnam par 'phel bar bya ba la brtson pa'i dri zo'i dbang ba dag
476a1(1): / yi dgas kyi rgyud thams cad rnam par bzlog pa la brtson 'di tshul bram gyi dbang po dag dang / sems cad thams cad srid pa'i rgya mtshonas gdon pa'i spror la ma gyis na/ 
476a2(1): pa'i ni ma mkha' lding gi dbang po dag dang / 'jig rten thams cad las 'phags pa 'di bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang / stobs yongasu sgrub pa smon lam yong su bskyed pa'i lha ma yir gyi dbang po dag dpe
476a3(1): de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bas dga' bar gyur cing lus rab tu 'dung ba'i sngo 'phye cher po'i dbang dag dang / 'khor ba las skyo ba'i yod dang lngar ning dor lta ba'i lce'i dbang po dag dang / rim gro chen
476a4(1): rab tu byed cing lus rab tu 'dud pa'i tshangs pa'i dbang po dag dang lhan cig du de dag gis rim gro chen pos mngon par bstod do// ma rod cing de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par gdon pa'i

477a2(1): su dag cing sems can tshad med pa'i dga' ba yongs su skyed pa dang / 'od gzer gyi dra ba'i rgyan sems can dpag tu med pa'i sdug bsngal rab tu ni bar byed pa/ 'khor dun

481a2(1): kun tu bzang ba'i spyod pa la rab tu gnas pa de dag smon lamachen po rgya mtsho la zhugs shing mngon par bsgrubs par gyur to// de ltar smon lam chen po rgya mtshos mngon par bsgrub pa'i som rnam par
481a3(1): dag pas lus yongasu dag pa rab tu thob par to// lus rnam par dag pas lus yang rab tu thob par gyur te/ de ltar lus rnam par dag pa dang lus yang bsam pa mngon par shes pa'i sgo de ngag/

481a5(1): nas kyang mi yol/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongasu bsgrub pa'i phyir phyogs bcur yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i 'phrin las mngon par bsgrub par gyur /

481a7(1): shes bya ba'i grong brdal chen po gang ba der log su dong ste phyin nas/ grong rdal chen po skyid pa'i 'byung gnas kyi shar byegs logs na/ nags 'tshal chen pos la sna tshogs
481b1(1): kyi mtshan gyi rgyan ces bya ba/ sngon gyi sangs rgyas bzhugs pa'i mchod rten sems can smin par mdzad pa'i don du de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis rlabs pa/ zhing mtha' yas pa'i mang
481b2(1): gi sgra rjes su grags pa/ sngon chad bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mdzad pa'i tshe/ yongasu btang ba dka' ba du ma yongasu btang ste/ sa'i phyogs de na lha dang k+Sha dang / 
481b3(1): gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lho phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams rtag tu rgyun mi chang bar mchod par la/ brtson pa'i
481b4(1): gnas yongs pa der 'khor dang bcas te/ phyin nas/ der 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pas mdo sde chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba/ mdo sde bye ba khrag khrig
481b5(1): rgya stong phrag bcu 'byung ba bstan to// de bstan pa'i tshe rgya mtsho chen pos klu bye ba khrag brig rgya mtsho stong du ma nye bar lhags te/ de dag gis chos kyi tshul de thos nas klu'i rgyud garnam
481b6(1): par smod cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan la mos par 'gyur nas klu'i rgyud rnams zlog ste/ lha dang mir skye ba yongasu 'dzin par gyur nas/ der klu stong phrag bcu bla na med pa
481b7(1): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyi mi ldog par gyur te/ chos bstan pa'i tshe/ sems can gyi khams mtha' dang / dbus med pa/ thig gsum gyis dus gzhan
482a1(1): @#// gnan du namam 'dul bar gyur to// de nas srid pa'i 'byung gnas kyi mi rnams kyis 'jam dpal gconu pa skyed pa'i nges bsnyen pa dang / 'byung gnas kyi grong brdal 'byin te/ sa la sna tshogs
482a2(1): kyi rgyan gyis mchod chen gyis ni di ni marnam par snang da nas thos nas dege bsnyen tshong ngan shes rab chen po la sogs pa/ ngage bsnyen pa dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / khye'udas/ bu me mang po dgas sonas
482a3(1): 'khor lnga brgya dang bcas te sbyid pa'i 'byung gnas kyi grong brdal nas byung nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gangan ba der dong ngo / de la dge bsnyen shes rab chen po ni dge bsnyen bzang pos

493a1(1): pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag kyang mthong ba'i bar du ste/ phyogs re rer rnam par ltas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa kha dog sna tshogs mnga' ba dang / dbyibs sna
493a2(1): tshogs mnga' ba dang / rnam par sprul pa sna tshogs mnga' ba dang / khyu mchog gi mthu dang / rnam par rol pa sna tshogs mnga' ba dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs mnga' bad

493a6(1): sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dran pa 'di thob par zad na/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor dang /

494a2(1): par 'phrul pa dang / khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba la rab tu phra bar dmigs shing 'jug pas/ sangs rgyas rje su dran pa'i sgo phyogs thams cad du 'jug pa rab tu thob pa dang bskal pa thams cad du de bzhin ga
494a3(1): mthong shing rnam par migs pa dang mi dri la ngas/ sangs rgyas rje sudran pa'i sto btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis dus thams cad du bzhin gshegs pa mthong zhing 'grogs par mi 'dral bas
494a4(1): sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa'i sgo dus su spro btags pa rab tu thod pa dang / gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nas mngon par 'phags shing zil gyis minon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su mthong zhing

494b1(1): bcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad drung bzhin sa shegs pa thams kyang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rnam par dmigs pas/ sangs rgyas rjes sargyan pa'i sgra ni nga'i spong ma
494b2(1): pa rab tu 'thob pa dang / glang gis nying cig pa nas thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gshegs par rnam par dmigs pas sangs rgyas rjes su dranu pa'i sgo 'bral dus sgra bang
494b3(1): parang tu thob pa dang / bang gis de bzhin gshegs pa re re skyil mi phreng du bzhugs pas kyang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rgyas par byang pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku rnam par dmigs ces/

495a7(1): dang / rings kyi ba'i'i bshes pa shin sa khyong lang ge'i nga tshogs dang/ rgyu yongs sunan par 'gyur/ tshogs kyis rgyachen po nga nga chur bar byeng // dge ba'i dri ba'i skang sa

501a2(1): gag/ rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'i 'byor sems can rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa dang / stobs bcu'i ye shes rags pa med pa'i snang ba yongs su bskyed pa'i phyir 'gro ba thams cad kyi sos
501a3(1): rgya mtsho la zhugs pa dang / yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i dus las mi 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mtsho la bzhugs pa dang / zhing thams
501a4(1): cad rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir las mngon par bsgrubs pas zhing rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod cing rim 'gro byed pa'i stobs kyis sangs
501a5(1): rgyas brgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa dang / yo shes rnam pas chos rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa dang / nan tan dang ldan pas yon tan rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa dang / 
501a6(1): brjod pa thams cad du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mngon par bsgrubs pa'i phyir/ 'gro ba'i skad rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa rnams kyi spyod pa shes pa dang yon tan brjod par nus re snyam
501a7(1): sa ma khri'adzin sa dpas chang drus cu 'das pa'i gzugs kyi bangs 'di ci langs pa'i gnas rgyamatho ngas shes bya ba yi / nin ma gyi na ngas na bcis byang 'dzus / 
501b1(1): dI'i gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dbus byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su spyad par bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu ror ba zangs kyis dge slong rgya mtsho'i sbyim gyi dang
501b2(1): nyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge slong rgya mchod skyon la/ lan brgya stong du ma ri ga yas phyog su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang du bltas te/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi drung nas song ngo // de nas
501b3(1): tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dge ba'i bshes rkyen gyi gdams ngag de dang / kun nas mig gi chos kyi rnam grangs de yang rjes su dran par byed cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de yang
501b4(1): rjes su bsam pa dang / chos kyi tshig dang / khri ze'i sprin de dag kyang yongs su bzungs pa dang / chos kyi sgo rgya mtsho'i tshul de dag la yang 'jug par bya ba dang / chos kyi tshul de la rnam par
501b5(1): lta ba dang / chos kyi le'u dang gling gi tshul de dag yang 'jug par bya ba dang / chos kyi ram mkha' de la yang dag par gzhol bar bya ba dang / chos kyi dkyil 'khor de yang rjes su
501b6(1): spyad par bya ba dang / chos rin po che'i gling de yang rjes su sems shing thar gyis lang ka'i gnas rgya mtsho'i ngos shes bya ba gang na ba der phyin nas/ dge slong shin tu brtan pa
501b7(1): mthong bar dga' zhing shar phyogs su bltas so// de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang /

503a2(1): par dga' ste/ kun du bltas pa dang / des dge slong shin du brtan pa ram mkha'i dbyings la lnga brgya stong grangs med pas yongs su bskor cing ban tshun 'chag pa mthong ngo // nas
503a3(1): mkha'i dbyings de yang lnga'i dbang po rnams kyis dge slong shin du brtan pa la mchod pa'i las su bya ba'i phyir lha rdzas kyi me tog bsil ma'i sprin kyis yog pa dang / lha rdzas kyi pad po'i
503a4(1): spriran gyi sgra dang / dar gyi ba dan grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyad par mthong ngo // klu'i dbang po rnams kyis nam mkha' de la a ga ru nag po'i sras mngon par 'bral ba'i sprin shin du mam
503a5(1): ba las 'brug sba bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'byung bar byas pa mthong ngo // mi 'am ci'i dbang po rnams kyis nam mkha' de la lnga'i rdzas kyi dag snyan pa'i rgyud kyis bstod pa'i rol mo brlang
503a6(1): ba dang / dgol ba dang / zlar blang ba'i dbyangs pams cad stsa shing thangs babs par thar to// mamachen pa'i dbang pa rnams kyis rnams pa' ni lasam shin du shing bdag par
503a7(1): ba'i srin bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag yid dga' bas bkye ste/ dge slong shin du brtan pa la dang cing mos pa'i gzugs su byung ba mthong ngo // lA ma yin gyi dbang po rnapas kyis kyang rnam
503b1(1): mababar 'ad pam 'idri mams pa khyab ba byen gyis brlabs sa yan pan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i can snang ba dang ldan par byas pa ma dang / rnams pa'i nga kyang bangs mas ma
503b2(1): mi'i gzugs dang / kha dag dang dbyibs su 'khod cing nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'i thams gan nas bskor te/ gsad pa meng pa la dga' zhing thal po ltang te gnas pazas
503b3(1): gyis mi khyab pa mthong ngo // gan myen gyi dbang po brgya snang 'khar dang bcas pa bsam gyi khyab pa dag kyang nam mkha' de la shin du mi skrag pa'i gzug su dge sna shid du brtan pa
503b4(1): byams pa'i mthu dang ldan par 'khod pa mthong ngo // srin pa'i dbang ba brgya stang 'khor dang bcas pa bsam gyis mi khyab padag kyang rnam mkha' de la dam slong shin drab rtan pa mangs su
503b5(1): bsrung ba byed cing / kun du chub mthong // mangs pa'i dbang po brgya snang bsam kyis mi khyab pa dag kyang nam mkha' de la ba lam sbyar cing dga' ba dang / ying dbang ba'i na

503b7(1): thal mo sbyar cing / gzhal med khang na gnas pa mthongango / de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis dge slong shin du brtan pa de ltar nam mkha'i dbyings la 'chag cing 'dug pa

509a5(1): ces bya ba'i dug gis de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spong ba la sgrub par bya ba dang / ri ltar na nyan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dman
